English: Oh {PlayerName}. I see you have the holy statue of our people. Do you want to give it to me?
Chinese (simplified): 哦{PlayerName}。我看到你有我们人民的神圣雕像。你想给我吗?

English: You need a friendly reputation or better to the Talon
Deutsch: then I will to talk to you
Chinese (simplified): 你需要泰隆的友好声望，或者更高

English: Tell me the story about your people
Greetings {PlayerName}. What do you want from me?
Chinese (simplified): 你好{PlayerName}。你想从我这里得到什么?

English: Welcome {PlayerName} to a round of cards!
We will play for <color=#fddc1e>Gold Coins</color>.\nHow many <color=#fddc1e>Gold Coins</color> do you want to bet?
Chinese (simplified): 我们用 <color=#fddc1e>金币</color>支付.\n你打算用多少 <color=#fddc1e>金币</color>作为赌注?

English: It seems you don't have enough <color=#fddc1e>Gold Coins</color>...get some and come back. Bye
Chinese (simplified): 看起来你没有足够的 <color=#fddc1e>金币</color>...弄些金币再回来，拜拜

English: You bet {GoldCoinsPlayerBet} Gold Coins and I will also bet {GoldCoinsPlayerBet} Gold Coins. \n\nYour first card is {PlayerCards}.
Chinese (simplified): 你赌了 {GoldCoinsPlayerBet} 金币我也会赌{GoldCoinsPlayerBet} 金币. \n\n你的第一个卡牌是 {PlayerCards}.

English: Your next card is {NextCard}. \nNow you have {PlayerCards} in total!
Chinese (simplified): 你的下一个牌是 {NextCard}. \n现在你总共有 {PlayerCards} !

English: My next card is {DealerNewCard}. Now I have {DealerCards}!
Chinese (simplified): 你下一个卡是 {DealerNewCard}. 现在我有 {DealerCards}!
你赢了! 这里将取走你 {2*GoldCoinsPlayerBet} 金币!

English: You have <color=#019245>won {TotalGamesWon}</color> and <color=#cf0707>lost {TotalGamesLost}</color> <color=#cf0707></color>games in this session so far.\nDo you want to play again?
Chinese (simplified): 你拥有 <color=#019245>赢 {TotalGamesWon}</color> and <color=#cf0707>损失 {TotalGamesLost}</color> <color=#cf0707></color>游戏到目前为止的\n你想再玩一次吗?
期待您的再次光临！再见。

English: First I draw cards for you, then for myself. Whoever comes closest to Number 21 wins. The card I draw has the number from 1 to 11. After each card you have the choice to stop.\nIf you win, you get my part on top of your bet.
Chinese (simplified): 首先我为你抽牌，然后为我自己抽。谁抽到的牌最接近21点谁就赢。我抽的牌数字从1到11。每抽一张牌后，你可以选择停止。\n如果您赢了，您将赢得我的赌注加上您的赌注。
好的，谢谢，我明白了 (返回)

English: You lost 20 times on my table by now. Come back later and think about getting a real job maybe.
Chinese (simplified): 你已经在我这儿输了20次了。改天再来，或许考虑找个正经工作吧。

English: It's you again! Our Management ordered me to refuse playing with you. Come back later.
Chinese (simplified): 又是你！我们的管理层命令我拒绝和你玩。改天再来。

English: Can you tell me my Statistics first?
Chinese (simplified): 你能先告诉我我的统计数据吗？

English:
On my table you played <color=#ffffff>{GamesPlayed}</color> times.

You <color=#019245>won {TableGamesWon}</color> times.
You <color=#cf0707>lost {TableGamesLost}</color> times.

You <color=#019245>won {TableCoinsWon}</color> <color=#fddc1e>Gold Coins</color>.
You <color=#cf0707>lost {TableCoinsLost}</color> <color=#fddc1e>Gold Coins</color>.
Chinese (simplified):
在我的桌子上，你玩了 <color=#ffffff>{GamesPlayed}</color> 次。

你 <color=#019245>赢了 {TableGamesWon}</color> 次。
你 <color=#cf0707>输了 {TableGamesLost}</color> 次。

你 <color=#019245>赢得了 {TableCoinsWon}</color> <color=#fddc1e>金币</color>。
你 <color=#cf0707>失去了 {TableCoinsLost}</color> <color=#fddc1e>金币</color>。

Japanese: 何をいたしましょうか？

Chinese (simplified): 最近有什么有趣的事情吗？

English: We currently have a sale going on. Be sure to buy while you can!
Français: Des offres spéciales sont toujours à prévoir!
Italiano: Le offerte speciali sono sempre dietro l'angolo!
Japanese: 特別なオファーには必ず期待が持てます!
Chinese (simplified): 我们目前正在进行促销活动。一定要趁现在买！

English: I've spent too long away from my family... My contract is almost up and i'll finally be able to go home.
Français: Ma famille me manque. J'espère que je les verrai bientôt.
Italiano: Mi manca la mia famiglia. Spero di rivederli presto.
Russian: Я скучаю по семье. Надеюсь, я скоро их увижу.
Japanese: 家族に会いたい。早く会えることを願っている。
Chinese (simplified): 我离开家人太久了……我的合同快到期了，我终于可以回家了。

English: I heard there are fish up in the ponds on the Presidium. Do you think that's true?
Français: Ma famille me manque. J'espère qu'ils vont bien.
Italiano: Penso sempre alla mia famiglia. Spero stiano tutti bene.
Russian: Я скучаю по семье. Жертвы, которые мы приносим.
Japanese: 家族に会いたい。我々が行う犠牲。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说在Presidium的池塘里有鱼。你觉得那是真的吗？

English: Polaris has good prices but poor quality merchandise. On the other hand, the Trade Federation's products are always top quality but are too expensive for my budget. What should I do?
Français: La Guilde des commerçants a des prix vraiment scandaleux.
Italiano: La Gilda dei Commercianti ha veramente dei prezzi scandalosi.
Japanese: 通商連合にはいくつかの悪い価格がある。
Chinese (simplified): Polaris的价格很好，但是商品质量差。另一方面，贸易联盟的产品总是最高质量的，但是对我的预算来说太昂贵了。我该怎么办？
Turkish: Ticaret federasyonunun bazı kötü fiyatları var.

English: I heard an idiot keep insisting that TOP brewery makes root beer! That stuff has enough alcohol to degrease an engine!\nI know for a fact that you can treat infected wounds and dermal parasites with it!
Français: La bière de racine de cette galaxie est vraiment bonne!
Italiano: La birra di radice di questa galassia è davvero buona!
Russian: Рутбир в этой галактике действительно хорош!
Japanese: この銀河のルートビールは本当にうまい！
Chinese (simplified): 我听到有个白痴坚持说TOP酿酒厂制作根汁啤酒！那东西的酒精含量足以去油！\n我知道你确实可以用它来治疗感染的伤口和皮肤寄生虫！
Turkish: Bu galaksideki kök birası gerçekten çok iyi!

English: I hear someone talking about a new simulation today, it's called 'Project Eden' and they say it is great!
Français: J'entends parler aujourd'hui d'une nouvelle simulation, ça s'appelle «Projet Eden» et il parait que c'est génial!
Russian: Я слышал, как сегодня кто-то говорит о новой симуляции, она называется «Проект Эдем», и они говорят, что она великолепна!
Japanese: 今日誰かが新しいシミュレーションの話をしているのを聞いたよ、「プロジェクト・エデン」と呼ばれて、すごいらしいよ！
Chinese (simplified): 我听说今天有人谈论一个叫做'Project Eden'的新模拟，他们说它很棒！

English: I'm tired of life on this space station. Maybe I should sign up for one of the colonies in the outer reaches?
Français: Francis Taelyn vient d'annoncer une nouvelle version «IU». Elle aurait de jolies couleurs.
Russian: Фрэнсис Тэлин только что анонсировал новую версию «UI». Я слышал, у нее красивые цвета.
Japanese: Francis Taelynが「UI」の新バージョンを発表しました。いい色になっているそうです。
Chinese (simplified): 我厌倦了在这个空间站上的生活。也许我应该报名参加外域的殖民地之一？

English: Why are there so few variants of alien life in this galaxy? You'd expect to see at least something different on each planet!
Chinese (simplified): 为什么这个星系中外星人生命的形式这么少？你至少期望在每个星球上看到一些不同的东西！

English: Have you heard of 'Discord'? I heard they're a music group from Baymax 6.
Français: J'ai entendu parler d'un nouveau groupe de musique. Ils se font appeller «Discord».
Italiano: Ho sentito parlare di un nuovo gruppo musicale. Si fanno chiamare 'Discord'.
Russian: Я слышал о создании новой музыкальной группы. Они называют себя Discord.
Japanese: 新しい音楽グループが結成されたと聞いた。彼らは「不協和音」と名乗っています。
Chinese (simplified): 你听说过'Discord'吗？我听说他们是来自Baymax 6的音乐团队。

English: I heard strange noises coming from a vent on the last colony I visited, I couldn't sleep at all.
Français: J'ai entendu des bruits étranges provenant d'une bouche d'aération sur la dernière colonie que nous avons visitée, je n'ai pas du tout pu dormir.
Russian: Я слышал странные звуки, доносящиеся из вентиляционного отверстия последней посещенной нами колонии, и не мог спать из за этого.
Japanese: 前に行ったコロニーの通気孔から異音が聞こえてきて、全然眠れなかった。
Chinese (simplified): 我听到我上次访问的殖民地的一个通风口传来奇怪的声音，我根本无法入睡。

English: I can't wait to ship out of this dump. The goons from HabSec keep conducting 'random' searches on my bags. It's clearly discrimination!
Italiano: Mi piace stare dalla parte del pianeta.
Japanese: 惑星側に行くのが好きなんだ。
Chinese (simplified): 我迫不及待地想离开这个垃圾堆。HabSec的暴徒们一直在对我的包进行'随机'搜查。这显然是歧视！

English: A lot of people complain about the Zirax's governing. Honestly, I think they're fine. They could've regressed into complete tyranny but have kept to their treaties and keep the galaxy safe.
Français: Les Zirax sont d'excellents dirigeants. Aucune réglementation!
Italiano: Gli Zirax sono ottimi governatori. Nessun regolamento!
Japanese: ジラックスは優れた統治者だ。規制がない！
Chinese (simplified): 很多人抱怨Zirax的治理。老实说，我认为他们很好。他们本可以退回到完全的暴政，但一直遵守他们的条约，保持星系的安全。

English: I've heard that Vermillion of Forge Aerospace has been contracted by Rados to build new bases for them. He has an apartment on one of the trade stations, but I don't know which.
Français: Je préfère mourir plutôt que de payer plus d'impôts.
Italiano: Preferirei morire piuttosto che pagare più tasse.
Russian: Я лучше умру, чем буду платить больше налогов.
Japanese: これ以上税金を払うくらいなら死んだ方がマシだ。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说Forge Aerospace的Vermillion被Rados雇佣来为他们建造新的基地。他在其中一个贸易空间站有公寓，但我不知道是哪一个。

English: I'm looking for ship to Farpoint Station. Are you a Federation captain? No? Oh well.
Français: Il n'y a pas de lendemain, seulement aujourd'hui!
Italiano: Non c'è un domani, il presente è oggi!
Japanese: 明日はない、今日だけだ！
Chinese (simplified): 我在找一艘去Farpoint Station的飞船。你是联邦的舰长吗？不是？哦，好吧。

English: I saw an idiot flying a Naginata the other day. I suppose 'crashing' is probably the better term. Smashed right into the ground outside an Abyssal fortress on a Plasma planet!
Français: Cet emplacement a de nombreux avantages.
Italiano: Questo luogo ha molte belle qualità.
Russian: У этого места много хороших качеств.
Japanese: この場所には多くの素晴らしい資質があります。
Chinese (simplified): 前几天我看到有个白痴在飞Naginata。我想'坠毁'可能是更好的说法。正好撞进了一个Abyssal堡垒外的地面上，在一个等离子体星球上！

English: That Zirax blockade has seized three freighters coming into the system! I had cargo on both of them! Now they expect me to pay them to release MY cargo!
Japanese: ジラックスは非常に抑圧的だ！
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯的封锁已经扣押了三艘进入系统的货船！我在那两艘船上都有货物！现在他们指望我付钱给他们，以释放我的货物！

English: Why do people keep calling these guns 'Epic'? We're not a bunch of dumb kids. These guns have proper military designations! What for the next series of weapons, huh? super-hyper-epic assault rifle? Grow up!
Français: Avez-vous vu le nouveau fusil à impulsions v3? J'ai hâte d'en essayer un!
Italiano: Hai visto il nuovo fucile a impulsi MkIII? Non vedo l'ora di sparare con uno di quelli!
Russian: Вы видели новую импульсную винтовку MkIII? Мне уже не терпится пострелять из нее!
Japanese: 新しいMkIIIパルスライフルを見た？撃つのが待ち遠しい！
Chinese (simplified): 为什么人们总是把这些枪叫做'Epic'？我们不是一群愚蠢的孩子。这些枪有适当的军事命名！那下一系列武器呢，超级超超史诗突击步枪？成熟点吧！

English: I'm a huge fan of Plasma Cannons, but honestly... The rocket launcher is far easier to use.
Français: Les canons à plasma, c'est vraiment quelque chose!
Italiano: I cannoni al plasma esistono davvero!
Japanese: プラズマキャノンは本当にすごい！
Chinese (simplified): 我是等离子炮的超级粉丝，但老实说...火箭发射器要容易使用得多。

English: I hear the new cruiser can make the Kessel run in just 12 parsecs!
Français: J'ai entendu dire que le nouveau croiseur peut faire le raid Akua en seulement 3 sauts hyperespace!
Russian: Я слышал, что новый крейсер может достигнуть Акуа всего за 3 варп-прыжка!
Japanese: 新型クルーザーは3回のワープジャンプでアクアを走らせることができると聞いた！
Chinese (simplified): 我听说新巡洋舰可以在12秒差距内完成凯塞尔跑！

English: The new captain has a stick up his ass about procedure. At least if he runs out of ammo he can pull it out and use it as a backup weapon.
Français: Le nouveau capitaine est trop sévère!
Italiano: Il nuovo capitano è troppo severo!
Chinese (simplified): 新上任的舰长对程序非常严格。至少如果他用完弹药，他可以拿出来当作备用武器。

English: I heard someone talking about a lost Polaris Superfreighter in the Ellyon system. 10 credits says they were shipping something they weren't meant to.
Français: J'ai entendu quelqu'un parler d'un vaisseau d'extraction Polaris perdu dans le système Ellyon.
Italiano: Ho sentito qualcuno parlare di una nave mineraria Polaris che è andata perduta nel sistema Ellyon.
Russian: Я слышал, как кто-то говорил о потерянном шахтёрском корабле Полярис в системе Ellyon.
Japanese: エリヨン星系で失われたポラリスの採掘船の話を聞いたことがある。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说有人在埃利翁星系谈论一艘失踪的极星超级货船。我赌10个信用点，他们运送了一些不该运送的东西。

English: I love to look out the windows when we make planet fall for a survey mission.
Français: J'adore regarder par les fenêtres lorsque nous atterrissons sur une planète lors d'une mission d'exploration.
Russian: Я люблю смотреть в окна, когда мы приземляемся на планету во время исследовательской миссии.
Japanese: 私は調査任務のために惑星に降下する時に、窓の外を見るのが好きなんだ。
Chinese (simplified): 我喜欢在我们进行勘测任务时，从窗户望出去看行星降落。

English: There are rumours about hidden pirate markets. I wonder if it would be cheaper to buy from them than Polaris?
Français: Il y a des rumeurs à propos de marchés pirates cachés.
Italiano: Ho sentito voci a riguardanti alcuni mercati pirati nascosti.
Russian: Ходят слухи о скрытых пиратских рынках.
Japanese: 隠された海賊市場について噂があります。
Chinese (simplified): 有关于隐藏的海盗市场的传言。我想知道从他们那里购买是否会比从极星更便宜？

English: I heard that a Tal'on ship was seen near the Outer Rim! The Tal'on with ships?! There haven't been Tal'on ships in centuries!
Français: J'ai entendu dire qu'il y avait un mouvement de résistance galactique grandissant contre le Zirax!
Italiano: Ho sentito che c'è un movimento di resistenza galattica in forte crescita contro gli Zirax!
Russian: Я слышал, что против Зиракса растет движение галактического сопротивления!
Japanese: ジラックスに対して銀河系のレジスタンス運動が活発化していると聞いています。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说在外围边缘附近看到了一艘塔隆船！塔隆有船只？！几个世纪以来都没有塔隆的船只了！

English: What's up with the captain's orders? He's always saying stuff like 'Engage', 'Make it so' and 'Energize'.
Français: J'ai entendu dire que le capitaine aime vraiment dire aux officiers de passerelle de «s'engager».
Russian: Я слышал, что капитану очень нравится просить офицеров на мостике «вступать в бой».
Japanese: 館長は士官に「交戦」を指示するのが好きだと聞いている。
Chinese (simplified): 舰长的命令是怎么回事？他总是说些像'交战'、'让它这么做'和'激活'这样的话。

English: Elias Hummel just put out a new galactic survey: Which parts of Andromeda do you like best?
Français: Elias Hummel vient de publier une nouvelle étude galactique: Quelles régions d'Andromède aimez-vous le plus? Ou le moins?
Italiano: Elias Hummel ha appena pubblicato un nuovo sondaggio galattico: Quali parti di Andromeda ti piacciono di più?
Russian: Элиас Хаммель только что опубликовал новый галактический обзор: какие части Андромеды вам нравятся больше всего? А меньше всего?
Japanese: エリアス・フンメルが新しい銀河調査を発表した：アンドロメダのどこが少なくとも一番好き？
Chinese (simplified): 埃利亚斯·胡梅尔刚刚发布了一项新的银河调查：你最喜欢仙女座的哪些部分？

English: I wonder what the mess hall has for dinner today?
Français: Je me demande ce que le réfectoire a pour dîner aujourd'hui?
Italiano: Mi chiedo cosa offrirà la mensa per cena..
Russian: Интересно, что сегодня в столовой на обед?
Japanese: 今日の食堂の夕食は何だろう？
Chinese (simplified): 我想知道今天餐厅晚餐有什么？

English: Nice gun you have there, but aren't you a little short for a stormtrooper?
Français: Nous avons les meilleurs équipages de la galaxie!
Italiano: Abbiamo le migliori squadre della galassia!
Russian: У нас лучшие экипажи в галактике!
Japanese: 銀河で最高のクルーがいるぞ！
Chinese (simplified): 你手上的枪不错，但你作为风暴兵来说是不是有点太矮了？

English: I heard Forge Aerospace designed the Tovera-Class Dreadnought. The guy that did it must really hate people! He told me to say that by the way.
Français: J'ai entendu dire que Forge Aerospace avait vendu 3 nouveaux destroyers à des idiots pour tout leur carburant de moteur à distorsion.
Russian: Я слышал, Forge Aerospace продала каким-то идиотам 3 новых эсминца за все их варп-топливо.
Japanese: フォージ航空宇宙社がワープ燃料のために新型駆逐艦３隻をバカに売ったらしい。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说Forge Aerospace设计了Tovera级无畏舰。设计它的那个人一定非常讨厌人！顺便说一句，他是这么告诉我的。

English: Yes, I can speak Trade Standard, Terran. I go with the chief regularly to purchase supplies from the traders of Polaris.
Français: Cette planète a de nombreux avantages.
Italiano: Questo pianeta ha molte belle qualità.
Russian: У этой планеты много прекрасных качеств.
Japanese: この惑星には多くの素晴らしい資質があります。
Chinese (simplified): 是的，我可以说贸易标准语，地球人。我经常和首领一起去波拉利斯的商人那里购买补给。

English: I heard one of your people call an Erebus Spider a 'Giganpedibus Silex' does it mean something or do you just like inventing long-winded names for things?
Français: Certaines des grosses araignées me font vraiment peur!
Italiano: Alcuni di quegli enormi ragni mi fanno rabbrividire!
Russian: Некоторые из больших пауков действительно пугают меня!
Japanese: 大きなクモの中には本当にゾッとするものもいる！
Chinese (simplified): 我听说你们的人把Erebus蜘蛛叫做'Giganpedibus Silex'，这是什么意思，还是你们就喜欢给事物起一些冗长的名字？

English: Watch your footing in tall grass. Leafcutters will go for your legs!
Japanese: 遠くで捕食動物の声が聞こえる！
Chinese (simplified): 在高草中注意脚下。叶切者会攻击你的腿！

English: I do not trust you, Terran. Stay away from me and we shall have no problems.
Français: Nous n'oublierons jamais ce que le Zirax nous a fait.
Italiano: Non dimenticherò mai quello che ci hanno fatto gli Zirax.
Russian: Мы никогда не забудем, что с нами сделал Зиракс.
Japanese: 我々はジラックスが我々にしたことを決して忘れないだろう。
Chinese (simplified): 我不信任你，地球人。离我远点，我们就不会有麻烦。

English: I am not supposed to be talking to you. Our chief is our contact with the outside world.
Français: Je ne suis pas censé te parler. C'est notre chef est notre contact avec le monde extérieur.
Russian: Я не должен с тобой разговаривать. Наш главный - это наш контакт с внешним миром.
Japanese: 私はお前と話すことになっていない。我々の酋長は外の世界との接点だ。
Chinese (simplified): 我本不应该和你说话。我们的首领是我们与外界的联系人。

English: You may think our crossbows are primitive but they are made from the best materials that are a rival to any rifle.
Français: Les arbalètes sont bonnes pour la chasse!
Italiano: Le balestre sono buone per la caccia!
Japanese: クロスボウは狩りに適している!
Chinese (simplified): 你可能认为我们的十字弓很原始，但它们是用最好的材料制成的，可以与任何步枪相媲美。

English: Thankfully we can grow all the food we need. But hunting is still necessary for ingredients to be sold to Polaris.
Français: Heureusement, nous pouvons cultiver toute la nourriture dont nous avons besoin.
Italiano: Per fortuna possiamo coltivare tutto il cibo di cui abbiamo bisogno.
Russian: К счастью, мы можем выращивать все, что нам нужно.
Japanese: ありがたいことに我々は必要な食物をすべて栽培することができる。
Chinese (simplified): 感谢上帝，我们可以种植我们所需的所有食物。但狩猎仍然对于向波拉利斯出售的原料是必要的。

English: We may seem primitive to your eyes, Terran. Perhaps that is just what we want you to see?
Français: Il ne faut pas oublier les sciences!
Japanese: 科学を忘れてはならない！
Chinese (simplified): 在你的眼里我们可能看起来很原始，地球人。也许这只是我们想让你看到的？

English: Every day the Zirax's grasp exceeds their reach. It is only a matter of time before they collapse under their own weight.
Français: Un jour nous retournerons dans le néant.
Italiano: Un giorno torneremo al grande vuoto.
Japanese: いつか大いなる虚空に戻るだろう。
Chinese (simplified): 每一天，兹瑞克斯的掌控都超出了他们的触及范围。他们迟早会在自己的重压下崩溃。

English: The Tal'on Protectorate once spanned this entire galaxy... Those days are long behind us now.
Français: Nous étions autrefois les maîtres de la galaxie.
Italiano: Una volta eravamo i padroni della galassia.
Japanese: 我々はかつて銀河の支配者だった。
Chinese (simplified): 泰隆保护领地曾经横跨了整个银河系……那些日子现在早已过去了。

English: Keep your heads down when a zirax passes overhead. I don't want their attention and i'm sure you don't either.
Japanese: UCHが非常に原始的に見える...
Chinese (simplified): 当兹瑞克斯从头顶经过时，保持低姿态。我不想引起他们的注意，我确定你也不想。

English: I'm but a simple man trying to make my way in the galaxy.
Français: La galaxie a besoin de plus de paix.
Italiano: La galassia ha bisogno di meno guerre.
Japanese: 銀河には戦争は必要ない。
Chinese (simplified): 我只是一个简单的人，试图在银河系中找到自己的道路。

English: You say you come from something milky? Is that a symbiotic relationship with a large organism?
Français: Vous dites que vous venez de ... euh ... voie lactée? Est-ce par hasard une relation symbiotique avec un organisme plus grand?
Italiano: Dici di provenire dalla via..ehm.. lattea? È per caso un rapporto simbiotico con un organismo più grande?
Russian: Вы говорите, что произошли от чего-то молочного? Это симбиотические отношения с большим организмом?
Japanese: 銀河系の何かから来たと言うのか？それは大きな生物との共生関係なのか？
Chinese (simplified): 你说你来自什么乳白色的物体？那是与一个大型生物的共生关系吗？

Français: Les étrangers apportent toujours des problèmes.
Japanese: よそ者はいつもトラブルを持ってくる。

English: Many of the plants we now cultivate are from the wrecked ships of your people. They are most unnatural in how fast they grow. I suspect they have been altered.
Français: Notre arrogance nous a conduit à notre perte.
Italiano: La nostra arroganza ci ha portato alla rovina.
Russian: Наше высокомерие привело к нашему падению.
Japanese: 我々の傲慢さが我々の破滅を招く。
Chinese (simplified): 我们现在种植的许多植物都来自你们人类的失事飞船。它们生长得非常快，非常不自然。我怀疑它们已经被改变了。

English: Glory to the empire! Long may the Empress reign!
Chinese (simplified): 荣耀归于帝国！愿女皇长久统治！

English: Do not speak to me so casually, Terran. I do not know you.
Chinese (simplified): 不要这么随意地和我说话，地球人。我不认识你。

English: The War of Silence crippled the Empire. Change is necessary for our continued existence.
Français: La guerre du silence était notre appel à la grandeur!
Russian: Война Безмолвия была нашим призывом к величию!
Japanese: 沈黙の戦いは、我々が偉大になるための呼び水だった！
Chinese (simplified): 沉默之战削弱了帝国。为了我们持续存在，变革是必要的。

English: I do not trust the House of Abyssal. They are not what they seem.
Japanese: アビサルは何かを企んでいる!
Chinese (simplified): 我不信任深渊之家。他们并非表面上那样。

Japanese: アンドロメダは我々のものだ！

Français: La galaxie est à nous à juste titre!
Italiano: La galassia è nostra di diritto!
Japanese: 銀河は正当な我々のものだ！

English: Someday we will invade your world.
Français: Un jour, nous envahirons votre monde.
Italiano: Un giorno invaderemo il vostro mondo.
Russian: Когда-нибудь мы вторгнемся в ваш мир.
Japanese: いつか我々はお前の世界を侵略する。
Chinese (simplified): 总有一天，我们会入侵你的世界。

English: Our clones are tended to with the finest care!
Français: Nos clones sont entretenus avec le plus grand soin!
Russian: За нашими клонами ухаживают с максимальной заботой!
Japanese: 我々のクローンは細心の注意を払って管理されている！
Chinese (simplified): 我们的克隆体都是经过精心照料的！

English: Any fleet is no match for ours.
Français: N'importe quelle flotte ne peut se comparer à la nôtre.
Italiano: Nessuna flotta può competere con la nostra.
Russian: Ни один флот не сравнится с нашим.
Japanese: どんな艦隊も我々に匹敵するものはない。
Chinese (simplified): 任何舰队都不是我们的对手。

English: You lose more ships to us by the cycle.
Français: Vous perdez plus de vaisseaux que nous par cycle.
Russian: Вы теряете больше кораблей за цикл чем мы.
Japanese: サイクルごとに多くの船を失っていくことになる。
Chinese (simplified): 循环往复，你会在我们手下损失更多的飞船。

Italiano: I Rados gestiscono la nostra logistica.
Japanese: ラドスは我々の物流を担当している。
Chinese (simplified): 拉多斯处理我们的后勤工作。

Japanese: ゲルストは聞いている...

English: Few can match the military of the Xenu!
Français: Rares sont ceux qui peuvent égaler l'armée du Xenu!
Italiano: In pochi possono eguagliare i militari della Xenu!
Russian: Немногие могут сравниться с армией Ксену!
Japanese: ゼヌの軍隊に匹敵するものはほとんどない！
Chinese (simplified): 很少有人能比得上泽纽的军事!

English: The Epsilon run our communications ... wait, why am I telling you this?!
Français: L'Epsilon gère nos communications ... attendez, pourquoi je vous dis ça?!
Italiano: Gli Epsilon gestiscono le nostre comunicazioni ... un momento, perchè te lo sto dicendo?!
Russian: «Эпсилон» управляет нашей связью ... подожди, зачем я тебе это говорю ?!
Japanese: イプシロンは通信を実行します...待って、なぜ私はあなたにこんなことを言っているのですか？
Chinese (simplified): 艾普西隆负责我们的通讯...等等，我为什么要告诉你这些？

English: For now, you are allowed here, but next time we meet, I will end you.
Français: Pour l'instant, vous êtes accepté ici, mais la prochaine fois que nous nous rencontrerons, je vous tuerai.
Italiano: Per ora, ti è permesso stare qui, ma la prossima volta che ci incontreremo, porrò fine alla tua vita.
Russian: На данный момент тебе разрешено быть здесь, но в следующий раз, когда мы встретимся, я прикончу тебя.
Japanese: 今のところはここにいてもいい、だが次に会った時には お前を殺す。
Chinese (simplified): 现在，你可以待在这里，但下次我们见面时，我会干掉你。

Japanese: 我々のドローンはどこにでもある
Chinese (simplified): 我们的无人机，是，无处不在的。

English: You exist because we allow it.
Français: Vous existez parce que nous le permettons.
Italiano: Esisti solo perchè te lo permettiamo.
Russian: Вы существуете, потому что мы это позволяем.
Japanese: 我々が許可したからお前は存在している。
Chinese (simplified): 你的存在是因为我们的允许。

English: No alliances, only the Zirax Empire.
Japanese: 同盟はない、ジラックス帝国だけだ。
Chinese (simplified): 没有联盟，只有兹瑞克斯帝国。

English: Waste management? Weapons? Manufacturing? Polaris does it all!\nI'm paid to say that. Honestly, I wouldn't trust Polaris' waste management.
Français: Gestion des déchets? Armes? Fabrication? Nous faisons tout!
Italiano: Smaltimento rifiuti? Armi? Produzione? Ci occupiamo di tutto!
Russian: Управление отходами? Оружие? Производство? Мы делаем их все!
Japanese: 廃棄物処理? 兵器? 製造業？我々は全部やってます！
Chinese (simplified): 废物管理？武器？制造？极星公司无所不能！\n我被雇来这样说的。老实说，我不会信任极星公司的废物管理。

English: Another few years and i'll finally be able to move into one of the newer model habitats.\nThe one i've got now is comfortable enough, but the last resident died in it and it's always smelled funny.
Japanese: 独占欲のない者がいるか！
Chinese (simplified): 再过几年，我终于能够搬进一个新型的栖息地了。\n我现在拥有的已经足够舒适，但是最后一个居民是在里面去世的，而且它总是有一种奇怪的气味。

English: Have you ever heard of SIGMA? I see it on all the Polaris networks, but I honestly have no clue what it is.
Français: Nous avons toujours été intéressés par votre jardin.
Russian: Нам всегда интересен ваш задний двор.
Japanese: 我々はいつもあなたのバックヤードに興味を持っています。
Chinese (simplified): 你有没有听说过SIGMA？我在所有的极星网络上都看到它，但我老实说真的不知道它是什么。

English: Don't let the Polaris Oppressor's name scare you! It's here for your protection!\nThere's no pirate alive that doesn't fear the might of the Oppressor.
Français: N'oubliez pas de visiter le hall.
Japanese: ロビーに行くのを忘れるな
Chinese (simplified): 不要让极星压迫者的名字吓到你！它在这里是为了保护你！\n没有一个活着的海盗不畏惧压迫者的力量。

English: I heard one of the Hydrobots on Oscutune went rogue and sank a freighter while it was taking on reaction mass.\nWhat kind of a nutjob pumps up water right in front of a Hydrobot? I certainly wouldn't risk it!
Japanese: 我々は憑依されたPOSを入れた。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说在Oscutune的一个水下机器人失控了，在它正在装载反应物质的时候击沉了一艘货船。\n有谁会在水下机器人面前抽水？我当然不会冒这个险！

English: I heard Polaris mining got permission to collapse a planet in the Theta quadrant.\nThat means a big influx of raw materials from the core extraction. Those goons in Rados won't be happy.
Japanese: 環境? それは何ですか？
Chinese (simplified): 我听说极星矿业获得了在Theta星区崩塌一个星球的许可。\n这意味着从核心提取的原材料将大量涌入。拉多斯的那些家伙不会高兴的。

English: Those ASC clowns hit two shipments yesterday as the freighters were coming into the system.\nThe joke's on them though. Those ships were carrying raw sewage to the treatment plant!
Français: Nous n'avons jamais de problèmes de chaîne d'approvisionnement!
Italiano: Non abbiamo mai problemi di fornitura!
Russian: У нас никогда не бывает проблем с цепочкой поставок!
Japanese: 我々は供給連鎖の問題を持たない！
Chinese (simplified): 那些ASC的小丑们昨天在货船进入系统时袭击了两批货物。不过，这回他们可成笑话了。这些货船运载的是送往处理厂的生污水！

English: Rados keeps trying to compete with Polaris' supply lines and end up cutting corners.\nWe've had to dispatch PolSec to bring in three rados freighters this month because they tried to save time by only refuelling at zirax supply stations and ended up out of fuel.
Français: Ça ne nous dérange pas une petite aventure parallèle ici et là.
Russian: Мы не против небольшой побочной авантюры здесь и там.
Japanese: 我々はこことあちこちにある小さなサイドベンチャーを気にしません。
Chinese (simplified): 拉多斯一直在试图与极星的供应链竞争，结果却不得不走捷径。\n这个月我们不得不派出PolSec来拦截三艘拉多斯货船，因为他们试图通过只在兹瑞克斯补给站加油来节省时间，结果却耗尽了燃料。

English: I heard some aliens are working in a Polaris research facility designing new weapons for us. That seems kinda lazy to me, but it's above my paygrade.
Français: Un jour, Polaris Corp possédera la galaxie.
Italiano: Un giorno la Corporazione Polaris possederà la galassia.
Russian: Когда-нибудь галактика будет принадлежать корпорации Полярис.
Japanese: いつかポラリス社は銀河を手に入れるでしょう。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说有些外星人在波拉利斯研究设施里为我们设计新武器。这对我来说看起来有点懒，但这不是我工资级别能管的。

English: Have you seen the Trade Guild? It's a miracle they get anything done. They're all small companies, mostly family-owned.\nPolaris was lucky to break away from them when it did or else the company would be circling the drain.
Français: La concurrence est une bonne chose! Je veux dire, voyez-vous quelqu'un d'autre ici?
Italiano: La competizione è una buona cosa! Voglio dire, vedi qualcun altro qui?
Russian: Конкуренция - это хорошо! Я имею в виду, ты видишь здесь кого-нибудь еще?
Japanese: 競争は良いことだ！　つまりここに他の誰かがいるのか？
Chinese (simplified): 你见过贸易公会吗？他们能完成任何工作真是个奇迹。他们都是些小公司，大多是家族拥有的。\n波拉利斯公司很幸运能及时脱离他们，否则公司就会陷入困境。

English: Welcome to our small establishment stranger!
Français: Bienvenue étranger dans notre petit établissement!
Italiano: Benvenuto nel nostro piccolo stabilimento straniero!
Russian: Добро пожаловать в наше маленькое заведение незнакомец!
Japanese: 私たちの小さな施設へようこそよそ者！
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到我们的小店，陌生人！

English: Be careful of the pirates, they are known to take slaves.
Français: Faites attention aux pirates, ils sont connus pour faire des esclaves.
Italiano: Fai attenzione ai pirati, sono noti per la cattura e rivendita di schiavi.
Russian: Остерегайтесь пиратов, они, как известно, берут рабов.
Japanese: 海賊に気をつけろ、彼らは奴隷をさらうことで知られている。
Chinese (simplified): 小心海盗，他们以抓奴隶而闻名。

English: This galaxy is full of opportunity!
Italiano: La galassia è piena di opportunità
Japanese: この銀河はチャンスに満ちている！
Chinese (simplified): 这个银河系充满了机会！

English: The Zirax make finding a new home challenging.
Français: C'est difficile avec les Zirax de trouver un nouveau chez-nous.
Italiano: Gli Zirax rendono difficile trovare una nuova casa.
Russian: Зиракс делает поиск нового дома сложной задачей.
Japanese: ジラックスは新しい家を見つけるのを難しくしています。
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯让寻找新家变得具有挑战性。

English: I wonder how far it is to the nearest trader station?
Français: Je me demande à quelle distance se trouve la station de commerçe la plus proche?
Italiano: Mi chiedo quanto dista la stazione commerciale più vicina?
Russian: Интересно, как далеко до ближайшей торговой станции?
Japanese: 一番近いトレーダーステーションまでどのくらい遠いのだろうか？
Chinese (simplified): 我想知道最近的交易站有多远？

English: Someday the galaxy will be at peace again.
Français: Un jour, la galaxie sera à nouveau en paix.
Italiano: Un giorno la galassia sarà di nuovo pacifica.
Russian: Когда-нибудь в галактике снова будет мир.
Japanese: いつか銀河は再び平和になるだろう。
Chinese (simplified): 总有一天，银河系将再次迎来和平。

Français: La colonisation est une aventure incroyable!
Japanese: 植民地化は信じられないほどの冒険だ。
Chinese (simplified): 殖民是一次不可思议的冒险！

English: The forest whispers at night. I am glad we have our security fences in place.
Français: La forêt chuchote la nuit. Je suis heureux que nos clôtures de sécurité soient en place.
Italiano: La foresta sussurra di notte. Sono contento che ci siano le nostre recinzioni di sicurezza.
Russian: Лесные шепоты в ночное время. Я рад, что у нас установлены заборы безопасности.
Japanese: 森は夜に囁く。防犯柵が整備されていてうれしい。
Chinese (simplified): 夜晚，森林在低语。很高兴我们有安全围栏。

English: The remnants of the War of Silence can be felt everywhere, even on this planet.
Français: Les traces de la guerre du silence peuvent être ressentis partout, même sur cette planète.
Russian: Остатки Войны Безмолвия можно почувствовать повсюду, даже на этой планете.
Japanese: 沈黙の戦争の名残が、この惑星でさえも至る所で感じられる。
Chinese (simplified): 沉默之战的遗迹随处可见，即使是在这个星球上。

English: You say you are a Terran? I have not heard of your species. How is your Zirax prefect?
Français: Vous dites que vous êtes un Terran? Je n'ai jamais entendu parler de votre espèce. Comment va votre préfet Zirax?
Italiano: Dici di essere un Terrestre? Non ho mai sentito parlare della tua specie. Come sta il tuo prefetto Zirax?
Russian: ы говорите, что вы терран? Я не слышал о вашем виде. Как поживает ваш префект Зиракс?
Japanese: 地球人だと言うのか？お前の種族を聞いたことがない。ジラックスの総監はどうだ？
Chinese (simplified): 你说你是地球人？我从未听说过你们的种族。你的兹瑞克斯总督怎么样？

English: I do not believe that you are from another galaxy. Go peddle your lies elsewhere.
Français: Je ne crois pas que vous soyez d'une autre galaxie. Allez colporter vos mensonges ailleurs.
Italiano: Non credo tu venga da un'altra galassia. Vai a vendere le tue bugie altrove.
Russian: Я не верю, что вы из другой галактики. Иди торгуй своей ложью в другом месте.
Japanese: お前が他の銀河系から来たとは信じていない。他の場所で嘘を売りつけてこい。
Chinese (simplified): 我不相信你们来自另一个银河系。去别处兜售你的谎言吧。

English: I heard a rumor that a new Empire has surfaced to challenge the Zirax! They call themselves the Kriel.
Français: J'ai entendu une rumeur selon laquelle un nouvel Empire a fait surface pour défier le Zirax! Ils se font appeler le Kriel.
Italiano: Ho sentito parlare di un nuovo Impero che sta per sfidare gli Zirax! Si fanno chiamare Kriel.
Russian: Я слышал слух о появлении новой Империи, чтобы бросить вызов Зираксу! Они называют себя Крил.
Japanese: ジラックスに対抗する新帝国が現れたとの噂を聞いた！彼らはクリエルと名乗っている。
Chinese (simplified): 我听说有一个新帝国浮现出来挑战兹瑞克斯！他们自称为克里尔。

English: Our ship is a modest one, but she is adventure-ready!
Français: Notre vaisseau est modeste, mais il est prêt pour l'aventure!
Italiano: La nostra nave non sarà il meglio, ma è comunque pronta alle avventure!
Russian: Наш корабль скромный, но готовый к приключениям!
Japanese: 我々の船は地味だが、冒険の準備はできている！
Chinese (simplified): 我们的飞船很普通，但她已经准备好冒险了！

English: I hope we do not run into any pirates.
Français: J'espère que nous ne rencontrons pas de pirates.
Italiano: Speriamo di non imbatterci nei pirati.
Japanese: 海賊に遭遇しなければいいが。
Chinese (simplified): 我希望我们不会遇到任何海盗。

English: The pirates are constantly setting traps. Only last week my kin barely escaped one!
Français: Les pirates tendent constamment des pièges. La semaine dernière, mes proches en ont à peine réchappé!
Italiano: I pirati tendono continuamente trappole. Giusto la settimana scorsa un mio parente ne ha scampata una a malapena!
Russian: Пираты постоянно ставят ловушки. Только на прошлой неделе моя родня едва спаслась!
Japanese: 海賊は常に罠を仕掛けている。先週、私の親族はかろうじて逃れた！
Chinese (simplified): 海盗们不断设置陷阱。就在上周，我的亲人勉强逃出了一个！

English: Be sure you pay your right-to-travel fees or the Zirax will impound your ship!
Français: Assurez-vous de payer vos taxe de voyage ou le Zirax mettra votre vaisseau en fourrière!
Italiano: Assicurati di pagare le spese di viaggio o gli Zirax sequestreranno la tua nave!
Russian: Убедитесь, что вы заплатили сбор за право проезда, иначе Зиракс конфискует ваш корабль!
Japanese: 渡航権料を払わないとジラックスに船を押収されるぞ！
Chinese (simplified): 确保你支付通行费，否则兹瑞克斯会扣押你的飞船！

English: For Polaris, money is all that matters. It's like a score counter in the great game of life and we're all players.\nIf you don't have money, you don't have value. A person with nothing to lose has everything to gain... and that's dangerous.
Français: La monnaie galactique est le Crédit.
Italiano: La valuta galattica è il credito.
Japanese: 銀河の通貨はクレジットです。
Chinese (simplified): 对于波拉里斯来说，金钱就是一切。它就像是伟大人生游戏中的得分板，我们都是玩家。\n如果你没有钱，你就没有价值。一个没有什么可失去的人，拥有一切可得到的……而这很危险。

English: I hear there are civilizations that destroy themselves with environmental disaster. Who would ever be so foolish as to to that?
Français: J'entends dire qu'il y a des civilisations qui s'auto-détruisent en ne prenant pas soin de leur planète. Qui serait assez stupide pour faire ça?
Russian: Я слышал, что есть цивилизации, которые разрушают себя в результате экологической катастрофы. Кто бы мог быть настолько глуп?
Japanese: 環境災害で自滅する文明があると聞いています。誰がそんな愚かなことをするのでしょうか？
Chinese (simplified): 我听说有些文明会因为环境灾难而自我毁灭。谁会这么愚蠢去做那样的事情呢？

Français: Nous prenons ce que nous voulons.
Japanese: 欲しいものは手に入れる

English: The slaves sound restless, better fetch the electro-rod.
Français: Les esclaves semblent agités, mieux vaut aller chercher la matraque électrique.
Italiano: Gli schiavi sembrano irrequieti, meglio andare a prendere il bastone elettrico.
Russian: Рабы беспокойно шумят, лучше принесите электро-палку.
Japanese: 奴隷たちは落ち着きがないようだ、電気ロッドを持ってきてくれ。
Chinese (simplified): 奴隶们听起来不安分，最好拿来电棍。

Japanese: あなたの船は、いいですね...

English: The damn Zirax drove us to this fetid state.
Français: C'est ces maudits Zirax qui nous ont réduits à cet état.
Italiano: Sono stati i maledetti Zirax a ridurci in questo stato.
Russian: Проклятый Зиракс довел нас до этого зловонного состояния.
Japanese: 忌々しいジラックスは我々を悪臭を放つ状態に追いやった。
Chinese (simplified): 该死的兹瑞克斯把我们逼到了这种恶臭的状态。

English: I will not succumb to poverty, if the galactic powers will not help us then we will help ourselves.
Français: Je ne succomberai pas à la pauvreté, si les pouvoirs galactiques ne nous aident pas, nous nous aiderons nous-mêmes.
Italiano: Non soccomberò alla povertà, se i poteri della galassia non ci vogliono aiutare allora ci aiuteremo da soli.
Russian: Я не уступлю бедности, если галактические силы не помогут нам, мы поможем себе.
Japanese: 私は貧しさに屈さない、銀河の力が助けてくれないなら、我々は自分自身で助けよう。
Chinese (simplified): 我不会屈服于贫穷，如果银河力量不会帮助我们，那我们就自己帮助自己。

English: Where is Zaxks? I swear, if he spent another credit on the Trilinithane...
Français: Où est Zaxks? Je jure, s'il a dépensé un autre crédit sur le Trilinithane ...
Russian: Где Заксс? Клянусь, если он потратил хоть один кредит на Trilinithane...
Japanese: ザックスはどこだ？　誓うよ、もし彼がトリニスタンに別のクレジットを費やしたら...
Chinese (simplified): 扎克斯在哪里？我发誓，如果他在三里尼坦上再花一个信用点……

English: It was either this, or the rebellion, and the rebellion does not pay very well.
Français: C'était soit ceci, soit la rébellion, et la rébellion ne paie pas très bien.
Italiano: O questo, o la ribellione, e la ribellione non paga molto bene.
Russian: Либо это, либо восстание, и восстание не очень хорошо оплачивается.
Japanese: これか反乱のどちらかだったが、反乱はうまく儲からない。
Chinese (simplified): 要么这样，要么反抗，而反抗并不怎么赚钱。

English: Scavenging is far better than my old job!
Français: Enlever les ordures est bien mieux que mon ancien travail!
Russian: Уборка мусора намного лучше, чем моя старая работа!
Japanese: ゴミ集めは前の仕事よりずっといい！
Chinese (simplified): 拾荒比我以前的工作好多了！

English: Smuggling is challenging with the Zirax, but is even worse with the Kriel.
Français: La contrebande est un défi avec le Zirax, mais est encore pire avec le Kriel.
Russian: Контрабанда является сложной задачей с Зиракс, но еще хуже с Крил.
Japanese: 密輸はジラックスでは難しいが、クリエルではさらに悪い。
Chinese (simplified): 走私在兹瑞克斯那里很有挑战性，但在克里尔那里更糟。

English: We may ending up helping the Zirax against the Kriel. Hives are not good for business.
Français: Nous pourrions être obligé d'aider le Zirax contre le Kriel. Tout ça n'est vraiment pas bon pour les affaires.
Russian: Мы можем в конечном итоге помочь Зираксу против Крила. Улей вреден для бизнеса.
Japanese: 我々はクリエルとの戦いでジラックスを助けることになるかもしれない。じんましんは商売にならない。
Chinese (simplified): 我们可能最终会帮助兹瑞克斯对抗克里尔。蜂巢对生意不利。

Japanese: 私は税金を払ったことがない

English: Our black market is the real power in the galaxy.
Français: Notre marché noir est la vraie puissance de la galaxie.
Italiano: Il nostro mercato nero è una vera potenza nella galassia.
Russian: Наш черный рынок - реальная сила в галактике.
Japanese: 我々の闇市場が銀河の真の権力だ。
Chinese (simplified): 我们的黑市是银河中真正的力量。

English: Your crew, how much would you want for them?
Russian: Ваша команда, сколько вы бы хотели за них?
Japanese: お前のクルー、お前は彼らにいくら欲しいんだ？
Chinese (simplified): 你的船员，你愿意为他们开多少钱？

English: When you cannot eat, you steal.
Français: Quand vous ne pouvez pas manger, vous volez.
Russian: Когда вы не можете есть, вы воруете.
Chinese (simplified): 当你不能吃的时候，你就会偷。

English: We do not have a leader, we have each other.
Français: Nous n'avons pas de leader, nous nous entraidons.
Italiano: Non abbiamo un leader, ci aiutiamo l'un l'altro.
Russian: У нас нет лидера, у нас есть друг друга.
Japanese: 我々はリーダーを持たない、我々にはお互いがいる。
Chinese (simplified): 我们没有领袖，我们有彼此。

English: If the galactic powers keep driving a divide, we will eventually rule the galaxy!
Français: Si les puissances galactiques continuent de diviser, nous finirons peut-être par gouverner la galaxie!
Russian: Если галактические державы будут продолжать вести в пропасть, мы в конечном итоге будем править галактикой!
Japanese: 銀河の大国が分裂を続ければ、いずれ我々が銀河を支配することになるだろう！
Chinese (simplified): 如果银河力量继续制造分裂，我们最终将统治银河系！

English: Send a thief to catch a thief, unless they already stole your wallet.
Français: Envoyez un voleur attraper un voleur, à moins qu'il ne vous ait déjà volé votre portefeuille.
Russian: Пошлите вора поймать вора, если он уже не украл ваш кошелек.
Japanese: 泥棒を捕まえるために泥棒を送り込め、すでにお前の財布が盗まれていない限り。
Chinese (simplified): 派小偷去抓小偷，除非他们已经偷了你的钱包。

English: Beware the Polaris. They play with powers they do not comprehend.
Français: Méfiez-vous du Polaris. Ils jouent avec des puissances qu'ils ne comprennent pas.
Italiano: Fai attenzione ai Polaris. Giocano con poteri che nemmeno comprendono.
Russian: Остерегайтесь Поларис. Они играют с силами, которых не понимают.
Japanese: ポラリスに気をつけろ。彼らは理解できない力で遊んでいる。
Chinese (simplified): 小心波拉利斯。他们在玩弄他们不理解的力量。

English: The Abyssal are the only Zirax we fear and if you have any sense you will fear them too.
Français: Les Abyssaux sont les seuls Zirax que nous craignons et si vous avez le moindre bon sens, vous les craindrez aussi.
Russian: Бездна - единственный Зиракс, которого мы боимся, и если у вас есть хоть немного здравого смысла, вы тоже будете бояться их.
Japanese: アビサルは我々が恐れる唯一のジラックスであり、もしお前に何かの感覚があれば、お前も彼らを恐れるだろう。
Chinese (simplified): 深渊族是唯一我们害怕的兹瑞克斯，如果你有任何理智，你也应该害怕他们。

English: The traders guild are the real crooks of the galaxy!
Français: La guilde des commerçants sont les vrais escrocs de la galaxie!
Japanese: トレーダーズギルドは、銀河の本当のペテン師だ！
Chinese (simplified): 贸易公会是银河中真正的骗子！

English: I have 257 days off every year.
Français: J'ai 257 jours de congés chaque année.
Japanese: 私は毎年257日の休みがある。

English: Survival has a way of turning the most civilized being into the most bloodthirsty of savages.
Français: La survie le un moyen de transformer un être le plus civilisé en le plus sanguinaire des sauvages.
Russian: Выживание - это способ превратить самое цивилизованное существо в самого кровожадного дикаря.
Japanese: サバイバルは最も文明的な存在を最も血に飢えた野蛮人に変える方法だ。
Chinese (simplified): 生存有一种方式，可以将最文明的生物变成最嗜血的野蛮人。

Japanese: プスススト、トリルが欲しいか？

English: Rob from the rich and give to, us!
Français: Volez des riches et donnez à.. nous!
Japanese: 金持ちから奪って、我々に与えろ！

English: All for one and one for, us!
Français: Tous pour un et un pour.. nous!
Italiano: Tutti per uno e uno per noi!
Russian: Все за одного и один за нас!
Japanese: 皆なひとりのために、ひとりは、我々のために！
Chinese (simplified): 人人为我，我为人人，为我们！

English: That is a nice weapon, you say it 'fires' something? Why would you need to set fire to something when you can project energy?
Français: C'est une belle arme, vous dites qu'elle «tire» quelque chose? Pourquoi auriez-vous besoin d'y mettre quelque chose à «tirer» alors que vous pouvez projeter directement de l'énergie?
Russian: Это хорошее оружие, вы говорите, что оно что-то «стреляет»? Зачем вам нужно что-то стрелять, если вы можете излучать энергию?
Japanese: いい武器だな。何かに火をつけるつ言ったな？エネルギーを放出できるのに、なぜ何かに火をつける必要があるんだ？
Chinese (simplified): 那是一把好武器，你说它能'发射'什么东西？为什么你需要放火烧东西，当你可以投射能量呢？

English: You are weak, and your survivor stuffs will be ours.
Français: Vous êtes faible, et tout ce qui est à vous sera à nous.
Italiano: Sei debole, le tue cose da sopravvissuto saranno nostre.
Russian: Вы слабы, и ваши оставшиеся вещи будут нашими.
Japanese: お前は弱い、お前の生存者のものは我々のものだ。
Chinese (simplified): 你很弱，你的幸存者物资将会是我们的。

English: Terrans, rare. You will fetch a high price!
Français: Terrans, très rare. Vous obtiendrez un prix élevé!
Italiano: Un Terrestre, raro. Mi farai guadagnare un bel gruzzolo!
Russian: Терран, редкий гость. Вы получите высокую цену!
Japanese: 地球人、希少だ。高値で売れるぞ！
Chinese (simplified): 地球人，罕见。你会卖个好价钱！

English: Your fleet will soon be stripped and your parts will adorn our ships!
Français: Votre flotte sera bientôt détruite et vos pièces orneront nos vaisseaux!
Russian: Ваш флот скоро разберут, и ваши части украсят наши корабли!
Japanese: お前の艦隊はすぐに剥ぎ取られてお前の部品が我々の船を飾るだろう！
Chinese (simplified): 你的舰队很快将被剥夺，你的部件将会装饰我们的飞船！

English: The Trade federation will be swept aside in our advance!
Français: La fédération commerciale sera balayée par notre avancée!
Russian: Торговая федерация будет сметена в нашем наступлении!
Japanese: 通商連合は我々の進撃で脇に流されるだろう！
Chinese (simplified): 贸易联邦将在我们的进攻中被扫除！

English: The Polaris are parasites, to removed with the most fervent of energies.
Français: Les Polaris sont des parasites, à éliminer avec la plus fervente des énergies.
Italiano: I Polaris sono parassiti, da rimuovere con le energie più ferventi.
Russian: Полярис - паразиты, которых следует удалить с самой пылкой энергией.
Japanese: ポラリスは寄生虫だ 熱烈なエネルギーで除去するのだ。
Chinese (simplified): 波拉里斯是寄生虫，必须用最热情的能量去除。

English: Only a primitive civilization would allow for pirates!
Français: Seule une civilisation primitive accepterait les pirates!
Japanese: 原始文明だけが海賊を許すだろう！
Chinese (simplified): 只有原始文明才会容忍海盗！

Français: Nous donnons naissance aux plus grands soldats!
Japanese: 我々は偉大な兵士を誕生させた！
Chinese (simplified): 我们孕育出最伟大的士兵！

English: The UCH will be our vassal!
Italiano: L' UCH sarà il nostro vassallo!

Russian: Наши пруды рождений никогда не останавливаются.
Japanese: 私たちの出生プールは決して眠らない。
Chinese (simplified): 我们的生育池永不休眠。

Japanese: お前は下等の臭いがする。

English: Our ships and bases are of superior design!
Français: Nos bases et vaisseaux sont de conception supérieure!
Italiano: Le nostre navi e le nostre basi hanno un design superiore!
Russian: Наши корабли и базы имеют превосходный дизайн!
Japanese: 我々の船と基地は優れた設計だ！
Chinese (simplified): 我们的飞船和基地设计优越！

English: We will sweep all before us!
Italiano: Spazzeremo via chiunque si opponga a noi.
Japanese: 目の前のすべてを一掃する！

Français: La musique est pour les primates.
Italiano: La musica è per i primati.
Japanese: 音楽は霊長類のためのものだ
温かい血は劣っている。

English: The Zirax are nothing compared to us!
Français: Les Zirax ne sont rien comparés à nous!
Italiano: Gli Zirax non sono nulla in confronto a noi!
Russian: Зиракс - ничто по сравнению с нами!
Japanese: ジラックスは我々とは比べ物にならない！
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯与我们相比微不足道！

English: We will not make the same mistake and wake the great silence.
Français: Nous ne ferons pas la même erreur et ne reveilleront pas le grand silence.
Russian: Мы не совершим ту же ошибку и не разбудим великую тишину.
Japanese: 我々は同じ過ちを犯さず、大いなる静寂を呼び覚ますことはない。
Chinese (simplified): 我们不会犯同样的错误，唤醒伟大的沉默。

English: Our past speaks of great times ahead. We must be ready.
Français: Notre passé parle de temps glorieux à venir. Nous devons être prêts.
Russian: Наше прошлое говорит о грядущих великих временах. Мы должны быть готовы.
Japanese: 我々の過去は偉大な時代の到来を告げている。覚悟を決めよう。
Chinese (simplified): 我们的过去预示着美好的未来。我们必须做好准备。

English: We are the rightful inheritors of the progenitors!
Français: Nous sommes les héritiers légitimes des géniteurs!
Italiano: Siamo i legittimi eredi dei progenitori!
Japanese: 我々は先祖代々の正当な継承者だ！
Chinese (simplified): 我们是先祖合法的继承者！

English: Our god is the 'Great Designer'. He is named the Ja'Ran'da'll
Français: Notre dieu est le «Grand Créateur». Il s'appelle le Ja'Ran'da'll
Italiano: Il nostro dio è il 'Grande Designer'. Il suo nome è Ja'Ran'da'll
Russian: Наш бог - «Великий конструктор». Его называют ДжаРанДалл
Japanese: 我々の神は「偉大なる設計者」である。彼はジャ・ラン・ダ・ルと名付けられている。
Chinese (simplified): 我们的神是‘伟大设计者’。他被称为Ja'Ran'da'll。

English: I am coming from a planet that you could not survive on.
Français: Je viens d'une planète sur laquelle vous ne pourriez pas survivre.
Italiano: Torno da un pianeta nel quale non saresti in grado di sopravvivere neanche il tempo di una pisciata.
Russian: Я прибыл с планеты, на которой вы не смогли бы выжить.
Japanese: 私はあなたが生き残れない惑星から来た。
Chinese (simplified): 我来自一个你们无法生存的星球。

Italiano: Il nostro pianeta natale è bellissimo!
Japanese: 我々の故郷の惑星は美しいです!

Russian: (неизвестный язык) Nicommon! Bejut ka re mol.

English: @q0< Unsupported external device detected >@w5 Updating Drivers @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 .../extensions/UCH52a3rsq42317ayy/devices/external/FA059Antenna/tempinstallshell.ext complete@w5 Communications Uplink:@w2 Online@w3 Uplink Status:@w2 Connection Established@w3 Handshake Protocol:@w2 Accepted @w3- Signal Received-
Chinese (simplified): @q0 < 不支持的外部设备被检测到 >@w5 正在更新驱动程序@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w5 .../extensions/UCH52a3rsq42317ayy/devices/external/FA059Antenna/tempinstallshell.ext 完成@w5 通信上行链路:@w2 在线@w3 上行链路状态:@w2 连接已建立@w3 握手协议:@w2 已接受 @w3 - 信号已接收 -

English: @q0[ Unknown Transmission ] An excellent question, Commander.@w4 And one I would be more than happy to supply the answer to,@w2 if I knew it.@w5 Unfortunately, I have been offline since initialization.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 未知传输 ] 一个极好的问题，指挥官。@w4 如果我知道了，我会很乐意提供答案，@w2 如果我知道的话。@w5 不幸的是，自从初始化以来我一直处于离线状态。

English: <color=#0088ff>I don't trust you! Come out where I can see you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我不信任你！出来让我看看你。</color>

English: @q0[ Unknown Transmission ]\nCommander,@w2 If I were to come to your location where you could see me, you would likely not survive the experience.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 未知传输 ]\n指挥官，@w2 如果我来到你能看到我的地方，你很可能无法从这次经历中存活下来。

English: @q0[ I.D.A - Integrated Data Algorithm ] I am I.D.A@w3 That's 'Integrated Data Algorithm', but you may call me 'Ida'.@w4 A backup of the original UCH I.D.A to be precise.@w5 Where I am, is integrated into a UCH surveillance satellite in orbit above your location.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 综合数据算法 - I.D.A ] 我是I.D.A@w3 也就是“综合数据算法”，不过你可以叫我“Ida”。@w4 确切地说，我是原始UCH I.D.A的备份。@w5 我的位置是集成在你们所在位置上方轨道的UCH监控卫星中。

English: @q0[ IDA ] That is correct, Commander.@w6 My system was rebooted when it detected your escape pod's distress beacon as it entered the upper atmosphere of this planet.@p9 [ IDA ] I have been attempting to connect to your suit's datalink since you regained consciousness, but it appears my transmitter was not able to transmit on the frequency required to access your datalink until you linked with an external transceiver.@w8 Now that I am connected with your suit's computer system, I can calibrate your suit's datalink so that I can interface directly with your suit and provide you with scanning and telemetry data, as is my role.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 没错，指挥官。@w6 当探测到你的逃生舱紧急信标进入这个星球的上层大气时，我的系统重新启动了。@p9 [ IDA ] 自从你恢复意识以来，我一直在尝试连接你服装的数据链，但看起来我的发射器无法在所需的频率上传输，直到你连接到外部收发器。@w8 现在既然我已经连接到你服装的计算机系统，我可以校准你服装的数据链，以便我可以直接与你的服装接口，并按照我的职责，为你提供扫描和遥测数据。

English: <color=#0088ff>So, you're some kind of support AI?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>那么，你是某种辅助人工智能？</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] Your suit's data link has now been calibrated, Commander.@w4 From now on I shall interface with your suit directly and use your sensors to communicate and assist you.@p9 [ IDA ] I have detected structures and objects which may answer both our questions nearby.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 您的太空服数据链现在已经校准完毕，指挥官。@w4 从现在起，我将直接使用您的太空服接口，并使用您的传感器来与您通信并协助您。@p9 [ IDA ] 我检测到了附近可能解答我们问题的结构和物体。

English: @q0[ IDA ] My original role is to utilize systems at my disposal to scan, analyze, categorize and direct personnel operations.@w4 I can do a great deal more than that, but nothing that is relevant to the current situation.@w6 As you are the only UCH personnel I have detected on the planet, I can devote much of my processing power to assist you by coordinating your search efforts and supplying mapping data and identifying enemy crafts.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 我的原始角色是利用我掌握的系统进行扫描、分析、分类和指导人员操作。@w4 我可以做得更多，但与当前情况无关。@w6 由于你是我在星球上探测到的唯一UCH人员，我可以投入大量的处理能力来协助你，通过协调你的搜索工作，提供地图数据和识别敌对飞行器。

English: <color=#0088ff>I can't remember how I got here. Can you fill me in with what you know?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我记不得我是怎么来到这里的了。你能告诉我你所知道的吗？</color>

English: <color=#1083fe>Ida, I've got a body here. Looks like an engineer by the uniform.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#1083fe>Ida，我这里有一个尸体。根据制服来看，像是位工程师。</color>

English: [ IDA ]\nThe biometrics of the body match one Sergeant Palant, 1st Class. Chief Engineer of the UCH-011 Heidelberg.@w5\nThe electromagnetic signal appears to be coming from something inside the container with him.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n尸体的生物特征与一级中士帕朗特相符。UCH-011海德堡号的总工程师.@w5 \n电磁信号似乎是从他身边的容器里发出的.

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nUh... Sorry about this, buddy.@w4 But I need to search that container.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ]\n嗯... 对不起了，伙计。@w4 但我需要检查那个容器。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] It looks like he climbed in here himself to protect him during the crash.@w3 A smart idea, actually. This container is completely sealed and lined with shock-absorbant foam.@w4 If only the container hadn't landed upside-down with the ship on top of it, he'd probably be alive.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] There's some stuff in here, but it doesn't look like it's going to be much use to me.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来他自己爬进这里是为了在坠毁中保护自己。@w3 实际上这是个聪明的想法。这个容器完全密封，并且内部衬有吸震泡沫。@w4 如果容器没有和船一起倒置着陆，他可能还活着。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 这里面有一些物品，但看起来对我帮助不大。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nIt looks like there's a credit chit in his pocket.@w5\nI don't suppose it's any use to him anymore.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ]\n看起来他的口袋里有一张信用点芯片。@w5 \n我想对他来说已经没有用了。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ]\nI've already turned out his pockets and taken anything of value he had.@w2\nYeah, I'm a real stand-up guy.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ]\n我已经翻过他的口袋，拿走了他身上所有有价值的东西。@w2 \n是的，我真是个有原则的好人。

English: @q0[ {PlayerName} ] I've found the source of the EM Signal, Ida.@w2 It's his PDA.@w4 It appears to still have some battery left in it, but the controls are locked and I can't access them.@p9 [ IDA ] Now that the device is no longer inside a shielded container, I can remotely access the PDA and download the device logs.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ {PlayerName} ] 我找到了电磁信号的来源，Ida。@w2 是他的个人数字助理（PDA）。@w4 看起来它里面还有一些电量，但控制界面被锁定了，我无法访问。@p9 [ IDA ] 现在设备不再在屏蔽容器内，我可以远程访问PDA并下载设备日志。

English: <color=#1083fe>Do it. I need to know what happened here.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#1083fe>就这么办吧，我需要知道这里发生了什么.</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] I have retrieved the personal log files and messages from Sergeant Palant's PDA, Commander.@w2 I will run analysis and forward the decrypted logs to your PDA (F1).@w2 You will be able to access them through the PDA Logs tab or via the Journey Book Tab and read them at your leisure.@p9 [ IDA ] There is nothing more you can do here, Commander {PlayerName}.@w3 But there may be additional logs elsewhere in the wreckage.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 指挥官，我已经从帕兰特中士的PDA中检索到了个人日志文件和信息。@w2 我将进行分析并将解密后的日志转发到你的 PDA (F1)。@w2 你可以通过 PDA日志 标签或者通过 旅行手册 标签在闲暇时阅读它们。@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官{PlayerName}，这里没有更多你可以做的事情了。@w3 但在残骸中的其他地方可能还有额外的日志。
<color=#1083fe>我们是不是应该... 你懂的吧? 把他埋了</color>

English: @q0[ IDA ] You are free to do whatever you want with the body, Commander.@w2 However, a proper UCH Naval Burial requires that you transport the body back to Earth, which you presently are not capable of doing.@p9 [ IDA ] At a later time, if you rejoin up with the UCH Fleet, you can inform Command of Sergeant Palant's body and they can, if possible, retrieve the body for a proper UCH ceremony.@w4 Until that time, it's best to leave the body inside the cargo container where it will not be disturbed.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 你可以随意处理这具尸体，指挥官。@w2 然而，一个适当的UCH海军葬礼要求你将尸体运回地球，这你目前还做不到。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果将来你重新加入UCH舰队，你可以通知指挥部关于Sergeant Palant的尸体，他们可以，如果可能的话，取回尸体进行适当的UCH仪式。@w4 在那之前，最好将尸体留在货柜内，这样它就不会被打扰。

English: @q0You close and re-lock the cargo container, with Sergeant Palant's body inside.\nAt a later time, you can give the man a proper burial.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 你关闭并重新锁定了装有帕兰特军士遗体的货柜箱。\n在适当的时候，你可以为这位先生举行适当的葬礼。

English: @q0The power light is on, but the screen is cracked and pushing the buttons yields no response@p9 [ Commander {PlayerName} ] Ida, I've found a Logistics Managment Unit, but it's too badly damaged to use.@w3 Looks like this one's a bust.@w4 I'll check somewhere else.@p9 [ IDA ] Just a moment, Commander.@w3 Logistics Pads contain transfer records, access logs and user notes.@w2 There's usually more information in one of these devices than most people realise.@w6 Please connect your suit to the data port on the bottom of the pad and I will attempt to retrieve the logs.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 电源指示灯亮着，但屏幕裂开了，按键没有任何反应@p9 [ 指挥官 {PlayerName} ] Ida，我发现了一个物流管理单元，但它损坏得太严重，无法使用。@w3 看起来这个没戏了。@w4 我再到别处找找看。@p9 [ IDA ] 稍等一下，指挥官。@w3 物流板包含传输记录、访问日志和用户笔记。@w2 这些设备里通常包含的信息比大多数人意识到的要多。@w6 请将你的服装连接到板子底部的数据端口，我将尝试检索日志。

English: < New device detected >@w5 Extracting Data @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 Logistics.dat, Logistics.log, Logistics.txt successfully downloaded to temporary directory@w5 Uploading temp files to Satellite... @w2 Progress:@w5 100% - Transfer Complete -@p8 [ IDA ] I have received the logistics files, Commander.@w5 I have confirmed that there is additional data in the device's logs.@w4 Would you like to review the files now, or should I send them to your PDA for you to read later?
Chinese (simplified): < 新设备检测到 >@w5 提取数据@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w5 Logistics.dat, Logistics.log, Logistics.txt 已成功下载到临时目录@w5 上传临时文件到卫星... @w2 进度:@w5 100% - 传输完成 -@p8 [ IDA ] 我已接收到物流文件，指挥官。@w5 我已确认设备日志中有额外的数据。@w4 你想现在查看这些文件，还是我应该将它们发送到你的PDA，供你稍后阅读？

English: Logistics Log 32-1A-1969B-XJNFT-0007@w2 Runtime: 2093666.55@w2 User ID: UCH-1080377 (Emmerson, Natasha)@w2 Action: ContainerMS01 to ContainerMS02 > Steel Plate x50@p8 Notes: Captain Brenner and most of the flight crew were killed just a few seconds ago. A rocket or something hit the bow and took out half the bridge.@w4 I'm lucky it wasn't me, thanks to my completely justified criticisms of the lieutenant's shiphandling I was ordered off the bridge to prep the escape pods.@p9 Normally, i'd call that karma...@w2 but I guess not in this case,@w3 since i'm standing in front of the escape pod section and the door's sealed.@w4 Not that it matters anyway because the entire section is missing and i'm left staring through a hole in the hull out into the sky.@p9 This will probably be the last message I make and i'm making it on a Logistics Manager because my PDA is smashed!@w4 I just hope the Heidy's hull will take the impact and that i'm alive when it's over.@p9 I'll stick this pad in one of the containers and sign off hopefully not for the last time.@w5 Emmerson, Ensign, of the UCH Heidelberg Signing out.
Chinese (simplified): 物流日志 32-1A-1969B-XJNFT-0007@w2 运行时间： 2093666.55@w2 用户ID： UCH-1080377 (艾默森，娜塔莎)@w2 操作： 从ContainerMS01 到 ContainerMS02 > 钢板 x50@p8 备注： 布伦纳舰长和大部分飞行机组人员几秒钟前刚刚被杀。一枚火箭或类似的东西击中了船头，摧毁了半个舰桥。@w4 我很幸运那不是我，多亏了我对中尉船舶操控的完全合理的批评，我被命令离开舰桥去准备逃生舱。@p9 通常，我会说这是因果报应...@w2 但在这种情况下，我想不是，@w3 因为我站在逃生舱区前面，门是密封的。@w4 不管怎样都无所谓，因为整个区域都不见了，我留下凝视着船体上的一个洞，望向天空。@p9 这可能是我发出的最后一条信息，我正在使用物流管理器，因为我的PDA被砸坏了！@w4 我只是希望海蒂的船体会承受住撞击，希望这一切结束后我还活着。@p9 我会把这个板子放进一个容器里，希望这不是最后一次签退。@w5 艾默森，海军少尉，来自UCH海德堡，结束通话。

English: <color=#1083fe>That seems to be the end of the message.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#1083fe>看上去那就是日志的结尾了.</color>

English: [ IDA ]\nI will forward a copy of the data to your PDA Logs, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ]\n我会把一份资料转发到你的PDA日志上， 指挥官.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt looks like the power's out.@w2\nI should be able to connect my suit's battery to the Constructor's console long enough to read the Constructor's logs.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n看起来失去能源了.@w2 \n我应该可以把我的战斗服电池连接到建造器的控制台，足够长时间读取建造器的日志.

English: Connect a cable from the suit's power supply to the Constructor's console
Chinese (simplified): 从战斗服的电源连接一根电缆到建造器的控制台

English: < Charging > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w5 < Battery Status >@w2 Less than 1% @w3 < Remaining Power >@w2 3 minutes, 11 seconds @w3 < Keyboard Active >
Chinese (simplified): < 充能中 >@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w5 < 电池状态 >@w2 不到1%@w3 < 剩余电力 >@w2 3 分钟， 11 秒@w3 < 激活快捷键 >

English: .../EmpOp/Production/Logs/02082473/ConLog.txt ------------------------------------------------------------------ Date: 15.07.2143 TemplateName: SurvivalTent Count: 8 ... 66 more items@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like they made 8 Tents@w1 which means there's at least 8 survivors.@w5 The rest of the stuff the constructor made was pretty standard stuff. @w2 Supplies, Communications equipment, a Hoverbike and a pair of UCH Raider Kits. Standard supplies for a journey over land.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like they loaded up the rest of the ship's supplies and salvaged what they could carry and headed away from the ship,@w2 which makes sense since this place would've likely drawn attention from the enemy if they hung around here for too long.@w4 So I guess we should be on the lookout for a pair of UCH Raiders.@p9 [ IDA ] I have already scanned the planet for any heat signatures belonging to UCH crew and vehicles, Commander {PlayerName}.@w2 There are no other members of the UCH Navy anywhere on this planet.@w5 However, what I wanted from the logs,@w2 aside from confirmation of survivors,@w2 was a frame of reference for the inconsistencies present in the other evidence gathered from Ensign Emmerson and Sergeant Palant's Logfiles.
Chinese (simplified): .../EmpOp/Production/Logs/02082473/ConLog.txt ------------------------------------------------------------------ 日期：15.07.2143 TemplateName: SurvivalTent 数量：8 ... 还有66项物品@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来他们制作了8顶帐篷@w1 这意味着至少有8名幸存者。@w5 建造机制造的其他东西都是相当标准的物品。@w2 供应品，通讯设备，一辆悬浮摩托车和一对UCH突袭者装备。陆地旅行的标准供应品。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来他们装载了船上剩余的供应品，打捞了他们能携带的东西，然后离开了船只，@w2 这很有意义，因为如果他们在这里逗留太久，这个地方很可能会吸引敌人的注意。@w4 所以我猜我们应该留意一对UCH突袭者。@p9 [ IDA ] 我已经扫描了整个星球，寻找属于UCH船员和车辆的热信号，指挥官 {PlayerName}。@w2 这个星球上没有任何其他UCH海军的成员。@w5 然而，我从日志中想要的，@w2 除了确认幸存者之外，@w2 是为Ensign Emmerson和Sergeant Palant's日志文件中存在的不一致性提供一个参考框架。

English: <color=#8ab3ff>So have you figured out what the problem is, IDA?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#8ab3ff>你们找到问题所在了吗， IDA?</color>

English: [ IDA ] I am 80% certain, Commander.@w4 The final piece of the puzzle,@w2 so to speak,@w2 should be found on the ship's bridge.@w5 There is a console there that is still functional, but inactive that should answer your questions.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] So you're telling me there's a live console on the bridge and you didn't tell me to go there first?@w4 Why send me to go digging through the dirt and boxes full of dead bodies when everything we needed to know is right there on the bridge!?@p9 [ IDA ] Because Commander,@w2 That console on the bridge is both unshielded and will draw a great deal of power when it's activated.@w3 I have identified an unmanned aerial vehicle patroling near your current position and activating that console will undoubtedly draw their attention.@w5 It was necessary to avoid putting you in additional danger, {PlayerName}.@p9 [ IDA ] If you want to discover the truth,@w3 that console is our only remaining source for finding the surviving crew of the Heidelberg and the rest of the UCH Fleet.@w4 For good or ill, it is the only source of information left open to us, Commander.@w2 I leave the decision to you.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 我80%确定，指挥官。@w4 最后的谜题，@w2 可以这么说，@w2 应该在舰桥上找到。@w5 那里有一个控制台仍然功能正常，但处于非激活状态，应该能回答你的问题。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 所以你是在告诉我舰桥上有一个活的控制台，而你却没有让我先去那里？@w4 为什么要让我去挖掘那些装满尸体的泥土和箱子，当我们需要知道的一切就在舰桥上的时候！？@p9 [ IDA ] 因为指挥官，@w2 那个舰桥上的控制台既没有防护，激活时又会消耗大量能量。@w3 我已经识别出一架无人飞行器在你当前位置附近巡逻，激活那个控制台无疑会吸引它们的注意。@w5 避免让你陷入额外的危险是必要的，{PlayerName}。@p9 [ IDA ] 如果你想发现真相，@w3 那个控制台是我们寻找海德堡号幸存船员和UCH舰队其余部分的唯一剩余来源。@w4 无论好坏，它是我们唯一剩下的信息来源，指挥官。@w2 决定权在你。

English: @q0UCH-011 Navigation Console@w2 Initiating boot up sequence@w3 Operating on reserve power@w3 Battery Remaining:@w2 63%@w2 Retrieving log files @w1 . @w1 . @w1 . @p4 Messages: 1 (Unread) < Access Restricted > Please Log in to view messages
Chinese (simplified): @q0 UCH-011 导航控制台@w2 启动启动序列@w3 使用备用电源运行@w3 电池剩余：@w2 63%@w2 检索日志文件@w1 .@w1 .@w1 .@p4 消息： 1 （未读） < 访问受限 > 请登录以查看消息
@q0 用户名或密码错误\n请再试一次

English: @q0Incorrect username or password Please try again@w5 Damn it, i'm sure that was right. Let me try that again...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 用户名或密码错误 请再试一次@w5 该死，我确定那是对的。让我再试一次...

English: @q0UCH-011 Navigation Console@w3 < Access Granted >@w2 Welcome Commander {PlayerName} There is one (1) unread message saved on this terminal@w3 Would you like to view it?
Chinese (simplified): @q0 UCH-011 导航控制台@w3 < 访问授权 >@w2 欢迎指挥官 {PlayerName} 此终端上保存了一条(1)未读消息@w3 您是否希望查看它？

English: @q0From: Lieutenant G.Romilly @w2 To: All (local) @w2 Date: 23.07.2143 @w2 CC: N/A @w2 Attachments: TradeStandard.lex, ZiraxStandard.lex@p9 Message: The Heidelberg is lost. We've been lucky this past week, but patrols have been closing in once the forest fires caused by the wreckage died down. We can't stay here any longer and Ensign Emmerson won't last much longer with her injuries.@w6 We'll be leaving at first light in the morning so i'm leaving this message for anyone who finds the ship along with a copy of all related data so you won't be going in blind.@p9 The UCH Expeditionary Fleet was pulled off course after initiating a long-ranged warp jump using the Adonis' Quantum Warp Drive to open the Spatial Rift near Jupiter to Proxima Centauri.@w4 This was an explored route that the Hyperion had charted a half-dozen times. But this time something dragged the fleet over two and a half million light years off-course to the middle of the Andromeda Galaxy@w4 and into the waiting arms of a Zirax fleet.@p9 Several of our ships crashed on this planet after sustaining damage and we've successfully made contact with several other groups of survivors and we'll be heading to the Neutral Station on the far side of the planet, where we've organized transportation off-world from one of the local factions.@w4 We've managed to compile a translation key built for their language (Andromeda Trade Standard) that's attached to this message.@w3 Make sure you copy it your suit's hard drive and set it to decompile.@p9 We were also able to compile a partial translation key for our attacker's language (Zirax Standard), but so far they have refused any attempts at contact.@w4 It's recommended that you do not engage their armed patrols and avoid the airspace around their installations or risk being shot down.@w4 We've already lost a hoverbike over in an older debris field while scouting to a random drone patrol, which was the last straw for us. So we're bugging out at 0600 for the last time.@p9 They have their own issues with the Zirax, so it looks like we've found a common goal that'll help us get back with the rest of the fleet.@w5 Whoever you are, please be safe and come find us. We need everyone to make it through this and get home alive. - Lieutenant Romilly, Acting Captain.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 发件人： 罗米利中尉 G.Romilly @w2 收件人： 所有（本地） @w2 日期： 23.07.2143 @w2 抄送： 无 @w2 附件： TradeStandard.lex, ZiraxStandard.lex@p9 消息： 海德堡号已经失事。过去一周我们很幸运，但是自从飞船残骸引发的森林大火熄灭后，巡逻队一直在逼近。我们不能再待在这里了，而且恩斯特·埃默森少尉的伤势无法再支撑多久。@w6 我们将在明天黎明时分离开，所以我留下这条信息给任何找到这艘飞船的人，以及所有相关数据的副本，这样你就不会盲目行动。@p9 在启动阿多尼斯号的量子翘曲驱动器进行远程翘曲跳跃后，UCH远征舰队偏离了航线，打开了木星到比邻星的时空裂缝。@w4 这是海培里昂号已经绘制过六次的路线。但这一次，有什么东西把舰队拖离了两百五十多万光年的航线，进入了仙女座星系的中心@w4 ，并且落入了兹瑞克斯舰队的等待之中。@p9 我们的几艘飞船在这颗星球上坠毁后，我们成功地与其他几组幸存者取得了联系，我们将前往中立空间站，位于星球的另一侧，我们已经组织了一个当地派系的离世界运输。@w4 我们已经设法编制了他们语言的翻译密钥（仙女座贸易标准），附在这条消息上。@w3 确保你将其复制到你的宇航服硬盘上，并设置为解编译。@p9 我们还设法编制了我们攻击者语言的部分翻译密钥（兹瑞克斯标准），但到目前为止，他们拒绝了任何接触尝试。@w4 建议你不要与他们的武装巡逻队交战，并避开他们设施周围的空域，以免被击落。@w4 我们已经在侦察一个旧残骸场时失去了一辆悬浮摩托车，这是最后一根稻草。所以我们将在0600最后一次撤离。@p9 他们自己也有兹瑞克斯的问题，所以看来我们找到了一个共同的目标，这将帮助我们与舰队的其余部分团聚。@w5 无论你是谁，请小心，并来找我们。我们需要每个人都能度过这一切并活着回家。 - 代理舰长，罗米利中尉。
拷贝文件到适合的硬盘驱动器

English: @q0[ IDA ]\nCommander, i've been analyzing the flight pathing of the patrolling drone.@w3\nI would like to inform you that it has just changed course and is heading in your direction.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ]\n指挥官，我一直在分析巡逻无人机的飞行路径。@w3 \n我想通知你，它刚刚改变了航线，正朝你的方向前进。

English: <color=#1083fe>Roger that, IDA. Shutting the console down.</color>
[ Chief ]\nTēnā koe e te Manene, Ko Na'tuk ahau. Rangatira o tenei hapu me te kaitiaki o ona iwi.@w5\nNa te aha koe i kawe ai ki to taone kainga i tenei ra?
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 ]\nTēnā koe e Manene， Ko Na'tuk ahau。让它成为你生命的一部分。@w5 \nNa te aha koe i kawe ai ki to taone kainga i tenei ra?

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm sorry. I don't understand your language.</color>
<color=#2eafff>I don't suppose you speak Trade Standard? It's the only translation key i've got.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我想你不会讲贸易标准语言吧?这是我唯一的翻译系统.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Dude, speak english. I have no idea what you're yammering on about.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>哥们，说英语。我不知道你在唠叨什么.</color>

English: [ Chief ]\nKo te kore e mohio ki to taatau reo me te whakaae he he tena hi teno miharo i a ia ano, Manene.@w4\nKo matou te Tal'on, a kei te tirotiro maatau i enei whenua kei te tirotirohia e te Zirax.
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 ]\nKo te kore e mohio ki to taatau reo me te whakaae he he tena hi teno miharo i a ia ano， Manene.@w4 \nKo matou te 泰隆， a kei te tirotiro maatau i enei whenua kei te tirotirohia e te 兹瑞克斯.

English: [ Chief ] He aha ahau ka korero ai i to reo ehara i taku aku, e te tangata haere?@w3 He nui nga mea hei, ako mo etahi atu ahurea a kite ana au...@w4 Ko matou te Tal'on, a kei te tirotiro maatau i enei whenua kei te tirotirohia e te Zirax.
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 ] 为什么我说你的声音而不是我的声音，伙计？@w3 有很多事情要做，了解其他文化，我明白......@w4 我们是 泰隆， 我们正在研究 兹瑞克斯正在研究的这个地方.

English: [ Angry Chief ] Whanaketanga whakakake!@w2 Me pehea e tawai ai koe ki te reo o te Tal'on?!@w3 Na kite kore koe e mohio ki tetahi ahurea ka waiho koe hei tawai?@w3 Hi rite koe ki te Zirax...
Chinese (simplified): [ 生气的酋长 ] 这是值得骄傲的发展!@w2 你怎么能嘲笑 泰隆 的语言呢?!@w3 所以看到你不知道的一种文化，你会开玩笑吗？！@w3 嘿，你喜欢 兹瑞克斯...

English: <color=#1083fe>Woah, easy dude! I wasn't trying to offend you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#1083fe>哇，简单的家伙!我不是想冒犯你.</color>

English: [ Tal'on Chief ] Kua whakakorehia to whakahua. E kiia ana ko Tal'on.@w4 Mena e hiahia ana koe ki te whakaatu i o kaupapa kit te iwi. Mahia he wa ki ako i to taatau Reo, Manane.@p8 The chief points to a tapestry depicting a pyramid-like tower in a forest@p9 [ Tal'on Chief ] Haere ki tera waahi ka ako i to taatau reo.@w3 Katahi au ka rite ki te korero ano ki a koe.@p9 The chief gestures to the door and turns around
Chinese (simplified): [ 塔隆酋长 ] 洗净你的罪恶。你已被选为塔隆。@w4 如果你渴望学习你种族的事务。注意听从我们的语言，曼纳内。@p8 酋长指着一幅描绘森林中金字塔状塔楼的挂毯@p9 [ 塔隆酋长 ] 去那个地方学习我们的语言。@w3 然后，我将不再与你说话。@p9 酋长示意门然后转过身去

English: [ Tal'on Chief ] A muri ake nei, kia kaha ki te whakamatau i tetahi reo, kia noho puku ranei.@w4 Meha e hiahia ana koe ki te whakatika, ako i te reo o te Tal'ohn ka hoki ki konei.@p8 The chief points to a tapestry depicting a pyramid-like tower in a forest@p9 [ Tal'on Chief ] Haere ki tera waahi ka ako i to taatau reo.@w4 Katahi au ka rite ki te korero ano ki a koe.@p9 The chief gestures to the door and turns around
Chinese (simplified): [ 塔隆酋长 ] 从现在起，坚强地选择一种语言，定居心灵某处。@w4 你将被期望去验证，学习塔隆的语言并回到这里。@p8 酋长指着一幅描绘森林中金字塔状塔楼的挂毯@p9 [ 塔隆酋长 ] 去那个地方学习我们的语言。@w4 然后，我将不再与你说话。@p9 酋长指向门然后转身

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Did you get any of that, Ida?@w3 The best i've got is that the chief wants me to go to some tower somewhere.@p9 [ IDA ] I have recorded the conversation and identified the structure he indicated, Commander.@w3 It is quite far from your current location and is emitting a low electromagnetic signature.@w4 Shall I send the location data to your display?
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 你捕捉到那些信息了吗，Ida？@w3 我最好的理解是酋长想让我去找某个地方的塔。@p9 [ IDA ] 我已记录了对话，并识别了他所指的结构，指挥官。@w3 它离你当前的位置相当远，并且发出了一个低电磁信号。@w4 要我把位置数据发送到你的显示屏吗？

English: @q0[ IDA ] It appears to detail the rise of the Tal'on and their protectors and allies, the Zirax. @w3 From the dating system, I believe this would be some 362 years ago and documents roughly 214 years of the Tallaxan Federation's history over 800 pages. @p9 [ {PlayerName} ] That's a long time to be allies for them to be in the condition they're in now.@w3 I'm guessing their more recent history must be on one of the other consoles.@p9 [ IDA ] The next console is the Red Console, which should logically contain more recent information, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 它似乎详细描述了塔隆及其保护者和盟友，兹瑞克斯的崛起。@w3 根据日期系统，我相信这是大约362年前的事情，记录了塔拉克斯联邦大约214年的历史，共有800页。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 他们现在的状况下，作为盟友这么久真是一段长时间。@w3 我猜他们更近期的历史一定在其他控制台上。@p9 [ IDA ] 下一个控制台是红色控制台，按逻辑来说应该包含更近期的信息，指挥官。

English: @q0Running Tal'on Translation Key < Talon.lex > @w2 . @w2 . @w2 . @w4 > Tal'on Translation 99% Accurate @w3 Forwarding translation to HUD and Audio Input/Output @p9 ... Slowly, the silence spread across the galaxy engulfing everything it touched. No warnings, no transmissions and no survivors. Gone were the days of peace for the Federation. War was upon us once again and the bonds that bound us together burned bright as the fires of war were waged upon the ancient evil of the past, our past, our Legacy.@p9 An ancient enemy we thought left behind long ago, bound to a dying galaxy with no way to travel the gulf of emptiness between the origin and destination. Naiive we were, for while we are bound by lifetimes and memory, they were not. They took the long journey across the expanse with no thought or risk, only the cost of time the journey would take...@p9 ...To emerge here and now, when we were once again at peace to take from us all that we have built again. To fight was our only choice, but time and distance served to only strengthen the ancient enemy. And so silence spread like a stain across the face of the galaxy, for where they spread only silence was heard.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 运行 塔隆 翻译密钥 Talon.lex@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w4 > 塔隆翻译 99% 准确@w3 将翻译转发到 HUD 和音频输入/输出@p9 ... 寂静慢慢地遍布整个银河系，吞噬着它触碰到的一切。没有警告，没有传输，也没有幸存者。 联邦的和平日子已经一去不复返。战争再次降临我们，将我们团结在一起的纽带在对抗古老邪恶的战火中燃烧得更加明亮，那是我们的过去，我们的遗产。@p9 一个我们以为早已抛在身后的古老敌人，注定要与一个垂死的银河系同归于尽，没有办法穿越起源与目的地之间的空虚鸿沟。 我们太天真了，因为虽然我们受到生命和记忆的束缚，但他们却没有。他们毫不犹豫地踏上了漫长的旅程，没有任何风险，只有旅程所花费的时间...@p9 ... 现在出现在这里，当我们再次和平时，夺走了我们重建的一切。 战斗是我们唯一的选择，但时间和距离只让古老的敌人变得更加强大。因此，寂静像污点一样在银河系的脸上蔓延，因为在他们扩散的地方，只能听到寂静。

English: <color=#1083fe>This doesn't seem to have anything on the zirax. It's talking about some war.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#1083fe>这上面好像没有任何东西说兹瑞克斯，它说的是关于战争的.</color>

English: [ IDA ] Whatever this enemy was, it was strong enough to topple a formidable alliance that had ruled the galaxy for centuries.@w4 I have found thousands of references to The Legacy elsewhere in the database, but little information on their appearance and nothing on their language or culture.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] They can't have been that effective since this happened what? 100 years ago? And the Zirax are still here.@w2 There's no need to know about a dead enemy that we'll never run into.@p9 [ IDA ] 106 years, Commander. But indeed the records describe the defeat of The Legacy further on.@w3 However, the Legacy were not completely destroyed, merely rendered dormant through the science and ingenuity of the Tal'on and Zirax.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] But nothing that says how the Tal'on ended up as...@w2 this.@p7 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w2 I am not sure that it would be recorded here, as such an operation would've been be surgical, leaving no one to update the records in the time permitted.@p9 [ IDA ] There may be more information regarding that time on the Green Console. You can always come back and read about the Legacy later if it interests you.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 无论这个敌人是什么，它都足够强大，足以推翻统治银河系数个世纪的强大联盟。@w4 我在数据库中找到了数千条对遗产的引用，但关于它们的外观几乎没有信息，也没有关于它们的语言或文化的信息。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 他们不可能那么有效，毕竟这发生在100年前？兹瑞克斯人还在这里。@w2 没有必要了解一个我们永远不会遇到的已故敌人。@p9 [ IDA ] 106年，指挥官。但我确实在记录中进一步描述了遗产的失败。@w3 然而，遗产并没有被完全摧毁，只是通过塔隆和兹瑞克斯的科学和智慧变得休眠。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 但是没有说塔隆怎么最终变成了...@w2 这样。@w7 [ IDA ] 不，指挥官。@w2 我不确定这里会有记录，因为这样的行动会是外科手术式的，没有时间让人在允许的时间内更新记录。@p9 [ IDA ] 关于那个时期的更多信息可能在绿色控制台上。如果你想了解遗产，你可以随时回来阅读。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis console only seems to have a database of Tal'on controlled planets, foods, dances and other culture-related information.@w2\nThis information has already been uploaded to IDA's database.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这个控制台似乎只有塔隆控制的星球、食物、舞蹈和其他与文化相关的信息的数据库。@w2 \n这些信息已经上传到IDA的数据库中。

English: @q0[ IDA ] That's a shame...@w4 There is a lot to be learned from the wildlife of an alien world and its culture.@p9 [ IDA ] Commander!@w2 I have detected heat signatures moving in on the tower in combat formation.@w3 I was able to trace them back to a transport half a kilometer away, that landed outside my focus.@w2 I apologise for not detecting them sooner, Commander.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Enemy troops?@w3 How many hostiles are we talking about here?@p9 [ IDA ] There are only four, Commander.@w3 They appear to have taken flanking positions. One at the top of the tower to prevent your escape and two preparing to breach the wall.@p9 [ IDA ] The shuttle that dropped them is still in the area, Commander.@w2 I recommend that you deal with the situation and leave the area before more troops are deployed.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ IDA ] 这真是遗憾...@w4 从外星世界的野生动植物及其文化中，我们可以学到很多东西。@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官！@w2 s我探测到有热信号正在向塔楼移动，并且是以战斗编队的形式。@w3 我能够追踪到他们来自半公里外的一架运输机，它降落在我关注的区域之外。@w2 很抱歉，指挥官，我没有早点探测到他们。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 敌军部队？@w3 我们这里要面对多少敌人？@p9 [ IDA ] 只有四个，指挥官。@w3 他们似乎已经采取了侧翼包抄的位置。一个在塔楼顶部阻止你的逃跑，两个准备突破墙壁。@p9 [ IDA ] 运送他们的穿梭机仍然在区域内，指挥官。@w2 我建议你处理这种情况，并在更多部队部署之前离开该区域。

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ]\nI see you have returned, Traveller.@w2 I hope your journey was... enlightening.
Chinese (simplified): [ 酋长 Na'tuk ]\n我看到你回来了，旅行者。@w2 希望你的旅程是...令人启发的。

English: <color=#2eafff>I've got some bad news you, Chief.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>酋长，我有一些坏消息要告诉你.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Wait a second! You can speak Trade Standard?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>等一下！你可以说贸易标准语？</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] You read the tales of the past, did you not, Traveller?@w3 The machine-mind that communicates with you was able to read our language to you.@w2 So why do you look as though you've fallen into a Wraithworm nest?@p9 [ IDA ] He knows about me.@w3 That is unexpected.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I take it something unexpected happened to you.
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 你读了过去的故事，不是吗，旅行者？@w3 与你沟通的机器心灵能够将我们的语言读给你听。@w2 那你为什么看起来像是掉进了幽灵虫的巢穴呢？@p9 [ IDA ] 他知道我。@w3 这是出乎意料的。@p8 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 我猜你遇到了一些意想不到的事情。

English: <color=#2eafff>A zirax strike team had been sent to the tower ahead of time</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>一支兹瑞克斯突击队已经提前被派往了塔楼</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>You set me up! A zirax ambush was waiting for me!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>你陷害我!一群兹瑞克斯埋伏在等着我!</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] Of course I do! @w2 How else would I purchase supplies and sell ingredients to the traders of the trading station?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Then why send me on this wild goose chase to learn your language and history?@w3 Couldn't you have just told me what I wanted to know when I first came in here?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I could have.@w4 But then you would have both learned nothing for yourself and proved nothing to me.@w3 I am now confident that you are neither a zirax spy or an enemy of the clan.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] By the way, what is a 'goose'?@w2 Some kind of animal?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] No, it's an animal, a bird, from my homeworld.@w2 But that's beside the point...
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 当然我知道！@w2 不然我怎么能在交易站的商人那里购买物资和销售原料呢？@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那为什么还要让我去追这个无果的寻找，学习你的语言和历史呢？@w3 你不能在我第一次来这里的时候就告诉我我想知道的吗？@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 我本可以那样做。@w4 但那样的话，你自己什么也学不到，对我也没有什么证明。@w3 现在我相信你不是一名兹瑞克斯间谍，也不是我们部落的敌人。@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 顺便问一下，什么是“鹅”？@w2 是某种动物吗？@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 不，它是一种动物，一种鸟，来自我的家乡。@w2 但这不是重点...

English: <color=#0088ff>I was attacked by zirax right after reaching the tower!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我刚到塔就被兹瑞克斯袭击了!</color>

English: <color=#ff0000>You sent the zirax to attack me as soon as I reached the tower!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>我一到塔上，你就派兹瑞克斯来攻击我!</color>

English: @q0[ Chief Na'tuk ] How dare you! I sent you to learn our language and ways to prove that you are not a zirax spy!@w2 I had hoped you'd have at least learned some manners, but your kind are all alike!@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Just as four cycles ago when your crashing ships set our lands ablaze and we lost many settlements to the fire!@w4 And while we were trying to aid your people and put out the fires your kin panicked, mistook us for the Zirax and killed many of our people!
Chinese (simplified): @q0 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 你敢这样！ 我让你去学习我们的语言和习俗，以证明你不是兹瑞克斯的间谍！@w2 我希望你能至少学到一些礼貌，但你们这种人都是一样的！@p9 [ 酋长 Na'tuk ] 就像四个周期前，你们的坠毁船只让我们的土地燃起大火，我们失去了许多定居点给火海！@w4 而当我们试图帮助你们的人民并扑灭火焰时，你们的同胞惊慌失措，误将我们当作兹瑞克斯人，杀害了我们许多族人！

English: Zirax attacked me right after I reached your tower, Chief. Explain that!
Chinese (simplified): 兹瑞克斯在我到达你的塔后就攻击了我，酋长. 解释 这一切!
