English: [ Unknown ] Listen here, you little shit!@w3 Don't go acting tough in front of me!@w3 I know your type:@w2 The dumb soldier.@w2 You follow orders: 'Go here!', 'Guard that door!', 'Shoot that civilian!' and do very little thinking for yourself.@w4 And now you've cost me time, effort and money by screwing over my job on that com relay.@p9 [ Unknown ] So now, you're gonna follow MY orders or I send PolSec an anonymous tip that you've jacked one of their relays and we see how well your scam with them goes after that.@w3 You hearin' what i'm saying, pal?
Chinese (simplified): [ Unknown未知 ] 听着，你这个小混蛋!@w3 不要在我面前逞强!@w3 我知道你的类型:@w2 愚蠢的士兵.@w2 你听从命令:“到这里!”“守住那扇门!”“开枪打死那个平民!”很少为自己考虑.@w4 现在你已经花费了我的时间、精力和金钱，因为你把我的工作搞砸了.@p9 [ Unknown未知 ] 现在，你要听从我的命令，否则我就给极星安保发个匿名举报，说你偷了他们的一个中继器，然后我们看看你跟他们的骗局有多成功。@w3 你听到我说的了吗，伙计?

English: [ Markos ] Yes, to business.@p5 [ Markos ] As you can probably guess, i'm in the business of supplying high-quality goods and services for lower than market prices.@w3 I try to keep things running smoothly and as under-the-radar as I can.@w3 Both literally and figuratively speaking.@p8 [ Markos ] My problem is that a certain someone screwed up while transporting a very valuable product to an even more important client.@w4 They got a PolSec patrol on their ass and had to dump the cargo to make a clean getaway.@w4 As i'm sure you can guess, Polaris got their hands on my shipment.@p9 [ Markos ] I got a lucky break here since the patrol was called off to deal with a Ghy'st frigate harassing a superfreighter that'd just entered the system.@w3 So they dropped the cargo off at Kenex station's logistics terminal and haven't checked it completely.@p9 [ Markos ] I need you to go in there and find that cargo and bring it back to me.@w4 I don't care how you go about it,@w2 But I need that box before they pop the top and find out what's inside.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 是，业务.@p5 [ 马库斯 ] 你可能猜到了，我从事的是以低于市场的价格提供高质量的商品和服务的行业.@w3 我试图保持事情运行中顺利，并尽可能不被发现.@w3 字面上的和比喻上的.@p8 [ 马库斯 ] 我的问题是，某个人把一个非常有价值的产品运送给一个更重要的客户时搞砸了.@w4 他们被极星安保巡逻队盯上了，不得不把货物倒掉，干净利落地逃走.@w4 我相信你能猜到，极星拿到了我的货.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] 我在这里有一个幸运的突破，因为巡逻队被取消去处理一艘Ghy'st护卫舰，他正在骚扰一艘刚刚进入星系的超级货轮。@w3 所以他们把货物放在Kenex空间站的物流终端，并没有完全检查.@p9 [ 马库斯 ] 我需要你进去找到那件货物，然后带回来给我.@w4 我不在乎你怎么做，@w2 但我需要那个盒子，在他们打开盖子，发现里面有什么之前.

English: <color=#2eafff>If Polaris catch me, they'll label me as a pirate!</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>如果极星抓住我，他们会给我贴上海盗的标签!</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>How the hell am I supposed to find this box on an entire space station?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我怎么可能在这么大的空间站里找到这个盒子?</color>

English: [ Markos ] What's in the box is none of your business.@w3 It's between me and the client,@w2 so keep your nose out of it.@p7 [ Markos ] All you need to know is that the contents of the box can be traced back to the client, which will in turn implicate me and a number of my other clients.@w3 That's a death sentence for me; Both for my reputation and in all likelihood, my life too.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 盒子里是什么不关你的事.@w3 它在我和客户端之间的重要联系，@w2 所以让你的鼻子保持灵敏.@p7 [ 马库斯 ] 你只需要知道盒子的内容可以追溯到我的客户，这将反过来牵连到我和我的许多其他客户.@w3 这对我来说是死刑;既为了我的名誉，也很可能是为了我的生命.

English: If they catch me, it'll be a death sentence for my reputation and life too!
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>如果他们抓住我，对我的名誉和生命也算是死刑!</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>But how am I supposed to find it on a massive station like that?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我怎么可能在这么大的空间站里找到这个盒子?</color>

English: [ Markos ] Not my problem.@w3 This is the price you're paying for screwing up my job with the relay.@p7 [ Markos ] If you're lucky, maybe they won't see you opening their cargo boxes@w5 Maybe you can bribe someone?@w3 Like I said, not my problem.
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 不是我的问题.@w3 这就是你把我的中继站工作搞砸的代价.@p7 [ 马库斯 ] 如果你够幸运，也许他们不会看到你打开他们的货柜箱@w5 也许你可以贿赂某人?@w3 就像我说的，不是我的问题.

English: <color=#2eafff>What's in the box? It's not a severed head right?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>盒子里是什么?这不是一颗被砍下的头颅，对吧?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>How am I supposed to find one small box in a station of hundreds of other identical boxes?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我怎么能在成百上千个相同的货箱中找到一个小盒子呢?</color>

English: [ Markos ] That's a job for that A.I of yours, not me.@p7 [ Markos ] I already sent in another guy to get the package, but I haven't heard back from him so i'm assuming he got caught.@w6 Do me a favor?@w3 Don't do what he did.@w5 Hell, if he was caught... He could be in the station security holding cells.@w4 Maybe he can tell you where the cargo is.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You're not giving me much to work with, pal.@w3 I could open every crate in that place and find nothing.@w3 It could already be too late and the box is lying on a desk in Station Security along with your last guy.@w3 Worse still,@w2 the guy you sent could've made off with the package to sell it himself!@p9 [ Markos ] No, he's a loyal dog.@w2 He's not gonna bite the hand that feeds him.@w3 As for the other, you won't know until you go looking for the right box.@p7 [ {PlayerName } ] But what if@p4 [ Markos ] Enough!@w3 Head to Kenex and find that package.@w2 No more 'what ifs' and no more 'buts'.@w3 I want results, not speculation.@w3 If you're worried about upsetting Polaris then find some way to get the package that won't piss them off.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 这是你那个人工智能的工作，不是我的。@p7 [ Markos ] 我已经派了另一个人去取包裹，但我还没有收到他的回音，所以我猜他可能被抓了。@w6 帮我个忙？@w3 不要重蹈他的覆辙。@w5 见鬼，如果他真的被抓了...他可能在站安全拘留室里。@w4 也许他能告诉你货物在哪里。@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你提供的信息太少了，伙计。@w3 我可能打开那个地方的每一个板条箱，结果却一无所获。@w3 可能已经太晚了，那个箱子可能正躺在站安全部的办公桌上，连同你派去的那个人。@w3 更糟糕的是，@w2 你派去的那个人可能自己带着包裹逃走了，打算卖掉它！@p9 [ Markos ] 不，他是一条忠诚的狗。@w2 他不会咬喂他的手。@w3 至于其他的，你不会知道，除非你去找正确的箱子。@p7 [ {PlayerName } ] 但如果@p4 [ Markos ] 够了！@w3 去Kenex找到那个包裹。@w2 不要再'如果'了，也不要再'但是'了。@w3 我要的是结果，不是猜测。@w3 如果你担心惹恼了Polaris，那么就找到一种不会激怒他们的方法来获取包裹。

English: [ Markos ] Yeah.@w3 IF you can pull it off.@w5 I'll be impressed if you manage to do it without pissing off Polaris.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah...@w3 Such confidence!@w3 With such an 'inspiring leader', how can I possibly fail?@p5 [ Markos ] Don't be a dick.@w3 I have enough of those to deal with in my own crew as it is.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm sure you do.@p5 < User has disconnected >
Chinese (simplified): [ 马库斯 ] 是的.@w3 如果你能搞得定.@w5 如果你能做到不惹恼极星，我将会印象深刻.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊…@w3 这种信任!@w3 有这样的这样一个“鼓舞人心的领导者”，我怎么可能失败??@p5 [ 马库斯 ] 别逼逼.@w3 我在自己的团队里已经有足够多的人需要处理了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我相信你会的.@p5 < 用户已断开连接 >

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nThis is the Station Security Office.@w3\nIf you're here to report a crime, theft or murder on the station: Please speak to the receptionist.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n这里是空间站安全办公室.@w3 \n如果你需要上报罪犯偷窃或是谋杀: 请与前台交谈.

English: <color=#2eafff>Sorry, I was looking for the bathroom</color>

[ Officer Stalbort ]\nPublic toilets are on the floor below, to each side of the station control room.@w3\nDo NOT let me catch you in the wrong gender toilets or you'll be sharing a cell next to that idiot back there.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n公共 厕所 就在楼下，空间站控制室的两侧.@w3 \n别让我在其他性别的厕所里抓到你，那样你就得关在那个傻子隔壁了.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] No theft, no murder, no indecent exposure, no illegal drugs, the usual.@w3 Don't bribe the dockworkers as this guy found out.@p8 [ Officer Stalbort ] The dockworkers may be manual laborers but they all have ties to one or another group are always being watched to make sure they don't sell off their competitor's shipment information to pirates.@w3 It's not worth the effort, and less damaging to do anything about the bribes to the security staff though.@w2
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 不许偷，不许抢，不和坏人交谈，不使用禁药，就很平常的一些规矩.@w3 不要像 这个 一样贿赂工人.@p8 [ Stalbort警官] 这些装卸工人虽然都是些苦劳力但是他们或多或少的和某个派系有所联系，总会有人盯着他们防止把竞争对手货物信息出卖给海盗.@w3 总之就是不值得这么做，不过贿赂安全人员倒是没那么大问题，就随口一说.@w2

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] Him?@w4 Got caught trying to bribe a dockworker.@w2 Hasn't said a word.@w3 Probably a pirate,@w2 thief@w2 or muscle for a competing trader trying to stiff his competition.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Can I speak to him?@p8 [ Officer Stalbort ] No can do.@w4 Just asking to speak to him makes you suspicious in my book.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 他?@w4 他在收买装卸工的时候被抓到了.@w2 但是半个字都没吐出来.@w3 也许就是一海盗，@w2 小偷@w2 或者某个竞争者派来的打手，想着把竞争僵化.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我能和他聊聊吗?@p8 [ Stalbort警官] 当然不行.@w4 既然你这么问，我就不得不把你当成可疑人员了.

English: I don't suppose you're open to a bribe?
Paragon: I just want to find out why he was bribing the dockworker, that's all.
Chinese (simplified): 模范: 我就是想知道他为什么要贿赂装卸工，仅此而已.

English: Renegade: I'm sure I can beat an answer out of him for you, if you'd like.
Chinese (simplified): 叛逆: 我觉得一顿好打应该能让他吐出你想要的答案，如果你愿意让我这么做.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] You've got some balls asking a security officer if he'd take a bribe right after i'd told you this idiot was busted for doing just that.@w6 Fortunately for you,@w2 i'm not a dockworker.@w3 There's less scrutiny on me so i'm free to take the occasional pay-off as long as it doesn't hurt anyone.@p9 [ Officer Stalbort ] This guy's staying here though,@w2 so all you'll get is to chat with him.@w5 The price of doing business is 500 credits in cash.@w3 If you can't pay, then you won't be talking to my prisoner.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 在我告诉你这人就是因为贿赂进来的之后，你居然还敢对着我一个警官问我接不接受贿赂，还真是有种.@w6 不过你很幸运，@w2 我并不是装卸工.@w3 没什么人会盯着我所以赚点外快也是可以的，只要没人受伤就行.@p9 [ Stalbort警官] 不过那人不能放了，@w2 你只能和他说上两句.@w5 我的出价时 500 信用点，用 现金支付.@w3 如果你付不起，就没得谈了.

English: <color=#2eafff>I've got your money right here, Stalbort.</color>

[ Officer Stalbort ] Good, you have my payment.@p6 [ Officer Stalbort ] Alright, as promised.@w2 You may talk to the prisoner.@w3 There are cameras, but no sound.@w2 Don't touch the bars and don't pass anything to the prisoner.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 很好，我就收下了.@p6 [ Stalbort警官] 行，就像我保证的.@w2 你可以和那个囚犯谈谈.@w3 这虽然有摄像头，但是没声音.@w2 不要去碰栏杆 don't 或者是给囚犯递东西.@w2 明白吗?

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nAlright Prisoner!@w2\nYou've got a guest here who's wants to speak to you.@w2 So play nice.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n好了囚犯!@w2 \n你有个客人想和你谈谈.@w2 所以说学乖一点.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] You some kind of investigator or something?@w4 Here to expose the ringleader of these dumb thugs out to steal all Polaris' cargo or some self-righteous BS.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Something like that.@w2 Mostly because i'm curious about what he was trying to steal.@p8 [ Officer Stalbort ] 'Aight, fine.@w3 It's no skin off my nose.@w2 I'll let you talk to him, just don't stick your hands between the bars.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 你是调查员还是什么的?@w4 来这里是想从他嘴里知道究竟是哪个恶棍头头想要偷极星的货？还是说为了正义之类的扯淡的话.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 差不多.@w2 我主要是好奇他打算偷点什么.@p8 [ Stalbort警官] '行吧.@w3 反正我也不感兴趣.@w2 我可以让你和他谈谈，但是不许吧手伸过栏杆啊.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ] I've tried to get him to tell me what he was bribing dockworkers for, but he won't tell me.@w2 The worker he tried it on hadn't been told what he wanted before he offered the bribe.@w3 Smart, that is.@w2 Don't want him to know what they're after until you're sure he can't turn on you.@p9 [ Officer Stalbort ] If you think you can 'convince' him to come clean,@w2 I'll let you have your talk.@w3 Just as long as you tell me what he told you, when you're done with him.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 我也试着让他说出他想贿赂装卸工干什么但他就是不说.@w2 装卸工在他提出贿赂的时候也没有听说具体要求.@w3 确实是很狡猾的做法.@w2 在不确定别人是否会背叛他之前不说出自己的目的.@p9 [ Stalbort警官] 如果你能说服他坦白，@w2 我可以让你和他谈谈.@w3 只要你把他告诉你的都告诉我就行.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nIf you're here to report a crime...@w3 oh, it's you.@w5\nHave you got my money?
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n如果你是来上报犯...@w3 哦，是你啊.@w5 \n你把钱拿来了?

English: <color=#2eafff>I've got your money right here, Stalbort.</color>

[ Officer Stalbort ] Keep it down!@w2 The cameras don't have sound, but who knows who might be listening in!@p7 [ Officer Stalbort ] You wanna talk to the prisoner? It's 500 Galactic Credits in cash.@w4 So head on down to the ATM downstairs and get me my money.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官] 小声点!@w2 摄像头虽然没声音但是谁知道有没有人在偷听呢!@p7 [ Stalbort警官] 你想和囚犯谈话? 你只需要 给我500信用点的 c现金.@w4 你只需要下楼去ATM取就行.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nYou have five minutes.@w2\nMake 'em count.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n给你5分钟的时间.@w2 \n抓紧一点.

English: [ Officer Stalbort ]\nIf you're done with your chat,@w2 I want you out of here.@w3\nIt'll look suspicious if you hang around here for too long.
Chinese (simplified): [ Stalbort警官]\n如果你聊完了，@w2 最好从这里离开.@w3 \n在这里待的越久就越可疑.

English: [ Prisoner ] The fuck do you want, errand boy?@w4 Ya come to offer me a deal? Well ya can kiss my scaly, ziraxian ass!@p7 [ Prisoner ] Better yet,@w2 give me a few minutes to squeeze one out and then ya can kiss my ass.@w4 How's zat for ya?
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 你 他妈的 想要什么，跑腿的小屁孩?@w4 想跟我达成什么协议?先舔舔我这充满鳞片的兹瑞克斯 屁股!@p7 [ 犯人 ] 还有坨好的，@w2 我马上就给你拉出来 然后 你可以再来舔.@w4 这样的交易如何啊?

English: [ Prisoner ] Ah shit.@w3 Markos sentcha, din't he?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Well, you really screwed up this time.@p5 [ Prisoner ] You're not here to bust me out?
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 啊，狗屎.@w3 是Markos叫你来的是吧?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 是啊，你这次算是彻底搞砸了.@p5 [ 犯人 ] 你不是来救我出去的?

English: <color=#2eafff>Sorry mate, wasn't part of the Job description.</color>
Yeah, but I need to secure the package first.
Chinese (simplified): 没错，但是 首先我得确保包裹到手.

English: [ Prisoner ] Yeah...@w2 Figgerd as much.@w4 I really screwed up big time.@w2 Picked the wrong goon to pay off.@p6 [ Prisoner ] But they can't actually hold me fer anythin' beyond the paying-off.@w3 I'll probably get a fine and tha's it.@w4 So 'f yer not here to break me out, what are ya here for?
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 是啊...@w2 我也知道.@w4 我这次麻烦大了.@w2 收买的人不太对.@p6 [ 犯人 ] 不过除了收买人意外他们也没有其他理由把我关在这了.@w3 我最多也就吃个罚款.@w4 所以说如果你不是来救我的，那是来干啥的?

English: <color=#2eafff>Did you find the package Markos sent you to find?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你拿到Markos叫你来找的包裹了吗?</color>

English: [ Prisoner ] That don' sound like Markos.@w3 He knows they canna hold me fer anything longer than 'few days.@p7 [ Prisoner ] Don't ya go wasting ma time with yer muleshit!@w5 So tell me whatchu want and get outta here.
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 这听起来可不像Markos的作风.@w3 他知道这些人关不了我几天的.@p7 [ 犯人 ] 懒得和你这种跑腿的说了!@w5 告诉我你想要什么然后滚.

English: <color=#2eafff>Did you find the package Markos sent you to find?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你拿到Markos叫你来找的包裹了吗?</color>

English: [ Prisoner ] No.@w3 Was trying to pay off one of 'em cargo movers in the main terminal because they ain't lettin' me up into the logistic room without raisin' red flags since imma nawt a company man.@p8 [ Prisoner ] If you can get into the Logistics office without problems,@w2 ya can prolly use the terminal to find the right box.@w4 Get that box to Markos 'fore they start running checks on all the seized boxes they've gotten.
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ] 没有.@w3 我本来想收买楼下终端那里的装卸工，毕竟我不是企业里的人，所以他们不让我进物流间.@p8 [ 犯人 ] 如果你可以进到 物流办公室 里面，@w2 也许你可以用那个终端找到那个箱子.@w4 在他们开始清点箱子之前把它带给Markos.

English: [ Prisoner ]\nDon't worry 'bout me.@w3\nThey'll let me out in a few days and i'll head back.@w3 Boss won't be happy,@w2 but if you get the box back to him he'll be in a better mood and prolly let me off.@w4
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人 ]\n不用管我.@w3 \n几天之后他们就会把我放了，到时候自然会回去.@w3 头儿指定生气了，@w2 不过如果你把盒子带回去了，头儿的心情应该会好点，指不定就放过我了.@w4

English: [ Kenex Station 62 - Cargo Manifest: Bays 3 to 6 ] < 615 Items Identified >@w3 < 27 Flagged for inspection >@w3 < 7 Identified as illegal items >@w2 Alerting Authorities@p6 Warning: 'Roboerotica - Anniversary Edition' is undeclared entertainment media that requires licensing to sell@w3 > Redirecting cargo to relicensing division ( 150 credit fine for undeclared goods )@w3 > Additional fines and fees for relicensing ( 112 credits )@w3 [ Process Finished ]
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex Station 62 - 货物清单：3 到 6号舱 ] < 615 个物品已识别 >@w3 < 27 个已标记为需要检查 >@w3 < 7 个标记为违法货物 >@w2 警告执法人员@p6 警告： 'Roboerotica - Anniversary Edition' 是未申报的娱乐产品且需要许可证才能售卖@w3 > 将货物重定向至许可部门 ( 未申报货物罚款150信用点 )@w3 > Additional fines and fees for relicensing ( 112 credits )@w3 [ 处理完毕 ]
Search > 关键词：走私者，抛弃的货物， -超级护卫舰

English: [ Kenex Station 62 - Cargo Manifest: Search ] Search > Keywords: Smuggler, Dumped Cargo, -Superfreighter < 831 matches found >@w3 < Filtering out 'Superfreighter' from keywords >@w3 < 3 matches found >@p5 < Cargo Item 171ATQ >@w3 Identified as TQ2 Epsilon Radar Tranceiver - Cargo transferred to Polaris Supply Depot Theta@w4 This item is not compatible with current Polaris systems and will be returned to Epsilon with 32 unpaid fees associated with the retrieved item.@p9 < Cargo Item 192AFF >@w3 Identified as biological sample 39-11-78LGC - Hazardous Material@w4 Item was immediately incinerated, along with it's packaging and anything it came in contact with.@w2 The storage, transport and handling of Legacy technology is strictly FORBIDDEN by order of both Polaris Management and the Zirax High Command.@p9 < Cargo Item 226MKI >@w3 < Cargo has not been evaluated >@w3 Retrieved from a suspected smuggler by Patrol AV77 - Currently stored on Platform 11: Awaiting Review
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex Station 62 - 货物清单：查找 ] 查询 > 关键词：走私者，抛弃的货物， -超级护卫舰 < 831 个匹配的结果 >@w3 < 按照关键词 '超级护卫舰' 进行筛选 >@w3 < 3 个匹配的结果 >@p5 < 货舱物品 171ATQ >@w3 识别为TQ2 Epsilon雷达收发器 - 货物转交至 极星补给站 Theta@w4 该物品与目前的极星系统不兼容，将会连同32笔回收物品的账单一起退回Epsilon.@p9 < 货舱物品 192AFF >@w3 识别为生物样本39-11-78LGC - 危险材料@w4 物品已连同包装和里面所有的东西一起当场焚毁.@w2 一切储存，运输以及使用遗留者科技的行为都被极星管理层和兹瑞克斯最高指挥部严格禁止.@p9 < 货舱物品 226MKI >@w3 < 货物未经评估 >@w3 巡逻队AV77从一名走私嫌犯身上查获 - 目前存放于11号平台：等待审查

English: [ {PlayerName} ] IDA, can you put the location data of that box on my Heads-Up Display?@p6 [ IDA ] I have added it to your display, Commander.@w3 The package is 30 meters below you next to an exterior loading door.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，你能位置信息加入我的抬头显示吗?@p6 [ IDA ] 已加入，指挥官.@w3 包裹在你下方30m的一个装货门边.

English: [ Markos ] The hell are you calling me for?@w3 Have you got the package?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm looking right at it, but it's guarded and I can't grab it without getting caught by security.@p7 [ Markos ] You can deal with a couple of guards, can't you?@w3 You took down a bunch of my guys fine,@w2 A few security guards should be no problem for you, right?
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 你怎么又呼叫我?@w3 你拿到包裹了?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 包裹就在我面前，但是有人守着，我直接去拿肯定会被抓到.@p7 [ Markos ] 几个守卫而已，你能搞定吧?@w3 你干掉了我那么多人，@w2 几个守卫对你来说应该不成问题， 对吧?

English: <color=#2eafff>It's not about the guards, it's about my Reputation with Polaris.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>不是对付守卫难不难的问题，这事关我和极星的关系.</color>

English: [ Markos ] I don't care how you do it,@w2 who you have to pay off,@w2 whatever security systems you have to destroy,@w2 Whoever you have to kill on that parasite-infested dump.@w2 Just grab it and make for the nearest door if you have to; I don't care.@w2 Just bring it to me.@p7 [ Markos ] Don't contact me again unless you have my package.@p6 < Transmission Terminated >
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 我不管你用什么手段，@w2 收买谁也好，@w2 弄坏安保系统也好，@w2 又或者是你要在那堆寄生虫里杀掉谁也好.@w2 把包裹拿起来，冲向最近的门就行; 我不在乎.@w2 只要你给我拿过来.@p7 [ Markos ] 拿到包裹之前不要再联系我了.@p6 < 通讯终止 >

English: This job is boring as hell!@w3\nI would rather be getting drunk upstairs or playing a round of cards than watching people stack boxes all day...
Chinese (simplified): 这工作太无聊了!@w3 \n我宁可在楼上喝个烂醉或者打两局牌也好过看人在这里堆箱子...

English: Maybe I can help with that? (Play Cards)
[ Security Guard ]\nThis job is boring as hell!@w3\nYou wanna play some cards to pass the time?@w2 We play for real money though.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n这工作无聊透了!@w3 \n也许你愿意和我打会牌消磨时间?@w2 不过我们可是用 真 钱下注.

English: [ Security Guard ] Depends on what it is,@w3 and what's in it for me.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You see those boxes over there?@w2 I really need one of those.@w2 If you catch my meaning?@p7 [ Security Guard ] Well, my friend...@w2 I can't let you take any of those boxes.@w2 But...@w3 it seems that particular cargo needs to be moved, but the cargo handlers aren't around right now.@w3 I suppose I could move it myself, but i'm not being paid to move cargo.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ] 那要看是什么忙了，@w3 以及我能拿到什么好处.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你看到那堆箱子了吗?@w2 我 真的 非常需要其中某一个.@w2 你懂我意思吧?@p7 [ 保安 ] 唔这位朋友...@w2 我不能让你拿走任何一个箱子.@w2 不过呢...@w3 看上去 某些 货箱可能需要换个位置，但是搬货的人不在这.@w3 我 觉得 我自己可以来搬它，但是没钱我可不干.

English: What if you were being paid to move cargo?
Chinese (simplified): 要如果有人花钱请你 移动货物呢?

English: [ Security Guard ]\nOh, someone would need to pay me ohhh...@w3 Let's say 800 credits to move that particular item.@w3\nI have expensive tastes...@w3 and ah...@w2 more than a few unpaid debts.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n哦，有人要给我钱的话...@w3 大概 800 信用点 就可以让我搬一个箱子.@w3 \n我有些比较昂贵的爱好...@w3 而且...@w2 还有点欠债.

English: <color=#2eafff>I just happen to have 800 credits right here</color>
[ Security Guard ]\nAre you still wanting me to move that cargo for you, pal?@w3\nIt's still 800 credits.
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n你还需要我帮你移动货物吗，哥们?@w3 \n价格依然是 800 信用点.

English: <color=#2eafff>I just happen to have 800 credits right here</color>
[ Security Guard ]\nA pleasure working for you, sir.@w2\nIf you need any help carrying that box to your ship, just let me know!
Chinese (simplified): [ 保安 ]\n很荣幸为您效力， 老板.@w2 \n如果需要把那个货箱搬到你船上，尽管跟我说!
你已经 帮了很大的 忙了

English: [ Markos ] I told you not to contact me again.@w3 You'd better have my package.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] As a matter of fact, I do.@w4 You owe me big time, Markos.@w3 This was a lot harder than you let on and almost got me killed.@p8 [ Markos ] Good work@w3 and no, I don't owe you anything.@w4 You owed me.@w3 Now we're square@w2 and can move ahead with our business arrangement.@w4 As soon as you hand the package over, of course.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 我说过不要再联络我了.@w3 你最好已经拿到包裹了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 事实上，我确实拿到了.@w4 你欠我一个大人情，Markos.@w3 这可比你说的难多了，我差点丢掉小命.@p8 [ Markos ] 虽然做得很好@w3 但是不，我什么都不欠你.@w4 而是你 欠 我的.@w3 现在我们扯平了@w2 然后再来聊聊我们的生意安排.@w4 当然这得等你把包裹交给我.

English: <color=#2eafff>Of course. So where am I taking this thing?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>当然，我该把包裹带到哪里去?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>I want no future business with you, Markos.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我不想再和你的“生意”扯上关系了，Markos.</color>

English: [ Markos ] I'm forwarding a data package to you now with my ship's current location.@w4 We'll only be there for a couple of hours before we move on again, so don't even think about alerting the Authorities.@w2 By the time they get there, we'll be long gone and we'll be right back where we started.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Paranoid much?@w5 I've kept my word so far and done shadier things than i'm comfortable with.@w2 You can trust me with this.@p7 [ Markos ] I trust no one.@w3 That's how I got here and that's how i'm staying here.@w3 If you're smart,@w2 you'll start doing the same as me.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 我会把飞船当前位置的数据推送给你.@w4 在移动之前我只会在这等几个小时，所以不要想着通知当局了.@w2 等他们到那了，我们早就回到原来的地方了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你就这么有被害妄想?@w5 我到现在一直都信守承诺而且帮你干了那么多我完全无法忍受的见不得光的事.@w2 你早就可以信任我了.@p7 [ Markos ] 我谁都不信.@w3 这就是我能爬到这个位置然后还活着的原因.@w3 如果你足够聪明，@w2 你就会和我一样.

English: [ Markos ] So be it.@w2 But you still have something that belongs to me@w2 so whether you like it or not, you'll bring it back here to me or you'll be making an enemy with a greater reach than you can imagine.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Fine. I get the point.@w4 Where do you want me to drop this box off?@p6 [ Markos ] I've forwarded a data package to you that shows the current location of my ship.@w5 I'll only be there for a couple of hours before we move on again, so don't even think about alerting the Authorities.@w2 By the time they get there, we'll be long gone.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Paranoid much?@p6 [ Markos ] Paranoia is what keeps me alive in this game.@w3 Without it,@w2 even your closest friends will try to stab you in the back.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 那就好.@w2 但你手上还有我的东西@w2 所以无论你愿意与否，你都必须拿给我，不然你就是在与你无法想象的势力为敌.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 行，我知道.@w4 你想让我吧箱子带去哪?@p6 [ Markos ] 我会把飞船当前位置的数据推送给你.@w5 在移动之前我只会在这等几个小时，所以不要想着通知当局了.@w2 等他们到那里，我们早跑了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 你就这么有被害妄想?@p6 [ Markos ] 被害妄想能让我活着.@w3 如果没有这么偏执，@w2 就算你最亲近的朋友也会想着捅你一刀.

English: [ Markos ] Yes, you'd better keep that in mind.@w4 No one is safe in this game.@w2 Not without eyes in the back of your head and ears at every door.@p7 [ Markos ] That's enough talk for now.@w3 Get your ass over here and bring me that box.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 很好，你最好能记住.@w4 N在这个 游戏里没人是安全的.@w2 N除非你有千里眼顺风耳.@p7 [ Markos ] 说的够多了.@w3 赶快滚过来把箱子带给我.

English: [ Vespian ]\nI don't trust you...@w3\nI've got my eye on you.@w2 You do anything suspicious and it'll be the last thing you do.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ]\n我不信任你...@w3 \n所以我会盯着你.@w2 你要是敢鬼鬼祟祟的，那就是你最后一次鬼鬼祟祟了.@w2 懂?

English: [ Vespian ] You're one ugly sonnovabitch, anyone ever tell you that?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Nice to meet you too.@w7 I'm here to see Markos.@p6 [ Vespian ] I don't give a shit.@w4 You'll hand over the package to me or you'll go out an airlock.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ] 你可真是个丑逼，没人跟你说过吗?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 很高兴见到你.@w7 我是来见Markos的.@p6 [ Vespian ] 关我屁事.@w4 把包裹给我然后滚出气闸.@w2 懂了吗?

English: <color=#2eafff>I, uh... left it in my ship.</color>
<color=#ff0000>How about I shove my foot up your ass and you get out of my way?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ff0000>要不要我用脚给你屁股上来一下让你滚开?</color>

English: [ Vespian ] Hey boss!@w4 This guy's not being very cooperative.@p6 [ Markos (Intercom) ] Maybe he'll be more cooperative in his next life.@w5 Get rid of him.@p7 [ Vespian ] You heard the man.@w3 We get to do this the hard way.
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ] 嘿头儿!@w4 这人不怎么配合.@p6 [ Markos (Intercom) ] 也许他下辈子会更配合一点.@w5 干掉他.@p7 [ Vespian ] 你听到了.@w3 我们来硬的.

English: [ Vespian ]\nGo get it then.@w4\nYou know the way out.@w3 Don't take any detours or i'll know.
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ]\n去 拿来 啊.@w4 \n你知道出去的路.@w3 别想 耍什么花招，我盯着呢.

English: [ Vespian ] Did you open it?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Of course not.@w4 What's in it, anyway?@p8 [ Vespian ] None of your bloody business!@w6 Worthless sack of legacy-spawned crap...
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ] 你打开过它吗?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然没有.@w4 不过出于好奇还是问一下，里面是什么?@p8 [ Vespian ] 跟你没有一毛钱关系!@w6 你这坨坨没用的遗留者拉出来的屎...

English: [ Vespian ]\nGet in there and stop wasting my time.@w6\nIf Markos doesn't like what you have to say...@w3 I'll look forward to watching you breathe vaccuum.
Chinese (simplified): [ Vespian ]\n进那里面去，不要再浪费我时间了.@w6 \n如果Markos不喜欢你说的...@w3 我会欣赏你在真空里的表情.

English: [ Markos ] Sorry I couldn't be there to greet you in person {PlayerName}.@w3 You remember my little instruction on paranoia, don't you?@p8 [ Markos ] I don't think we're ready for a face-to-face meeting just yet.@w3 I like you {PlayerName},@w2 But I don't trust you.@w4 Not yet, anyway...@p8 [ Markos ] You look like you have questions,@w3 So i'll let you ask them.@w6 Maybe i'll answer them;@w3 maybe I won't.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 很抱歉我不能亲自到那里向你问好 {PlayerName}.@w3 你应该记得我那点小小的偏执，不是吗?@p8 [ Markos ] 我并不认为我们已经做好面对面的准备了.@w3 我喜欢你 {PlayerName}，@w2 但我不 信任 你.@w4 至少现在不，无论如何...@p8 [ Markos ] 看起来你有很多问题，@w3 你现在可以问了.@w6 也许我会回答;@w3 也许我不会.
所以确切的来说你到底 是什么人 ?

English: <color=#2eafff>Why doesn't your ship show up on sensors?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么你的船不会在探测器上显示?</color>

English: [ Markos ] It was a weapon.@w4 I'm not gonna tell you who made it or where it came from, only that it was an experimental energy weapon.@w5 I was contracted to retrieve it and deliver it to the client in exchange for being provided with the time and location where it would be most vulnerable.@p9 [ Markos ] I can't tell you anything about the client since that would make me a very poor businessman.@w5 Having it fall into the hands of those blood-sucking parasites at Polaris was just sheer bad luck.@p8
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 是个武器.@w4 我不会告诉你它是谁造的或者哪里来的，你只需要知道它是一个实验性的能量武器.@w5 我的客户和我的合约就是把这把武器取回并且送给他，从而交换某些非常值钱的东西出现的位置和时间.@p9 [ Markos ] 客户的名字我肯定是不能告诉你的，要不然就不配作为商人了.@w5 落到那些极星的吸血鬼手里纯属是我倒霉.@p8

English: <color=#2eafff>Why doesn't your ship show up on sensors?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么你的船不会在探测器上显示?</color>

English: [ Markos ] That's one of those questions i'm not going to answer...@w3 at least not fully.@p7 [ Markos ] My name really is Markos.@w2 It's not some alias.@w5 Markos Vatar, to be precise.@w4 And as you can see,@w3 I am a businessman.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] T这就是我不会回答的那种问题...@w3 至少不能完全回答.@p7 [ Markos ] 我的名字真的 是 Markos.@w2 不是什么外号之类的.@w5 Markos Vatar，准确来说.@w4 然后就如你所见，@w3 我是个生意人.

English: <color=#2eafff>So why is Vespian such an asshole?</color>
<color=#2eafff>Why doesn't this ship show up on scanners?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么这艘船不会在探测器上显示?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>What can you tell me about the Pirate Armada?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>关于海盗舰队你能透露些什么?</color>

English: [ Markos ] Vespian's brother was the pilot of the shuttle that dropped off the guys I sent to secure the Com Relay you took over.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I see...@p5 [ Markos ] Not yet, you don't.@w5 The Polaris drone that shot down his ship didn't kill him.@w3 Vespian was forced to listen to his brother suffocate as his suit slowly ran out of air.@w4 He's understandably pissed at you.@p8 [ Markos ] As for why he's an asshole...@w3 Well,@w2 he was always an asshole.@w2 His brother was the more sensible one.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] Vespian的哥哥就是我派去确保数据中继站安全的那一船人里的飞行员.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 原来如此...@p5 [ Markos ] 这还不算完，你并不明白.@w5 打掉他飞船的那架极星无人机并没有直接干掉他.@w3 Vespian只能听着自己的哥哥在氧气耗尽的太空服里慢慢窒息.@w4 可想而知他有多恨你.@p8 [ Markos ] 至于他为什么这么王八蛋...@w3 ，这个嘛，@w2 他 一贯 如此.@w2 他哥就更敏感了.

English: <color=#2eafff>Why doesn't this ship show up on scanners?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么这艘船不会在探测器上显示?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>What can you tell me about the Pirate Armada?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>关于海盗舰队你能透露些什么?</color>

English: [ Markos ] This here ship is the Red Rogue.@w3 Wouldn't be much of a ship if it showed up on scanners.@p8 [ Markos ] Well, it still shows up on visual sensors, but with the outer rigging extended, the profile matches a Polaris Frigate when scanned.@w4 Things get a little dicey when they look out the window though.@p8 [ Markos ] I made most of the modifications myself.@w3 It used to be a Charon-Class Freighter owned by a family-run business in the Trader's Guild.@w5 Polaris screwed them over and had them sent to a Debtors' Prison on some backwater world@w2 and I helped myself to the ship before Polaris could scrap it.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 这艘船就是红色恶徒.@w3 如果会在扫描器上出现，它就不是船的形状了.@p8 [ Markos ] 当然了，它依然在视觉上可见，不过由于外面延伸出来的索具，它的特征扫描出来就像一艘普通的极星护卫舰.@w4 不过如果从窗户往里看的时候就不好说了.@p8 [ Markos ] 我自己改装了大部分.@w3 原来这船是贸易工会的一个家族企业所拥有的一艘喀戎级护卫舰.@w5 极星把生意搅黄了之后把他们丢到了一个鸟不生蛋的星球上的债务监狱里@w2 ，然后 我 就简简单单帮它逃离了被极星拆解的命运.

English: <color=#2eafff>So what's in that box I brought you anyway?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>所以说我带给你的盒子里到底有什么?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>So then who does that make you, Markos?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>所以那让你成为了什么样的人，Markos?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>And why is Vespian such a raging asshole?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>以及为什么Vespian是个如此暴躁的王八蛋?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>What can you tell me about the Pirate Armada?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>关于海盗舰队你能透露些什么?</color>

English: [ Markos ] The Pirate Armada?@w4 What's there to tell?@p7 [ Markos ] There's not really a unified Armada.@w3 This is basically common sense.@w5 The reality is that there are dozens, if not hundreds of individual bands of pirates across the galaxy.@w4 Some are organized like The Syndicate but most are small groups out for themselves like myself and my people.@p9 [ Markos ] There's also the clan-like bunches that operate in family groups that are more like regular colonists that decided to set up life in space instead of on planets.@w4 That lot tends to run the Freeports and live for the challenge of making a living in the most hostile environments.@w3 The closest to an honest person you'll find out there.@w2 Just keep an eye on your purse strings when they're around.@p9 [ Markos ] Most of the pirates you'll meet were either Traders who went out of business;@w2 Colonists who lost everything in a bad venture;@w2 Zirax wanting to strike out on their own, outside the Empire's strict laws;@w2 Or just plain criminals, fresh out of prison or on the run, or both.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 海盗舰队?@w4 有什么好说的?@p7 [ Markos ] 又不是真的有一个联合舰队.@w3 你起码应该有点常识.@w5 事实上整个星系有几十上百个海盗帮派.@w4 有些就像 联合会 一样有着严密的组织但是大部分都是想我和我手下一样的小团体.@p9 [ Markos ] 也有那种以家庭为纽带的类似于氏族的海盗团体，不过它们更像是殖民者，只是更愿意生活在太空而非地面上.@w4 那样的 很多都喜欢运营自由港，直面最险恶环境下的挑战.@w3 一般在那种地方你能找到最为接近诚实这个概念的人.@w2 当然它们在附近的时候你最好捂紧自己的钱包.@p9 [ Markos ] 你遇到的大部分海盗要不然就是没生意可做的商人;@w2 投资暴雷丢掉一切的殖民者;@w2 想要脱离帝国法律自己闯一闯的兹瑞克斯；@w2 也有可能就是普普通通的罪犯，刚刚出狱或者逃狱的那种.

English: <color=#2eafff>And where do you fit into all this, Markos?</color>
<color=#2eafff>And Vespian? Which kind of asshole is he?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那Vespian呢? 他又是个什么样的王八蛋?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>And why doesn't this ship show up on scanners?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那为什么你的船不会显示在扫描器上?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm all out of questions for now</color>

[ Markos ] Good,@w2 I was regretting giving you free rein to ask questions.@p7 [ Markos ] Now then...@w2 I've decided you could be useful, so i'm letting you in on that bit of business I mentioned before.@w3 The pay is very good and provided you don't tell anyone you'll get to walk away with your pay.@w5 I'll contact you when the time's right.@p8 [ Markos ] Also, don't annoy Vespian.@w3 He's enough of a pain in my ass as it is and I don't need anyone antagonizing him.@w2 Got it?
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 很好，@w2 我正后悔给了你提问的自由呢.@p7 [ Markos ]\现在...@w2 我觉得你 还是可以 有点用的，所以我决定让你入伙我们之前提到的那笔生意.@w3 报酬可谓是 相当 丰厚，只要你不告诉别人就可以直接拿钱走人.@w5 时机成熟时我自然会联络你.@p8 [ Markos ] 另外，不要跟Vespian过不去.@w3 他已经够让我头疼了，我不想还有人跟他起点摩擦.@w2 懂了吗?

English: <color=#2eafff>I never agreed to any of this</color>
<color=#2eafff>I'll try to steer clear of him.</color>

[ Markos ] It's a bit late for that.@w3 You're a pirate now!@p7 [ Markos ] But...@w2 If you don't want to take on the job, just don't answer the call and i'll find someone else.@w3 Don't tell anyone else about the job,@w2 me,@w2 my people@w2 or my ship.@w3 I don't need to warn you about what will happen if you do, do I?
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 想跑？太晚了.@w3 你已经是个海盗了!@p7 [ Markos ] 不过...@w2 如果你真的不想干，以后就不要接我的通话，我自然会找到别人来干.@w3 不要告诉任何人关于这份工作，@w2 我，@w2 我的人@w2 还有 我的船的事情.@w3 应该不需要我提醒你如果你这么做了会怎么样吧?

English: [ Markos ] Good.@w3 He's not happy about you killing his brother and even less happy about me not killing you.@w3 Don't give him an excuse to throw you out an airlock.
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ] 很好.@w3 他对于我 没有 干掉你的不满甚至于超过了他哥哥的死.@w3 不要给他把你丢出气闸的借口.

English: [ Markos ]\nOkay,@w2 Now get the fuck out of my room and off my ship.@w4\nAnd steer clear of Vespian!
Chinese (simplified): [ Markos ]\n嗯，@w2 现在 滚出 我的房间和飞船.@w4 \n然后离Vespian远点!

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThe Keycards are still stuck!@w3\nThey'll have to stay there until i've dealt with the zirax bombers.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n钥匙卡还是卡住了！@w3 \n它们必须留在那里，直到我处理掉兹瑞克斯轰炸机。

English: The Alignment System's values are determined by your actions and behaviour to characters and objectives within the story missions.\nYour current Paragon Level is: {Paragon}\nYour current Renegade Level is: {Renegade}
Chinese (simplified): 世界线偏差值系统的值由你在故事任务中对角色和目标的行动和行为决定。\n你当前的 楷模 等级是： {Paragon}\n你当前的 叛逆 等级是： {Renegade}

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Uhh... Ida,@w3 Didn't you say they'd let me through and then confirm my identity?@w5 I think I may be in trouble here...@p9 [ IDA ] I have no solution for you, Commander.@w2 The only suggestion I can offer is this:@w3 Bluff@p9 [ Zirax Guard ] Hey! You there, pal?@w5 Answer me before I turn on the heat!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 呃... Ida，@w3 你不是说他们会先让我通过然后再确认我的身份吗？@w5 我想我可能遇到麻烦了...@p9 [ IDA ] 指挥官，我没有办法帮你。@w2 我能提供的唯一建议是这个：@w3 虚张声势@p9 [ 兹瑞克斯守卫 ] 嘿！你，那边的家伙？@w5 在我开火之前回答我！

English: Bluff: Yeah, i'm here. Uhh... how's it going?
Chinese (simplified): 装腔作势： 唔呣，我在这，额... 最近怎么样?

English: Bluff: WHAT!? I CAN'T HEAR YOU!! THE CONSOLE IS BROKEN!!
Chinese (simplified): 装腔作势： 什么!? 我听不见!! 这玩意是坏了吗!!

English: Bluff: Hey pal! Sorry about the delay, I just dropped my ID.
Chinese (simplified): 装腔作势： 嘿哥们!抱歉我愣了一下，刚才把ID卡掉地上了.

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] Greetings, Traveller.@w3 I see you have returned.@w5 Will you take salt with me?@w4 Then we shall talk of the past.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Take salt?@w4 Perhaps another time, Elder.@w6 I'm here today because i'm worried for the future of your clan.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Then that makes two of us, my friend.@w5 I worry about the future of my clan with every waking moment...@w4 more so these past few days than all those preceding them i'm afraid... @w5 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] What's the problem, Elder?@p7 [ Chief Na'tuk ] You've touched upon my problem right there, Traveller.@w6 I am old.@w4 Too old.@w5 I will have to step down from my position soon and let someone younger take the reins.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你好，旅行者.@w3 你回来了.@w5 你能和我弄点盐吗?@w4 然后我们再来说说过去的事.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 拿点盐?@w4 下次吧，长老.@w6 我今天来是因为我很担心你们部落的安危.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 那看来你和我想法一致，我的朋友.@w5 我无时不刻不在担心氏族的未来...@w4 特别是这几天在他们之前...@w5 @p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 出什么事了，长老?@p7 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 你说到点子上了，旅行者.@w6 我老了.@w4 太老了.@w5 老到我必须从现在的位置上退下来让年轻人接手这堆烂摊子.

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] Save your platitudes, friend. I've heard them all before.@w5 I am old and I know that i'm old.@w7 I find it harder and harder to rise from my bed each morning and fear for the day that I cannot rise at all.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Before that time is upon me,@w4 I hope to at least know that i'm passing the mantle of leadership to someone suitable and in a better state than it found me.@w4 And for me to pass it on with dignity and not from my backside while I lay infirm in a bed.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] That time is still a long way off, Chief.@w8 You might get better if you give it time.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] No...@w3 It's more than just my body.@w5 I should've caught onto Ki'eve's plan,@w4 I shouldn't have rushed to conclusions,@w4 I should've listened to you and my council.@w5 What I did or did not do nearly condemned an innocent man and let a criminal walk free.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Too many things are my fault. @w4 No,@w4 my time as Chief is coming to an end.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Enough of this sad talk.@w7 Tell me why you've come to visit us again, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 少来了，朋友. 这些我早就听腻了.@w5 我是真的 老了 而且我很清楚得 知道 我老了.@w7 我每天起床都愈发困难，怕是有一天我就完全起不来了.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 在那一刻到来之前，@w4 我至少希望可以把权力移交给给一个状态比我好的有资格的人.@w4 至少我还能有尊严地转交 而非 在床上这么做.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那一天还早，酋长.@w8 假以时间你一定会好起来的.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 不...@w3 不光是我的身体.@w5 我早就应该聊到Ki'eve的计划，@w4 我不该这么快就下结论的，@w4 我应该 听从你 你和议会的意见.@w5 我之前差点就给无辜的人定了罪而让犯罪者逍遥法外.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我做的错事太多了.@w4 不对，@w4 我的酋长生涯应该就此结束.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 丧气的话说够了.@w7 ，和我说说你此行的目的吧旅行者.

English: <color=#2eafff>The Zirax will come, Chief. It's only a matter of time.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>兹瑞克斯就要来了，酋长.这只是时间问题.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Those hunters loyal to Ki'eve are still out there helping the Zirax.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那些和Ki'eve一伙的人依然在帮助兹瑞克斯.</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] While I appreciate your honesty, I can't say I care for your blunt manner.@w7 But yes... I am old and I know that i'm old.@w6 I have been leading this clan for over forty cycles and that is long enough for me.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] I only hope that I can pass on the mantle of leadership to someone suitable and in a better state than it found me.@w4 And for me to pass it on with dignity and not from my backside while I lay infirm in a bed.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Enough of this sad talk.@w7 Tell me why you've come to visit us again, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 虽然我很感谢你的诚实，但这并不代表我欣赏你莽撞的性格.@w7 但没错... 我 的确 老了我也 知道 这一点.@w6 我已经领导了这个氏族40多个公转周期，就算对我来说也够长了.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我只希望在我不行了之前可以把权力移交给给一个状态比我好的有资格的人.@w4 至少我还能有尊严地转交 而非 在床上这么做.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 丧气的话说够了.@w7 和我说说你此行的目的吧，旅行者.

English: <color=#2eafff>The Zirax will come, Chief. It's only a matter of time.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>兹瑞克斯就要来了，酋长.这只是时间问题.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Those hunters loyal to Ki'eve are still out there helping the Zirax.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那些和Ki'eve一伙的人依然在帮助兹瑞克斯.</color>

English: [ Chief Na'tuk ] I told you that I intend to leave things in a better way than when the role of Chief was passed to me.@w6 Provoking or threatening the Zirax will only make things worse and that's precisely where those four traitors have run off to.@w6 I wish them all the luck the spirits can provide them.@w4 They'll need it if they think they can negotiate anything with our Zirax jailers and come out on top.@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] Time and patience has taught me that the best way to deal with the Zirax is to weather the storm, to not resist and they will eventually get bored and leave us alone.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] And what if there's no 'weathering' this storm, Chief?@w4 What if they come here to exterminate the Tal'on once and for all? Are you just going to let them?@p9 [ Chief Na'tuk ] What use would our bows and arrows be against miniguns and rockets, Traveller?@w3 Nothing at all.@w3 We stand no chance against them.@p8 [ Chief Na'tuk ] No.@w5 We will not resist.@w2 We will run.@w2 We will hide.@w2 We will weather the storm...@w8 That is all I have to say on the matter, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 我应该告诉过你我比较倾向于离开的时候让一切都比我接任酋长得时候好点.@w6 激怒或是威胁兹瑞克斯只会让事情变得更糟，而那四个跑掉的叛徒马上就要做到了.@w6 我希望神灵能赐予他们幸运.@w4 如果他们想和我们的兹瑞克斯狱卒讲和而且成功的话，肯定是需要运气的.@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 时间和耐心教会了我，对待兹瑞克斯就像对待风暴一样，只要不去反抗，总有一天它们累了就会不管我们了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那如果这并不是什么风暴，酋长?@w4 如果他们是来一次性杀光所有泰隆人的呢? 你就打算眼睁睁地看着吗?@p9 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 那我们的弓箭对上机枪和火箭又有多少胜算呢，旅行者?@w3 一点都没有.@w3 我们和他们对抗就是死路一条.@p8 [ Na'tuk酋长 ] 不.@w5 我们不会反抗.@w2 我们会逃.@w2 会躲藏.@w2 我们终将度过风暴...@w8 这就是我能和你说的，旅行者.

English: <color=#2eafff>Then I wish you the best, Chief.</color>

[ {PlayerName} ] The old man will get everyone here killed, IDA!@w6 There's gotta be something we can do!@p8 [ IDA ] Perhaps you can appeal to whoever plans to take over, Commander.@w7 At the very least you can prepare them for the troubles they may face when they take over.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I suppose the village Shaman would be the best one to talk to in this situation.@w6 He seems to be the one most likely to know who the favorite candidate is...@w6 I guess that's as good a place as any to start.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这个老人肯定会带领所有人走向灭亡的，IDA!@w6 我们肯定能做些什么!@p8 [ IDA ] 也许你可以去找找合格的继任者，指挥官.@w7 最少最少也可以想办法帮他度过继任所要面临的难关.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我想现在最好和村里的萨满谈谈.@w6 他看起来最清楚合适的候选人是谁...@w6 我想这应该是个不错的突破口.

English: [ Shaman Turell ]\nGreetings, Traveller.@w3 I believe this is the first time we have spoken, isn't it?@w6\nWill you take salt with me and we can discuss spiritual matters?
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ]\n你好，旅行者.@w3 我想这是我们第一次说上话，对吧?@w6 \n你可以和我一起搞点盐吗，然后我们可以谈谈灵魂方面的问题?

English: <color=#2eafff>I need to talk to you about something important, Shaman.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我需要和你谈一些很重要的事，萨满.</color>

English: [ Shaman Turell ] Ah,@w4 I see you aren't familiar with our traditions yet.@w5 Allow me to explain the ritual.@w6 It's nothing religious, just a customary greeting usually between friends after a time spent apart.@w8 I believe it dates back several centuries to the ancestral home of the Tal'on people in this galaxy.@w5 A harsh desert planet. Hot, dry and barren.@w4 Now long forgotten and abandoned I suspect.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] The hot sun would bake the salt from one's body over time and the act of 'taking salt' was to replenish one's body.@w5 Salt was precious and offering it was a symbol of unity and friendship.@w7 Nowadays, we typically use less salt; often applied to preserved meat rather than straight as the need is no longer there.@w4 But the tradition remains...@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] I can see you don't have time for salt, Commander.@w5 So why don't you tell me what you're really here for?
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 啊，@w4 可以看出来你对我们的传统并不熟悉.@w5 让我和你解释一下这个礼仪.@w6 这并不关乎宗教，只是和朋友分开一段时间以后习惯性的问候而已.@w8 据我所知这种礼仪可以追溯到几百年前泰隆祖先还在母星上的时候.@w5 那是一个环境严酷的沙漠星球. 炎热，干旱且荒凉.@w4 现在早已被忘记.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 炽热的太阳会把人身上的盐烤出来而'拿盐'就是指的补充身体.@w5 盐是非常珍贵的资源，所以被作为团结和友谊的象征.@w7 现在，我们盐用的不多了；经常用来腌肉而不是直接吃了.@w4 但是传统就保留了下来...@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 可以看出来你没时间吃盐了，指挥官.@w5 所以为何不说说你来这里的目的呢?

English: <color=#2eafff>I need to talk to you about something important, Shaman.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我需要和你谈一些很重要的事，萨满.</color>

English: [ Shaman Turell ] Yes, I heard your conversation with the Chief.@w5 No, I cannot convince him to change his mind.@w4 Believe me, i've tried.@w3 He's as stubborn as a Lizardmule.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Actually, I just wanted to know if you knew who he was planning to appoint as the next Chief.@w3 If I knew who it was, at least I could brief them on the dangerous situation and at least give them more options.@w6 @p8 [ Shaman Turell ] The appointment of a Clan Chief is actually performed by the village Shaman.@w5 And would you look at that?@w4 That's me.@w7 The Chief can put forward a recommendation, which is usually chosen.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] Unfortunately...@w4 there's no longer any good candidates for the role and that's the current issue.@w7 Geam was actually a frontrunner for the position,@w4 but he was one of the hunters that ran off with Ki'eve.
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 没错，我听到你和酋长的谈话了.@w5 然后不，我没办法说服他回心转意.@w4 相信我，我早就试过了.@w3 他就和蜥蜴骡一样固执.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 实际上，我只是想知道下一任谁预计会成为酋长.@w3 如果我知道人选，至少我可以向他们阐明现在的危险境地，让他们有更多的选择.@w6 @p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 甄选酋长这件事其实是萨满的职责.@w5 And 你意识到了吗?@w4 也就是我.@w7 酋长可以有自己推举人，通常也一定会成为继任者.@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 不幸的是...@w4 现在最大的问题就是没有合适的候选人.@w7 Geam 之前实际上在竞争中遥遥领先，@w4 但他就是那四个跑掉的猎人之一.

English: <color=#2eafff>Isn't there someone else? I find it hard to believe that there was only one candidate.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那难道就没有别人了吗? 我真不敢相信候选人就只有一个.</color>

English: [ Shaman Turell ] As much as I am honored by your suggestion, it is against the rules of the clans for a Shaman to become Clan Chief. @w6 Besides,@w2 I don't want that much responsibility.@w5 I have the village's spiritual needs to and that takes up much of my time.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] There are a couple of acolytes in the Ziggurat Temple that would probably do a good job, but they would need to give up their vocation, which i'm afraid they won't do.
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 虽然你的提议真的令我受宠若惊， 但是萨满就任酋长之位实在是不合礼法.@w6 况且，@w2 我并不想承担这么大的责任.@w5 光是村子里这些祭祀工作就已经忙不过来了.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 金字塔神庙里的一些追随者也许可以成为不错的酋长，但是这会迫使他们放弃自己的职责，他们多半不会这么做.

English: Surely there's someone else on this planet?I find it hard to believe that there's so few candidates.
Chinese (simplified): 当然另外的 某个人 也确实可以?我实在难以想印你们就只有这么点候选人.

English: [ Shaman Turell ] Of the five candidates, two were killed a cycle ago by your people while rendering aid. Mistaken for the enemies that destroyed your vessels.@w6 No, I do not blame your people for their actions.@w5 Some may,@w4 but I know the actions of the fearful and panicked for I see them every day when my clan comes to me to seek spiritual guidance.@w8 @p9 [ Shaman Turell ] They know that things here are coming to a head and that it's only a matter of time before the Zirax come in force.@w6 We will defend ourselves as best we can when the time comes.@w4 We will not curl up and take our beating like the Chief believes we should.@w2 We will fight.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] And the other candidates? What happened to them?@p7 [ Shaman Turell ] I'm afraid that two of the remaining candidates, Geam and Torma were among those who joined Ki'eve in his betrayal.@w6 They were idealistic, young and yes,@w3 stupid.@w3 But their hearts were in the right place and it may come to pass that they were right after all@w5 and seeking reconciliation with the Zirax is indeed the way to go.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] The final candidate is Khalad,@w2 my Nephew. @w6 He,@w3 like you,@w3 wanted us to break free of the Zirax's oppression.@w6 A good ideal,@w3 but one that threatened to upset the status quo between us and the zirax in a time of relative peace.@w7 This was a year before the balance was tipped by your people.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] What happened to him then?@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] He insulted the chief,@w2 among other things.@w5 I had to get him out from underfoot for a while,@w3 So I sent him to the Ziggurat to be a Temple Guardian in the hopes that he would cool his head a bit.@w4 I have not heard from him since...
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 在5个候选人中，有两个在去年试图伸出援手的时候被你们的人误杀了. 他们被当成了摧毁飞船的敌人.@w6 我并不是想因为他们的行为而怪罪你.@w5 也许有一点，@w4 但每天在我的族人来寻求神明指导时，我都能感受到他们的恐惧.@w8 @p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 他们知道自己大祸临头，兹瑞克斯派出部队只是时间问题.@w6 他们来时，我们会尽可能抵抗.@w4 我们 不会 c像酋长认为的那样蜷缩起来任由践踏.@w2 我们会战斗.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那其他的候选人呢? 他们怎么样了?@p7 [ Turell萨满 ] 很可惜剩下的两个候选人， Geam 和 Torma 都和 Ki'eve 一起叛变了.@w6 他们年轻，理想主义，而且就和你想的一样，@w3 愚蠢.@w3 但是他们的想法是好的，而且说不定到最后他们实际上是对的@w5 毕竟和兹瑞克斯和解确实是一个方案.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 最后的候选人名叫 Khalad，@w2 我的侄子.@w6 他，@w3 就和你一样，@w3 想要从兹瑞克斯的压迫中解放出来.@w6 想法很好，@w3 但是你设想一下，在我们和兹瑞克斯之间相对和平的这段时间里出现了一个威胁.@w7 然而就在一年前平衡被你们人类打破了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那他怎么样了?@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 他冒犯了酋长，@w2 当然还有其他的一些事.@w5 我只能把他逐出村子清醒一下，@w3 所以我把他送去了 金字塔 并让他成为了一名守卫，希望他可以借此冷静下来.@w4 我已经很久没有听到他的消息了...

English: <color=#2eafff>What is this 'Ziggurat' place? I'm guessing it's a temple of some kind.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>这个'金字塔' 在什么地方? 我猜它应该是某种神庙.</color>

English: [ Shaman Turell ] The Ziggurat Temple is the religious focal point for this planet.@w5 Aside from keeping some secrets hidden, @w3 it is also a refuge from persecution by our Zirax overseers as they will very rarely venture near it for fear of us shaman's 'mystical powers' @w8 @p8 [ Shaman Turell ] The Zirax House of Xenu are a superstitious bunch and turning their lights off and on a couple of times upsets them more than you would expect of trained soldiers.@w7 It is where I was trained many years ago for my role here as the Village Shaman,@w5 just as many others like myself were trained as shamen for other villages.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] Now I wish i'd remained in touch with my nephew...@w6 I have neglected my own familial obligations to tend to those of other families...@w7 If you are going there, Traveller.@w3 Please tell my nephew to come home.@w4 It's been long enough.
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 金子塔神庙是这颗星球的宗教中心.@w5 除了用于保守一些秘密之外，@w3 它也同样时我们用于逃离兹瑞克斯监视者的避难所，因为害怕我们这些萨满的'神秘力量'他们一般都不会涉足那里@w8 @p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 兹瑞克斯的 泽纽家族是一个非常迷信的分支，你只需要闪几下他们的灯就会让他们那些训练有素的士兵表现出和自己身份不符的动摇.@w7 这就是这么多年以来我为了萨满的工作而训练的能力，@w5 就和其他村庄里那些萨满接受的训练一样.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 现在我真希望我还和侄子有联系...@w6 我忽视了我自己的家庭职责，而去关心其他的家庭...@w7 如果你要去那里，旅行者.@w3 请告诉我的侄子让他回家.@w4 已经太久了.

English: [ Temple Guardian ]\nYou there!@w3\nWhat's your business in our sacred place?@w3 Wait...@w3 What ARE you?
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守卫 ]\n那边的那个人!@w3 \n你到这个神圣的地方来做什么?@w3 不对...@w3 你 到底是 什么人?

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm Commander {PlayerName} of the UCH. I need to speak to someone in charge.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我是UCH所属的指挥官 {PlayerName}. 我需要和你们这里的管理人员谈谈.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>I have a message for someone called Khalad from his Uncle, Turell.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我是来给一个叫Khalad的人捎带他叔叔Turell的口信的.</color>
<color=#2eafff>请让开. 我有要事要进去.</color>

English: [ Temple Guardsman ] Hrmph! One of those Terran creatures.@w3 Yes, I know about your kind.@w3 Here to make an apology are you?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Something like that.@p5 [ Temple Guardsman ] Alright, you may enter.@w2 As long as you do not disclose any of our practices within these walls with outsiders or the Zirax.@w5 The High Shaman is up those stairs in the Room of the Sun.@w3 He is the one you're looking for.@w3 Do not take up too much of his time, Terran.
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守卫 ] 哼! 地球人.@w3 是的，我知道你们这种.@w3 你是来谢罪对吧?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 和那差不多.@p5 [ 神庙守卫 ] 行了，你可以进去 .@w2 只要你不把我们在里面的事透露给外来者或是兹瑞克斯就行.@w5 至高萨满就在楼上的日之间.@w3 他就是你要找的人.@w3 不要浪费他太多时间，地球人.

English: [ Temple Guardian ] Khalad? That little firebrand?!@w3 I hate to tell you this, friend. But he's long gone.@w3 The High Shaman had him transferred to a watchtower after he ruined Shaman Dolmac's services a week after he arrived.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Oh no...@w3 What happened?@p5 [ Temple Guardian, Boff ] He threw Dried Firemoss into the incense brazier during services and filled the room with 'toxic' smoke.@w3 The entire congregation were running around trying to hide raging boners for the rest of the day.@w3 It was the most hilarious thing i've ever seen in all my time here!@p9 [ Temple Guardian, Boff ] Naturally, Dolmac was furious and wanted Khalad flogged for blasphemy and out on his ear.@w3 The High Shaman Orizel disagreed with the seriousness of the offense and had him sent to one of the watchtower outposts instead.@w5 He may seem like a dried old stick, but Orizel knows a good joke when he sees one and Dolmac certainly deserved it.@p9 [ Temple Guardian, Boff ] Okay, you can go through.@w5 Orizel is up those stairs in the Room of the Sun at the top.@w2 He's the one you'll want to speak to.@w4 I recommend that you don't talk to Dolmac though.@w3 He has Zirax leanings and will probably be an officious ass.
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守护者 ] Khalad? 就那个小火把?!@w3 虽然很不想这么和你说，朋友. 但他很久之前就走了.@w3 他来之后一个星期就坏了Dolmac萨满的事，所以至高萨满把他调到了一个瞭望塔.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 哦不...@w3 发生了什么?@p5 [ 神庙守护者，Boff ] 他在祭祀仪式的时候把干掉的火藓丢到了香炉里，搞得整个房间乌烟瘴气.@w3 第二天那些参会者都想着怎么掩盖自己肿胀的下体.@w3 我这辈子没见过更搞笑的事了!@p9 [ 神庙守护者，Boff ] 通常来说，Dolmac肯定会极其败坏地让他为自己的亵渎挨鞭子.@w3 但是至高萨满Orizel并不认为这事有那么严重，然后就把他派去了一个瞭望塔.@w5 他虽然看起来是个干瘪的老头，但是Orizel知道这是个玩笑而且Dolmac也确实活该.@p9 [ 神庙守护者，Boff ] 行了，你可以过去了.@w5 Orizel就在顶楼的日之间.@w2 他就是你要找的人.@w4 我建议你 最好不要 去找Dolmac.@w3 这人不仅屁股歪(精兹瑞克斯)，还喜欢多管闲事.

English: <color=#2eafff>Won't you get in trouble for letting me through?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你就这么放我过去不会惹上麻烦吗?</color>

English: [ Temple Guardian ] I don't care if you have business inside. You're not getting past me!@p7 [ Temple Guardian ] If you want in, you will hand over all your ammunition. We don't want any incidents while you're on the grounds and you will say nothing to anyone about the practices that go on inside this temple. Do you understand?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Understood.
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守护者 ] 你在里面有什么事与我无关. 但是你不能从这里过!@p7 [ 神庙守护者 ] 如果想进去，你 就必须 上交所有弹药. 我们可不想你在这里惹出什么乱子，也不想告诉任何人我们在神庙里的作为. 明白了吗?@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然.

English: <color=#2eafff>Do I get my ammo back when I leave?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我离开的时候能拿走我的弹药吗?</color>
[ 神庙守护者 ]\n废话少说，快离开吧.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] High Shaman Orizel?@p5 [ High Shaman Orizel ] Yes?@w2 I am he...@w4 What guidance can I give to you in these troubled times, stranger?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I am looking for a Temple Guardian by the name of 'Khalad'.@w4 He is@w3... needed back home.@w4 His uncle sent him here for training.@p8 [ High Shaman Orizel ] Ah...@w3 Young Khalad.@w3 I'm afraid he is no longer with us...@w3 He took a prank a bit too far shortly after joining us and I was forced to transfer him out of the temple for his own safety.@w3 I have not heard of him since he left, two cycles ago...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 您就是至高萨满Orizel?@p5 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 是的?@w2 我就是...@w4 在这乱世之中你想要寻求什么启示，陌生人?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我正在寻找一个叫做'Khalad'的守卫.@w4 他@w3 ... 必须回到家中.@w4 他的叔叔把他送到这里接受训练.@p8 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 啊...@w3 年轻的Khalad.@w3 恐怕他已经不在这里了...@w3 他加入我们之后开了个非常过火的玩笑，为了他的安全我不得不把他逐出了神庙.@w3 他走了之后我已经有两年没听到他的消息了...

English: <color=#2eafff>Do you know where he is now?</color>

[ High Shaman Orizel ] Young Khalad...@w5 Well, he had heard of Shaman Dolmac's leanings towards the zirax in his interpretation of the spirit's wills during one of his sermons in the Room of the Moon.@w5 That seems to have rubbed young Khalad the wrong way...@w6 The 'prank' he pulled the next morning could've had dangerous results were any of the participants weak of heart...@p9 [ High Shaman Orizel ] He...@w3 well, he...@w2 Put a rather sizable quantity of Dried Firemoss in the temple's incense pot during Dolmac's next morning sermon.@w4 The effects of inhaled firemoss smoke is quite potent and...@w2 ahh...@w2 'invigorating' for males.@w4 I recall that there were a lot of acolytes and parishioners running about clutching their robes that day.@p9 [ High Shaman Orizel ] Needless to say,@w2 Dolmac was out for blood that day.@w3 I was determined that none be shed under my roof and had Khalad transferred to the Watch command as soon as I found out what he had done.
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 年轻的Khalad...@w5 是这样的，他在萨满Dolmac在月之间布道时发现了他倒向兹瑞克斯的倾向.@w5 那些话似乎惹毛了年轻的Khalad...@w6 他第二天早上的恶作剧实际上是非常危险的，如果哪个成员心脏不好...@p9 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 他...@w3 怎么说呢， 他...@w2 在Dolmac第二天的布道会之前，把相当多的干燥火藓放进了寺庙的香炉.@w4 吸入火藓烟雾的效果是非常强劲...@w2 而且...@w2 ‘壮阳’.@w4 我记得那天很多追随者和教徒都捂着袍子跑掉了.@p9 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 不用我说你也知道，@w2 Dolmac直接失去了理智.@w3 我当时就知道者不可能是 我 手下的人干的，在发现这件事的始作俑者是Khalad之后，我就把他调去了瞭望塔.

English: <color=#2eafff>Do you know where he is now?</color>

[ High Shaman Orizel ] I believe he was assigned to one of the temple's outlying watchtowers.@w3 I do not know which one.@w3 What is this all about, anyway?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] What's your opinion on the Zirax... occupation of this planet, your grace?@p5 [ High Shaman Orizel ] So that's what this is about...@w6 Chief Na'tuk is finally standing down as Clan Chief and you want Khalad to take his place, do you not?
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 我想他应该是被送到了外围的某个瞭望塔.@w3 但是我不知道具体是哪个.@w3 但你究竟为什么要问这些?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你对兹瑞克斯有什么看法... 特别是关于占据这颗星球，尊贵的阁下?@p5 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 原来是这样...@w6 Na'tuk终于要卸任酋长了，而你 希望Khalad接过大权，不是吗?

English: <color=#2eafff>For now, I just need to find him. Decisions like that come later.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>现在我只需要找到他. 其他的决定以后再说.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>No, his uncle just wants to get back in touch.</color>
<color=#2eafff>Khalad is the best bet for a free future for the Tal'on.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>Khalad是泰隆自由未来的最后希望.</color>

English: [ High Shaman Orizel ] A good answer, Stranger.@w4 A foolish man takes his only choice to be his best choice.@w3 I would worry if you were so quick to accept Khalad without ever having met him and knowing so little.@p7 [ High Shaman Orizel ] It is a fine thing to be a warrior where a warrior is needed; but it does not do well to have a warrior where one needs a leader.@w3 He will see every obstacle as an enemy to be conquered.@w3 Though in this I do not believe Khalad will make a poor leader.@w2 But he is want to roam and will need challenges to keep him tied down in times of peace.
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 很好的回答，陌生人.@w4 只有傻子才会把自己唯一的答案当作最佳答案.@w3 你在甚至都没有见过或者了解过他一点的情况下这么快就接受了他是最好的选择，实在是令我非常担心.@p7 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 在需要勇士的地方成为勇士固然很好；但是我们需要的是领导者，那就不是什么好事了.@w3 他会把自己路上所有的阻碍都当成敌人来征服.@w3 虽然我并不认为Khalad会成为糟糕的领导者.@w2 但是在和平的这段时间里，他还是需要在外面漫游，让这些挑战暂时束缚住他.

English: <color=#2eafff>You believe Khalad will make a good chief?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你觉得Khalad可以成为一个优秀的酋长?</color>

English: [ High Shaman Orizel ] I'm not one so easy to deceive, stranger.@w2 I would not make a good spiritual leader if I were.@w5 I'm sure that Turell does desire to reaffirm relations with his nephew,@w2 but that is surely not your purpose for searching for him.@w2 I only hope that your efforts are not misplaced.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You think Khalad would make a bad leader?@p5 [ High Shaman Orizel ] No, he would probably make a fine leader.@w4 It is a fine thing to be a warrior where a warrior is needed; but it does not do well to have a warrior where one needs a leader...@w3 for he will see every obstacle as an enemy to be conquered.@w5 If peace should come,@w2 there will need to be something to keep him tied down and focused.
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 我不是那种轻易下结论的人，陌生人.@w2 如果我是，我也就没办法成为好的精神领袖了.@w5 我很确信Turell 确实 想要与自己的侄子团聚，@w2 但那肯定不是 你 找他的目的.@w2 我只希望你不要白费力气.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 那你觉得Khalad不能成为一名优秀的领导者吗?@p5 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 恰恰相反，我觉得他很有可能做的不错.@w4 在需要勇士的地方成为勇士固然很好；但是我们需要的是领导者，那就不是什么好事了...@w3 他会把自己路上所有的阻碍都当成敌人来征服.@w5 如果可以达成和平，@w2 就得有些东西来束缚他，让他能够专注.

English: <color=#2eafff>So you think Khalad will make a good chief?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>所以说你觉得Khalad可以成为一个优秀的酋长?</color>

English: [ High Shaman Orizel ] That's a worrying answer, Stranger.@w4 You have never met young Khalad and have only tales of his personality on which to base your judgement.@w2 Tales which should not inspire such confidences if I am to be honest.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] You think Khalad would make a bad leader?@p5 [ High Shaman Orizel ] It is a fine thing to be a warrior where a warrior is needed; but it does not do well to have a warrior where one needs a leader...@w3 for he will see every obstacle as an enemy to be conquered.@w3 Though in this I do not believe Khalad will make a poor leader.@w2 But he is want to roam and will need challenges to keep him tied down in times of peace.
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 这个答案令人担忧，陌生人.@w4 你还没有见过他本人，仅凭自己的道听途说对他做出了判断.@w2 说实话，听来的故事并不适合用来激发信心.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你觉得Khalad不能成为一名优秀的领导者吗?@p5 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 在需要勇士的地方成为勇士固然很好; 但是我们需要的是领导者，那就不是什么好事了...@w3 他会把自己路上所有的阻碍都当成敌人来征服.@w3 虽然在这一点上我并不认为Khalad会成为糟糕 的领导者.@w2 但是在和平的这段时间里，他还是需要在外面漫游，让这些挑战暂时束缚住他.

English: <color=#2eafff>You think Khalad is a bad choice then?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那这么说你认为Khalad并不是合适的人选?</color>

English: [ High Shaman Orizel ] I will withhold my judgement of young Kalad.@w3 Only time will tell whether or not he will make a good chief.@p7 [ High Shaman Orizel ] If you have no further need of my guidance, stranger...@w3 Then I must return to my prayers.@w4 May the Spirits guide you to Empyrion...
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 我对年轻的Khalad持保留态度.@w3 只有时间会告诉我们他是否能成为优秀的酋长.@p7 [ 至高萨满Orizel ] 如果你不需要我的引导了，陌生人...@w3 我必须回到我的信众身边.@w4 愿神灵引导你走向Empyrion...

English: [ Watchtower Guardian ] State your business, Trespasser!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Easy there, Friend!@w6 I'm looking for one of your fellow Guardians by the name of Khalad.@w3 High Shaman Orizel said he was assigned here.@p7 [ Watchtower Guardian ] There's no one here by that name. @w5 But...@w3 I was only assigned here last month.@w3 K'zal is the captain of the watch, he would know who that is better than me.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] And can you tell me where I might find K'zal?@p6 [ Watchtower Guardian ] It's his watch now,@w2 so he's up top.
Chinese (simplified): [ 瞭望塔守卫 ] 表明你的来意，闯入者!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] ，别那么紧张，朋友!@w6 我只是来找一个叫Khalad的人，他和你们一样也是守卫.@w3 至高萨满Orizel说是他被派到这里来了.@p7 [ 瞭望塔守卫 ] 这里没有叫那个名字的人.@w5 不过...@w3 我也是上个月才被分到这里的.@w3 K'zal 是这座塔的队长他应该比我清楚.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那能麻烦你告诉我在哪能找到K'zal吗?@p6 [ 瞭望塔守卫 ] 现在是他的值班时间，@w2 所以他现在就在上面.

English: [ High Shaman Orizel ]\nI must return to my prayers, Stranger.@w4\nYou can find young Khalad in one of the Temple's outlying watchtowers.
Chinese (simplified): [ 至高萨满Orizel ]\n我必须回到信众身边了，陌生人.@w4 \n你可以在神庙外围的某座瞭望塔找到Khalad.

English: The High Shaman appears to be deep in prayer.\nIt wouldn't be nice to disturb him.
Chinese (simplified): 至高萨满似乎忙于信众事宜.\n看上去不应该再去打扰他了.

English: [ Captain K'zal ]\nI saw you when you walked out the door of the Ziggurat.@w4\nSo what brings you to me, stranger?@w3 It must be important if the newbie sent you up to me.
Chinese (simplified): [ K'zal队长 ]\n我看到 你 从金字塔里出来了.@w4 \n所以是什么风把你给吹到这来了，陌生人?@w3 既然那个新人叫你来见我，那应该挺重要的.

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm looking for Khalad. They said he was sent here two years ago, but the guy downstairs said he's never heard of him.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我是来找Khalad的. 他们说他两年前被送来了这里，但是楼下那位说从来没见过这个人.</color>

English: [ Captain K'zal ] The Zirax?@w2 Bastards. The lot of them.@w4 The galaxy would be a better place without them.@p7 [ Captain K'zal ] But...@w3 There's nothing we can do about it.@w3 We avoid provoking them and make ourselves as unattractive as targets as possible.@w3 We have bows and arrows, not plasma and artillery.@w7 And don't YOU go picking fights on our behalf, either.@p8 [ Captain K'zal ] Is that all you wanted to ask?
Chinese (simplified): [ K'zal队长 ] 兹瑞克斯?@w2 一群混蛋. 大部分都是.@w4 没有他们星系会好得多.@p7 [ K'zal队长 ] 但...@w3 我们什么都做不到.@w3 所以我们只能尽力让自己成为没有吸引力的目标，并且尽量不去挑衅他们.@w3 我们只有弓箭，而非等离子和火炮.@w7 你也不要以我们的名义去挑起战争 .@p8 [ K'zal队长 ] 这就是你要问的?

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm looking for Khalad. The temple said he was sent here two years ago.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我在找Khalad. 神庙里的人说他两年前被送到这里来了.</color>

English: [ Captain K'zal ] Dolmac finally track him down did he?@w3 Hate to spoil your surprise, but Khalad's long gone.@w3 Jumped ship after a month on the job and headed across the plains for Zirax Territory.@p8 [ Captain K'zal ] Dumb bastard!@w2 He's been hitting their drones with weapons he's taken off their scouts.@w4 The Base Commander's put a bounty on his head and made sure that if we help him, we're all dead too.@w3 He's gonna get us all killed!
Chinese (simplified): [ K'zal队长 ] Dolmac终于找上门了，是吗?@w3 我只能剧透一下了， Khalad早就走了.@w3 在这工作了一个多月之后他突然就跑了，独自前往兹瑞克斯领地.@p8 [ K'zal队长 ] 这蠢蛋!@w2 他居然在用从兹瑞克斯侦察兵身上搜刮来的武器打他们的无人机.@w4 基地的指挥官也因此悬赏了他的项上人头，如果我们帮了他，也会是死路一条.@w3 他迟早会把我们全害死的!
<color=#2eafff>兹瑞克斯武器? 他会用那玩意?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Do you know where he is now?</color>

[ {PlayerName} ] I was always under the impression that zirax weapons were locked to the individual and couldn't be used.@p7 [ Captain K'zal ] Naw.@w2 They'd be too expensive to mass-produce if they put all that fancy stuff in them for those dumb grunts they've got.@w3 They work well enough,@w2 better than your average guns.@w2 But they wear out quickly and can't be repaired.@w4 It's all to stop us and others who might be unfriendly to the zirax from arming ourselves with their weapons.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我一直以为兹瑞克斯的武器都是只有对应的个体才能使用的.@p7 [ K'zal队长 ] 并不是.@w2 如果每把枪上都有那种花里胡哨的东西，给每个丘八都发一把未免也太贵了.@w3 而且这些武器确实好用，@w2 和你们的制式武器相比.@w2 不过他们的武器磨损的很快而且没法修.@w4 做成这样也就是为了防止我们或者任何与兹瑞克斯为敌的人批量装备他们的武器.

English: <color=#2eafff>And Khalad? Do you know where he is now?</color>

[ Captain K'zal ] Yeah...@w3 You're not with the zirax are you?@w2 Not in it for the money?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] No.@w2 He's needed back home, so i've come to get him.@p7 [ Captain K'zal ] Alright,@w2 i'll hold you to your word.@w4 Khalad is holed up in an old ruin up near the borders. It used to be a water tank or something a few hundred years ago and now he uses it to hide from drone patrols.@w3 He comes down once a week to get supplies from trappers and hunters and doesn't stick around.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Thanks for your help, Captain.@w3 I guess it's time to pay a visit to Khalad.@w2 It's about time we had a chat.@p6 [ Captain K'zal ] Good luck, stranger.
Chinese (simplified): [ K'zal队长 ] 是啊...@w3 你不是和兹瑞克斯一伙的?@w2 也不是为了钱?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 不.@w2 他必须回家，所以我必须找到他.@p7 [ K'zal队长 ] 行吧，@w2 我信了.@w4 Khalad就躲在边界上的一片废墟里. 几百年前那地方是个储水罐一类的东西，现在他就用那里来躲避无人机的巡逻.@w3 每过几周他都会从捕手和猎人那里搞点补给然后立刻消失.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 感谢您的帮助，队长.@w3 我想是时候去见Khalad一面了.@w2 我们必须谈谈.@p6 [ K'zal队长 ] 祝你好运，陌生人.

English: [ Captain K'zal ]\nYou're back? I thought I told you where to find Khalad.@w3\nDon't tell me you forgot.
Chinese (simplified): [ K'zal队长 ]\n你回来了? 我应该告诉过你去哪里找Khalad了.@w3 \n别告诉我你忘了.

English: <color=#2eafff>Sorry Captain. It must've slipped my mind.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>不好意思队长. 我记性不太好.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>No, it's all good. Just enjoying the view from up here.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>不，一切都很好. 欣赏上面的风景吧.</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Nice view from up here, isn't it?@p7 [ Captain K'zal ] Yes it is.@w4 If you don't have any business with me, Stranger...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这上面风景真不错，不是吗?@p7 [ K'zal队长 ] 是啊.@w4 如果你没别的事了，陌生人...

English: <color=#2eafff>Say no more! I'll just leave you to your thing, Captain.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>无需多言! 我这就走，队长.</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt's a private computer system.@w3\nI can't access any of the files and the system is locked.@w2 I'd better leave it alone.@w3 It's probably important to a mission somewhere.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是个个人计算机系统.@w3 \n我什么都没法访问，它锁定了.@w2 我最好还是不要碰它.@w3 也许它和某个任务有关.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThis is Khalad's private terminal.@w3\nI'm not authorized to use it and the system is logged out.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是Khalad的私人终端.@w3 \n我没有访问权限，它也处于下线状态.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] The console is active.@w3 Okay, let's see what I can find on here...@p7 < Punahana Rorohiko o te tutu - p1.7.10 >@w3 < Utaina >@w3 .@w2 .@w2 .@w3 < Whakatakotoranga Reo: Tal'on >@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Well, this isn't going to work.@w3 Let's see if I can change the language settings...@p8 < Computer System of the Rebellion - V1.7.10 > < Loading >@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w3 < Language Setting: UCH Standard (English) >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Okay,@w2 There we go.@p5 < Computer System of the Rebellion - V1.7.10 > - ZRX Patrol Timetables - ZRX Engineering Schematics - ZRX Shipping Manifest - 15 more items...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 控制台还能用.@w3 好，让我看看能找到些什么...@p7 < Punahana Rorohiko o te tutu - p1.7.10 >@w3 < Utaina >@w3 .@w2 .@w2 .@w3 < Whakatakotoranga Reo: 泰隆 >@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊这，这可行不通.@w3 看看能不能调整语言设置...@p8 < 反抗军计算机系统 - V1.7.10 > < 加载中 >@w2 .@w2 .@w2 .@w3 < 语言设置：UCH标准语言(简体中文) >@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 成了，@w2 这 就好了.@p5 < 反抗军计算机系统 - V1.7.10 > - ZRX 巡逻时刻表 - ZRX 工程图纸 - ZRX 货运清单 - 15 个其他物品...

English: [ {PlayerName} ] It looks like a list of departure times and arrivals between zirax bases on the planet for drones.@w3 There's another list for troop distribution, classification and equipment loadout.@w3 With this, you could avoid any patrol or hit the ones carrying valuable equipment...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 看起来像是这颗星球上无人机在基地之间出发和到达的时间表.@w3 还有部队驻扎的位置， 兵种和装备.@w3 有了这些，你就可以避开无人机去袭击那些运送高价值设备的目标了...

English: [ {PlayerName} ] It's a compilation of engineering schematics for power relays, capacitors, sewage systems, cargo transporter blueprints, shield prechargers.@w3 There's even structural blueprints for the Zirax Armory, Spaceport and even the Drone Base.@w5 How did he even get all these?
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这是一份工程图纸的合集，包括了动力中继器，电容器，污水处理系统，货物运输机，护盾充能器.@w3 这里甚至有兹瑞克斯军械库，航天站以至无人机基地的结构图纸.@w5 他究竟是怎么搞到这些的?

English: [ {PlayerName} ] This looks like a list of cargo being shipped over land by a convoy of Cargo Transporters between the Spaceport, Armory and Drone Base.@w5 It looks like the convoy has been tagged...@p2 [ Voice ] Turn around.@w4 Slowly...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这看起来像是一份货物列表，这批货物是由一堆运输机车队在航天站，军械库和无人机基地之间运送的.@w5 看上去这车队被盯上了...@p2 [ 背后的声音 ] 转过身来.@w4 慢慢的...

English: [ Khalad ] You're not supposed to see me yet.@w3 I only appear after you've accessed the Computer, but if you're playing on a server and someone has completed the mission recently, then I will be left spawned from when they did the mission.@w5 Just ignore me and speak to the computer. Fun Fact: I am named after a character from David Eddings' Elenium and Tamuli series of novels.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你现在还不应该看到我.@w3 我只应该在你访问了计算机之后出现，但是如果你是在服务器上游玩，我可能是 其他玩家 生成后没有刷新掉的.@w5 你只需要无视我先去摸下旁边的电脑就行了. 热知识： 我的名字来源于David Eddings的Elenium 以及 Tamuli系列小说.

English: [ Khalad ] Breaking into someone's home is a good way to get yourself shot, Commander. @w4 Yes,@w2 I know who you are, Commander {PlayerName}.@w2 It's kinda hard to miss a fireball falling through the atmosphere around here.@p8 [ Khalad ] What I don't know, is why you're here.@w4 So why ARE you here?@w3 And how did you find me?
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 如果你想吃枪子话，私自闯进别人家里会是个不错的选择，指挥官.@w4 没错，@w2 我知道你是谁，{PlayerName}指挥官.@w2 天上掉下来的火球想不知道都很难.@p8 [ Khalad ] 我 不 知道的是， 你为什么在 这里.@w4 所以说你 为什么 在这里?@w3 你究竟是怎么找到我的?

English: <color=#2eafff>You're needed back home, Khalad. The Clan Chief is old and needs someone to replace him. That someone is you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你必须回家了，Khalad. 氏族的酋长太老了，需要有人来接班. 这个有人说的就是你.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Your uncle sent me to find you. He wants you to come home.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你叔叔让我来找你的. 他希望你能回去.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Honestly, I just got lost and found this place by accident.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>说实话，我只是迷路了，误打误撞地找到了这里.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>We've been trying to reach you about your extended car warranty.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我们是来和你谈谈延长汽车保修的.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] My extended what?@w3 What the hell is a 'car'?@w4 Are you sure you're...@w3 alright in the head?@p8 [ Khalad ] Dolmac sent you, didn't he?!@w4 That slimy, corrupt, zirax-loving turdburglar!!@w3 I knew it was only a matter of time before he found me@w2 but I didn't expect a UCH Commander to be the one he sent.@w5 How much did he pay you to kill me?!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Woah!@w4 I don't know this Dolmac guy!@w5 It was just a joke!@w2 A bit of earth-humor.@p8 [ Khalad ] And that passes for comedy on your homeworld?@w4 I weep for your species.@w6 So why are you really here? And no jokes this time!
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 我的延长什么?@w3 '汽车'是个什么玩意?@w4 你确定你...@w3 脑子没问题吗?@p8 [ Khalad ] Dolmac派你来的，不是吗?!@w4 那个黏糊糊的，腐败的，精兹偷屎犯!!@w3 我就知道他找到我只是时间问题@w2 但是我没预料到他派来的是个UCH的指挥官.@w5 他给你多少钱来杀我?!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 喔哦!@w4 我不认得什么Dolmac!@w5 只是开个玩笑!@w2 地球式的幽默而已.@p8 [ Khalad ] 这就是你们母星上的 喜剧 ?@w4 真为你们的种族感到可悲.@w6 所以说你 到底 为什么来这? 这次不许开玩笑了!

English: <color=#2eafff>The Clan Chief is old and needs to be replaced. You're that replacement.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>氏族的酋长太老了，需要有人来接班. 你就是那个接班人.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Your uncle sent me to find you and bring you home.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你的叔叔让我来找你并把你带回家.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] You got lost in a very unusual fashion, friend.@w4 Most people wander around in circles,@w2 but you...@w3 you came straight here from the Temple.@w3 You're not exactly quiet...@w2 or subtle in your travelling.@p7 [ Khalad ] So why don't you tell me why you're really here?@w2 And don't lie to me either.@w5 If I think for a second you're a zirax spy, after the bounty on my head or work for Dolmac then i'm putting bolt between those stupid-looking eyebrows on your goofy-looking face.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你这迷路还真是奇特，朋友.@w4 大部分都是打转，@w2 但你...@w3 就直接从神庙跑到这来了.@w3 你路上并不是一句不发...@w2 或者说不是很注重细节.@p7 [ Khalad ] 所以为什么不说说你 来这真正的 目的?@w2 也不要撒谎.@w5 我只要有一秒钟觉得你是兹瑞克斯间谍，想要我的人头去交赏金或者是Dolmac的走狗 ，我就会用弩箭让你那张蠢脸脑洞大开.

English: <color=#2eafff>The Clan Chief is old and needs to be replaced. You're that replacement.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>氏族的酋长太老了，需要有人来接班. 你就是那个接班人.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Your uncle sent me to find you and bring you home.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你的叔叔让我来找你并把你带回家.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Not interested.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Didn't you hear what I said?@w3 You could be clan chief!@w5 You wouldn't need to wage your one-man war against the zirax anymore.@w3 You can organize the hunters and the warriors and take back this planet for yourselves!@p9 [ Khalad ] Didn't you hear what I said?@w5 NOT interested.@w6 Go sell your hopes and dreams to someone who cares.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You're the only candidate left!@w3 There's no one else left to be chief and you're the only one who takes the zirax threat seriously.@p8 [ Khalad ] Oh yeah?@w3 What about Geam and Torma?@w5 Either of those guys will make a better chief than I ever would.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Geam and Torma...@w4 They betrayed the clan, along with Ki'eve and two others.@w3 They joined the zirax, Khalad.@w5 I'm sorry.@p8 [ Khalad ] You're lying!@w2 They would never join the zirax!@w2 They would never betray the Clan!
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 我没兴趣.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你听不懂我说的话吗?@w3 你可以成为氏族的 酋长!@w5 你不需要在一人孤身对抗兹瑞克斯了.@w3 你可以带领猎人和武士们为你们夺回这颗星球!@p9 [ Khalad ] 你 是不是听不懂人话?@w5 没 兴趣.@w6 你最好和在乎的人推销你那点希望去吧.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你是 唯一 的人选了!@w3 没有其他人可以成为酋长了，而且你也是唯一看重兹瑞克斯威胁的.@p8 [ Khalad ] 哦是吗?@w3 那 Geam 和 Torma呢?@w5 他们谁当酋长不比我强.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Geam 和 Torma...@w4 他们和 Ki'eve 一起再加上另外两个人，一起背叛了氏族.@w3 他们跑去兹瑞克斯那边了，Khalad.@w5 我很抱歉.@p8 [ Khalad ] 你在说谎!@w2 他们 绝不会 加入兹瑞克斯!@w2 也 绝不会 背叛氏族!

English: [ Khalad ] It's a bit late for that, don't you think?@w2 It's been two cycles already.@w3 I'm just an afterthought to him,@w2 just like always.@w5 There's a reason isn't there?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] The clan chief is getting old and planning to retire.@w2 Your uncle wants you up there to take his place.@w2 You're the best, the only one for the job.@p7 [ Khalad ] Oh, so now i'm useful?!@w3 Well, tell him 'No thanks. Not interested.'@w4 I'm perfectly happy where I am,@w2 taking the fight to the enemy.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] But as chief you could organize the entire clan to fight the zirax!@w3 They're willing to fight, but they need you to lead them.@p8 [ Khalad ] You're just some outsider.@w2 Why's this so important to you?
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你不觉得太迟了吗?@w2 两年过去了.@w3 我只不过是事后诸葛亮的方案罢了，@w2 一如既往.@w5 总得有个原因不是吗?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 氏族的酋长已经太老了，他该退休了.@w2 你的叔叔希望 你 来继承他的位置.@w2 你是最佳，也是 唯一 的人选.@p7 [ Khalad ] 哦，所以 现在 又用得上我了?!@w3 那就告诉他，不好意思，没兴趣.'@w4 我现在在这里很开心，@w2 天天和兹瑞克斯斗智斗勇.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 但是如果当了酋长 你就可以组织整个氏族进行斗争!@w3 他们愿意战斗，但是他们需要 你 来领导他们.@p8 [ Khalad ] 你只是个外人.@w2 这和你有什么关系?

English: It's my fault... They were motivated by anger for my people, and in that anger they turned to the zirax for revenge.
Chinese (simplified): 因为这是 我的 错误造成的... 他们的动机来源于我门的人，也是这份怒火让他们想要向兹瑞克斯复仇.

English: <color=#2eafff>I failed your people... Because of the actions of my comrades some young hunters, motivated by anger turned to the zirax to exact revenge.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我辜负了你们的人民... 由于我同志们的行为，一些年轻的猎人真的就去向兹瑞克斯复仇了.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] No!@w2 They wouldn't!@w4 They know the zirax can't be trusted!@w3 There must be another reason!@w3 Tell me everything.@p9 < You relate your encounter and the events leading up to this point >@p8 [ Khalad ] Geam...@w3 Torma...@w3 Ki'eve...@w3 Or'lei...@w3 Phal'ru...@w6 If it wasn't for you...@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] I know...@w3 That's why i'm here,@w2 trying to make things right by putting the only person that can make a difference and protect the people from the mess I made in the position they're needed most.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I know it's not what you'd planned for, Khalad.@w3 But you're the only one who can take up the mantle of chief...@w3 for both our sakes.@w6 Will you do it?@p9 [ Khalad ]@w6 No...@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] But...@p4 [ Khalad ] The clan doesn't need me as it's leader.@w3 I know nothing of farming, or trading, or running a village and i'm no more spiritually-inclined than that fridge there.@w3 I'd have my uncle drinking himself to death in under a month.@p8 [ Khalad ] What I CAN do is ensure that they don't need a warrior like me as a leader by getting the zirax off this planet for good.@w4 If you'll help me, we can do it.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 不！@w2 他们不会的！@w4 他们知道兹瑞克斯不可信任！@w3 一定有其他原因！@w3 告诉我一切。@p9 < 你叙述了你的遭遇以及导致这一点的事件 >@p8 [ Khalad ] 吉亚姆...@w3 托玛...@w3 基埃夫...@w3 奥尔雷...@w3 法尔鲁...@w6 如果不是因为你...@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 我知道...@w3 这就是我在这里，@w2 试图通过让唯一能够产生影响并保护人们免受我造成的混乱的人，处于他们最需要的位置，来纠正事情。@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我知道这不是你计划中的，Khalad。@w3 但你是可以承担酋长职责的唯一人选...@w3 为了我们双方。@w6 你会做吗？@p9 [ Khalad ]@w6 不...@p4 [ {PlayerName} ] 但是...@p4 [ Khalad ] 氏族不需要我作为它的领导者。@w3 我对农业、贸易或管理村庄一无所知，我的精神倾向也不比那边的冰箱多。@w3 我会让叔叔在不到一个月的时间内喝死自己。@p8 [ Khalad ] 我能做的是确保他们不需要像我这样的战士作为领导者，通过彻底让兹瑞克斯离开这个星球。@w4 如果你帮我，我们可以做到。

English: [ Khalad ] Glad to have you on board, Commander.@w4 Welcome to the resistance!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Just call me {PlayerName}.@w2 There's no need to stand on formality.@p7 [ Khalad ] {PlayerName} it is then.@w3 You already...@w4 What's that sound?@p6 [ Khalad ] A dropship!@w3 You were followed!
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 很高兴你和我站在一边，指挥官.@w4 欢迎来到反抗军!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 叫我 {PlayerName}就行.@w2 没必要这么正式.@p7 [ Khalad ] 那从今往后就叫你{PlayerName} 了.@w3 你已经...@w4 那是什么声音?@p6 [ Khalad ] 空投挺!@w3 你被跟踪了!
