English: [ Khalad ]\nSounds like the transport dropped off soldiers up top.@w3\nYou'd better go deal with them.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ]\n听起来上面的空投挺放了几个人下来.@w3 \n你最好去解决他们.

English: [ Tal'ohn Warrior ]\nHey, what the hell are you doing in my house?!@w4\nGet out!
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆武士 ]\n嘿你在我房子里做什么?!@w4 \n出去!
<color=#2eafff>哥们冷静点，我只是到处逛逛.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] The zirax are still a serious problem.@w3 I'm going to need your help dealing with them, my friend.@w3 It's not over yet...
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 兹瑞克斯的问题太严重了.@w3 我需要你帮我对付他们，我的朋友.@w3 这还没完...

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I've dealt with the troopers, but the dropship was gone before I even got up there.@w3 That means that they'll send more, Khalad. @w5 You can't stay here now.@p8 [ Khalad ] Look at this place, {PlayerName}!@w3 We, the Tal'on, built this thing.@w3 It may have been nothing more than a water pump, but it's beyond anything the zirax have now!@w3 It's proof that we are better. @w5 See those lights?@w2 I installed those.@w2 Yet, those brainless thugs call US savages?!@p8 [ Khalad ] No,@w4 I will not abandon this place.@w4 This is as important as a cultural artifact as the Tower of Learning or the Great Ziggurat!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我把他们都解决了，但是我上去之前空投挺就跑了.@w3 他们肯定会派更多人来，Khalad.@w5 你不能在这坐以待毙了.@p8 [ Khalad ] 看看这地方，{PlayerName}!@w3 我们，也就是泰隆，建造了这一切.@w3 也许这只不过是个水泵，但它远超兹瑞克斯现在所有的科技!@w3 这就是我们以前更加先进的 证明 .@w5 看到那些灯了吗?@w2 我 装的.@w2 可是那些无脑的暴力狂居然管 我们叫 野蛮人?!@p8 [ Khalad ] 不，@w4 我不会放弃这里.@w4 这里就与学识之塔和大金字塔一样，是重要的文化遗产!

English: <color=#2eafff>It's just a water pump. If they see that you're gone, they probably won't bother with it.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>只是个水泵而已. 如果他们看到你离开了，也许就不会管它了.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] It's not just a water pump!@w3 This structure pre-dates the War of Silence.@w3 It's not some grand structure, military fortress or religious icon, it's evidence of the skill and genius we put into everyday objects. @w8 And...@w3 you're wrong about them too. @w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] They will destroy this place as soon as they see what's down here. @w4 'The Purge', as we call it was when the Zirax turned on the Tal'on.@w3 Killed or imprisoned an entire species in these abandoned or undeveloped planets.@w3 Forbidden any technology and closely guarded to make sure we develop no further. @w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] We serve as an example of what the zirax will do to anyone who opposes them.@w3 Now we sit here, growing stupid and more cowardly with each generation. @w5 These computers,@w2 even those lights are a violation of their laws@w3 and they will destroy all evidence and kill any who might've known of them. @w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] You blame yourself for what happened with the Hunters?@w4 I knew this day would come sooner or later and condemned all my peoples for the convenience of these shiny baubles.@w6 Do you still think i'm worthy to be chief now?
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 这不仅是个水泵!@w3 它的历史可以追溯到沉默战争之前.@w3 虽然不是什么宏伟的建筑，军事要塞又或者是宗教圣地，但是它代表了我们日常使用物品的技巧与智慧.@w8 而且...@w3 你也搞错了.@w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] 他们看到这下面的东西以后就会立刻摧毁一切.@w4 '大清洗'，这是我们历史上对于兹瑞克斯背叛泰隆的说法.@w3 在这些未开发或是荒废的星球上屠杀，囚禁了 整个 种族.@w3 禁止一切科技的使用，并且派兵密切监视以放我们有任何发展.@w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] 我们被兹瑞克斯当作了敢于反抗他们压迫下场的示范.@w3 而我们现在就只能坐在这里，任由一代代变得愈发愚蠢.@w5 这些计算机，@w2 甚至于灯都违反了他们的法律@w3 同时他们也会毁灭一切证据并杀掉所有知道这些的人.@w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] 你把那些猎人的事怪到自己头上?@w4 我 就知道 这一天迟早会到来，而一切都要怪到我们对这些闪闪发光的小东西的信念之上.@w6 你现在 还觉得 我有资格当酋长吗?

English: [ Khalad ] How can you say that?!@w4 Unlike you, I knowingly doomed my own people by assembling and using these computers; gathered intelligence on the zirax and did everything in my power to force them into a conflict with the Tal'on!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] If you hadn't done so, you would never have survived this long and I still would've triggered this conflict that identified the Tal'on as allies of the UCH.@w4 So we both fucked up.@w4 But at least you did it for the right reasons.@w3 That's why I believe you're still still worthy to be chief.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你怎么还能这么说?!@w4 和你不同，我 明知 会给我族人造成灭顶之灾，却还是私自组装了这些计算机；收集了兹瑞克斯的资料并凭我一己之力迫使他们与泰隆开战!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 如果你没有这么做，你也活不到今天而我也 依然 会因为泰隆是UCH的盟友而引起争端.@w4 所以我们 都 搞砸了.@w4 但是至少你是为了正确的道路而战.@w3 这也是我认为你够资格成为酋长的原因.

English: <color=#2eafff>Besides... You're not going to just give up, are you?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>而且... 你也没打算放弃，不是吗?</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] But...@w3 Then again,@w2 you weren't trying to be chief, were you?@w4 You're trying to prove that they don't need a warrior as a leader by ending this conflict now.@w3 That's more than Chief Na'tuk has done;@w2 so while you may not be fit for Chief, you're definitely a leader, Khalad.@p8 [ Khalad ] But now i've forced them into a conflict that could've been avoided.@w4 It's too soon!@w3 We're not ready for a pitched battle against the zirax!@w5 I've spent months gathering equipment and intel.@w3 but it's not enough!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 但...@w3 话说回来，@w2 并不是让你去 成为 酋长，不是吗?@w4 你想要独自结束这场冲突来证明他们 不需要 一个战士来作为领导人.@w3 这可比酋长Na'tuk 做的好多了;@w2 所以尽管你也许 不适合 当酋长；你依然是天生的领导者，Khalad.@p8 [ Khalad ] 但是我现在迫使他们卷入了这场不可避免的冲突.@w4 一切来的太快了!@w3 我们还没有准备好和兹瑞克斯对抗!@w5 我花了几个月来收集装备和资料.@w3 但这 远远不够!

English: <color=#2eafff>You're not going to just give up, are you?</color>

[ Khalad ] Hell@w2 no.@w4 With your help, I can fast-track some of my plans.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] So what's the plan?@p6 [ Khalad ] You have constructors, right?@w4 I'll need your help to produce weapons.@w2 Proper weapons for my people and distribute them to the village and ziggurat.@w3 Crossbows are good for hunting game and taking out the occasional zirax patrol, but they're no good against heavy armor and drones.@p9 [ Khalad ] That's only the start.@w6 You saw my computer@w2... you didn't mess with my settings, did you?@w3 Anyway, i've mapped the enemy patrols as well as their shipments from the Spaceport to the Drone base.@w4 The shipment coming up next has something i'll need.@p9 [ Khalad ] While you're distributing weapons, i'll sabotage their route so we can hop on get what we need from them.@w5 From there...@w3 we'll see. @w5 Hell,@w2 It probably won't work.@w3 But at least we can say we tried, right?
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 当然@w2 不会.@w4 而且有了你的帮助，我的计划甚至可以更快一步进行.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 所以说你的计划是什么?@p6 [ Khalad ] 你有建造机机对吧?@w4 我需要你来帮我制造武器.@w2 给我的族人用上真正的 的武器，造好以后带到村子和金字塔里.@w3 弩箭用来打猎和解决小股巡逻队还行，但是对付重甲和无人机就吃力了.@p9 [ Khalad ] 这还仅仅是个 开始.@w6 你也看到我的计算机了@w2 ... 设置没动吧?@w3 无论如何，我已经摸清了巡逻队的动向以及航天站和无人机基地之间的运输.@w4 下次送来的东西里面有些是我需要的.@p9 [ Khalad ] 你在分发武器的同时， 我会截住他们好让我拿到想要的.@w5 那之后...@w3 我们再从长计议.@w5 见鬼，@w2 要是失败了怎么办.@w3 但是我们至少试过了，不是吗?

English: Certainty of death, small chance of success... What are we waiting for?
Chinese (simplified): 当然是死掉了，只有 很小的 几率能成功... 你还在等什么?

English: [ Khalad ] Okay,@w2 it's settled!@w4 Give me a while to get things organized here and i'll draw up the plans.@w6 Thanks again@w3... for your help, I mean.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 好了，@w2 都准备好了!@w4 等我一会，我把一切都规整好之后再和你说计划的事.@w6 不论如何我都非常感谢@w3 ... 我是说，对于你的帮助.

English: [ Khalad ] You're right on time, {PlayerName}.@w3 I've just finished running the numbers and drawing up the next stage of the plans.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] So what's the plan here?@w4 This is your planet,@w2 so you know the lay of the land better than I do.@p8 [ Khalad ] The number of troops are fairly consistent; most of them are blanks.@w3 The biggest problem the Tal'on face are those damned drones.@w3 Even a crossbow can take out an armored zirax if you hit them in the right place, but those drones are just too durable.@p9 [ Khalad ] The weapons your people carried could take them down with a few well-placed through the eye on the front; or an entire unit of ammunition through the body.@w4 Our weapons don't have the speed or penetration of your firearms and the zirax have outlawed us from even possessing the precursors to gunpowder.@p9 [ Khalad ] Those drones need to be destroyed...@w2 every single one of them.@w4 We need your weapons to do that.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你来的正是时候，{PlayerName}.@w3 我刚刚完成了计算并制定了下一阶段的计划.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么现在的计划是什么?@w4 这是你们的星球，@w2 所以你肯定比我更了解这片土地.@p8 [ Khalad ] 这里的兵力相当均一; 大部分都是空白.@w3 泰隆面临的最大问题其实是那些该死的无人机.@w3 只要打的够准，就算是全副武装的兹瑞克斯也可以用弩解决，但那些无人机实在是太硬了.@p9 [ Khalad ] 你的人携带的武器可以通过精确射击前面的“眼睛”很好地击落他们; 或者直接火力覆盖全身.@w4 我们的武器没有你们火器的速度和穿透力，而兹瑞克斯甚至禁止我们拥有火药的前体.@p9 [ Khalad ] 这些无人机 必须 被摧毁...@w2 每 一个 都是.@w4 我们需要 你的 武器来做到这点.
<color=#2eafff>这听起来只是你的私人请求.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Will your people be able to use UCH weaponry if we give it to them?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>给你的人UCH武器以后他们能用吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] You've seen the zirax troops that attacked us right?@w3 We call them 'blanks' because of their blank stares.@w4 It's because they're cloned soldiers.@w4 Most of the empire's footsoldiers are all clones.@w4 They can follow orders and do all the usual things that regular soldiers do,@w2 but they lack creativity and natural curiosity.@w4 It makes them very...@w2 predictable.@p9 [ Khalad ] Oh, They do have regular non-cloned soldiers in there. But not in places like this.@w3 Most of them have technical jobs or are officers.@w5 The commander of the Drone Base,@w2 they call him 'Captain Dreadarm' due to his preference of flogging his subordinates.@p9 [ Khalad ] He's a real bastard, that one.@w3 One of these days,@w2 sometime soon,@w2 I look forward to throwing him off the top of his Drone Base.@w8 Everything is his fault...
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你看到过攻击我们的兹瑞克斯了吧?@w3 我叫他们空白是因为他们的眼神十分空洞.@w4 因为他们实际上是克隆士兵.@w4 帝国的大部分步兵都是克隆的.@w4 他们可以服从命令，做到和普通士兵一样的事，@w2 但是他们没有天生的创造力或者好奇心.@w4 这使他们变得...@w2 易于预测.@p9 [ Khalad ] 哦，当然非克隆的士兵也是有的. 但不是这里.@w3 他们大部分都是技术或者文职人员.@w5 无人机基地的指挥官，@w2 因为他有鞭打自己下属的嗜好而被称为 '恐惧武装队长' .@p9 [ Khalad ] 他是个彻头彻尾的混蛋.@w3 有一天，@w2 也许就在未来不久，@w2 我想把他从无人机基地的楼顶丢下去.@w8 一切 都是他的错...
<color=#2eafff>这听起来只是你的私人请求</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Because it is personal.@w3 At least for me it is...@w5 My parents were hunters,@w2 far from zirax patrol lines tracking a large pack of Cresters.@w3 They'd followed them to a stream covered by brush...@p7 [ Khalad ] A drone found them there...@w6 They didn't try and shoot at it.@w3 Their weapons were found on the ground at their feet.@w4 They had SURRENDERED!@w2 the drone should've ignored them!@w5 Only an operated drone could ignore that rule.@w3 Someone gave it the order to shoot them.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm sorry, Khalad...@p6 [ Khalad ] It happened a long time ago...@w8 I ended up in the care of my Uncle, the shaman.@w4 He tried to get me into The Order,@w3 taught me how to read, write and talk all proper-like.@w3 He wasn't all too happy that I joined the Hunters like my parents.@p8 [ Khalad ] And, well...@w2 you know the rest.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 因为 确实 是私人请求.@w3 至少对我来说是这样...@w5 我的父母都是猎人，@w2 他们在远离兹瑞克斯巡逻线的地方追踪一群动物.@w3 他们跟到了一条小溪边...@p7 [ Khalad ] 一架无人机发现了他们...@w6 他们都没有尝试射击无人机.@w3 当时武器都是放在地上的.@w4 他们已经 投降了!@w2 无人机 应该 略过他们!@w5 只有有人操控的无人机才能无视这条指令.@w3 有人 下达了射击指令.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 很抱歉听到这些， Khalad...@p6 [ Khalad ] 这已经是很久以前的事了...@w8 我最后受到了叔叔的照顾，也就是萨满.@w4 他试着带我走上正道，@w3 教我读书写字，以及合理的谈吐.@w3 在我和我的同僚加入猎人的行列时，他并不是很开心.@p8 [ Khalad ] 而且，那个...@w2 剩下的事你也知道了.

English: <color=#2eafff>Your uncle taught you? Is that why don't sound all formal and stiff like Na'tuk?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你叔叔教你的? 这就是为什么你听起来不像Na'tuk一样正式而古板?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Just because we live in wooden huts doesn't make us savages.@w5 The Zirax forbid our people technology.@w3 They can't really do anything about knowledge.@w3 We've been passing that down for generations.@p8 [ Khalad ] Your weapons aren't any more complicated than the ones the Zirax use,@w2 and most Hunters have seen zirax firearms in action.@w4 Usually when the blanks are out doing weapons training in the forest or when one of those damned drones decides to massacre a herd of tri-horns.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 仅仅因为时住在木房子里并不代表我们就是 野蛮人.@w5 兹瑞克斯不允许我们使用科技.@w3 但是他们对 知识束手无策.@w3 而我们就将 它 代代相传.@p8 [ Khalad ] 你们的武器并不比兹瑞克斯的更复杂，@w2 而且大部分猎人也见过战斗中的兹瑞克斯.@w4 一般来说是在那些空白做射击训练或是那些 该死的 无人机决定杀掉一群放养的三角龙的时候.
<color=#2eafff>这听起来只是你的私人请求.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Just one more reason why I don't want to be Chief.@w5 They talk like that intentionally, you know?@w3 They do it so that the regular people of the clan will think that their words are wise and profound.@w6 It always rubbed me the wrong way once i'd found out about it from my uncle.@p9 [ Khalad ] I learned a lot from my uncle...@w4 even what he knew about this 'advanced technology', which isn't really supposed to be taught outside the Shamanic Order.@w5 If we're going to arm the people,@w2 we'll probably need his help.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] If we want to head off any pre-emptive attacks on the villages, they'll need weapons.@w5 They'll get upset and complain.@w4 There's nothing either of us can do except make sure that they have the weapons handy if they need them.@w4 Beyond that, it'll be up to them to use them if and when the time comes.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 这又是我不愿意成为酋长的原因之一.@w5 他们说话太做作了，你能理解吧?@w3 他们这么好让氏族里的人觉得他们的语言深刻而充满智慧.@w6 自从我叔叔告诉我这件事之后就成为了我走上不正确道路的诱因.@p9 [ Khalad ] 我从叔叔那里学到了很多...@w4 甚至于包括他知道的的那些 '先进科技'的事，这些本不应该传给萨满教团以外的人.@w5 如果我们想武装人民，@w2 肯定需要他帮忙.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 如果他们想抵御任何先发制人的攻击，就需要武器.@w5 但是他们会丧气或是抱怨.@w4 我们没办法也不能期待他们能够吧这些武器用的顺手.@w4 更进一步的，真要到了 那个时候 用不用的选择权也在他们手中.

English: <color=#2eafff>I'll get onto making those weapons. How many are we talking here?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我会开始着手武器制造. 你说个数吧?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Probably around 60 of your Weapons in batches of 20 would be easiest.@w4 That'll be a bit awkward to carry, won't it?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I can probably fabricate a few boxes to store them in.@w3 It'll be fine.@w5 The real problem will be trying to convince the villagers to take the weapons.@p8 [ Khalad ] My uncle should be able to help with that.@w4 Bring the boxes to him and explain the situation.@w3 Hopefully he'll listen.@p7 [ Khalad ] While you're doing that,@w2 i'll try and sabotage the Zirax Convoy's route.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 大概一共需要 60把，每批20把 最方便.@w4 带过来可能会比较麻烦对吧?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我也许可以用几个箱子把他们装起来.@w3 没什么问题.@w5 但 真正的 问题还是在于劝说村民接受这些武器.@p8 [ Khalad ] 我叔叔应该能帮上忙.@w4 把箱子带给她然后汇报情况就行.@w3 但愿他听得进去.@p7 [ Khalad ] 你在做 这件事的时候，@w2 我会在兹瑞克斯的车队路上搞点破坏.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't have the weapon crate for the village with me!@w3\nI'd better go back and get it now or else i'll look like an idiot later.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我手上没有村子里需要的 武器箱 !@w3 \n最好现在就去拿来，免得过会像个傻子.

English: [ Shaman Turell ] Traveller? You're alright?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I'm alright, Shaman.@w2 But what's happened here?@w4 There are more of the village guards here than there was the other day.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] We had to pull in all the hunters to protect the village early this morning.@w4 There was a fire in one of the outlying farms.@w3 When a group of hunters saw the smoke they went to help put out the fire...@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] It was a Xenu Firesquad...@w3 They burned the entire farm and killed the occupants and workers...
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 旅行者? 你还好吗?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 我很好，萨满.@w2 但是这里发生了什么?@w4 这里的守卫比平常多多了.@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 今早开始，我们不得不召集所有猎人来保卫村庄.@w4 外面有个村庄着火了.@w3 有队猎人看到了烟就赶去救火...@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 结果那是个 泽纽火力小组...@w3 他们烧毁了整个村庄，杀掉了里面所有的人...

English: [ Shaman Turell ] I am afraid my old friend Na'tuk believes that it is over.@w4 That the deaths of the farmers are retribution for the soldiers Ki'eve led that you killed.@w4 He is one of only a handful who believe that and he refuses to change his mind.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] Myself and Ku'reil the Huntmaster, do not believe so and have recalled the remaining Hunters to bolster the village guards, under the guise of funerary observance of the victims.@w4 Dishonorable though it may be,@w2 the safety of the people is more important than the memory of the recently dead.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] Enough of that for now!@w3 The last I saw of you, you were heading to the Great Ziggurat to find my nephew.@w3 Did you ever manage to find him?@w2 Did you tell him to come home?
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 很可惜的是我的老朋友Na'tuk觉得这就完了.@w4 那些农民的死被当做是你杀死Ki'eve带的那队士兵的报应.@w4 他是唯一坚信这一点的人而且也拒绝改变心意.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 我和狩猎大师Ku'reil，并没有这种想法，于是就叫来了剩下的猎人来增援守卫，当然是以葬礼作为幌子的.@w4 也许看上去很不光彩，@w2 但人们的安全肯定比寄托哀思重要.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 说的够多了!@w3 上次我见到你的时候，你去金字塔找我侄子了.@w3 你找到他了吗?@w2 叫他回家了吗?

English: <color=#2eafff>I found him, but he's not ready to become chief.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我找到他了，但他不想当酋长.</color>

English: [ Shaman Turell ] If you are expressing condolences for the dead,@w2 that is much appreciated.@w4 But if you're apologizing for causing this conflict between us and the zirax...@w3 well, it's been a long time in the making.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] Ever since your ships came crashing out of the sky, tensions in and out of the clan have been on the rise.@w3 If not for you, one or another of your people would've eventually come along and stirred the young hunters to action.@w3 It was unavoidable.@w2 You don't need to blame yourself for that, traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 如果你想吊唁死者，@w2 自然是很感谢的.@w4 但是 如果你是来为挑起纷争道歉的...@w3 说来话长，这是个长久的问题.@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 自从你的飞船从天空坠下，氏族内外的局势就紧张了起来.@w3 就算不是你，你们中的其他人也终将到这里把年轻的猎人卷入其中.@w3 这不可避免.@w2 你不需要因此怪罪自己，旅行者.

English: <color=#2eafff>Others will. But what will happen now?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>其他人会的. 但现在究竟发生了什么?</color>

English: [ Shaman Turell ] At least he's not dead...@w4 I've worried that myself often.@w2 Wondered if he died out there after I had him sent away...@w5 Please, tell me how he is.@p9 < You relate to Shaman Turell what Khalad has been up to >@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] I am not surprised.@w3 I'm not happy about his choices or actions,@w2 but I suppose I have no claim over what he does or does not do.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You'll be seeing him yourself soon enough.@w2 You can express your disappointment to him in person, revered shaman.@p6 [ Shaman Turell ] I believe you said he wasn't willing to come back.@w4 For what purpose would he come here now?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] To bring you ammunition for these-
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 至少他还没死...@w4 我自己也经常担心.@w2 他是不是在我把他送去以后就死了...@w5 请务必告诉我他现在怎么样了.@p9 < 你向萨满Turell描述了Khalad的所作所为 >@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 我并不感到惊讶.@w3 我并 不看好 他的选择或者作为，@w2 但我想我也没有资格决定他做了或者没做什么.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你马上就能亲自见到他了.@w2 到时候你可以当面表达自己的不满，我尊敬的 萨满.@p6 [ Turell萨满 ] 我记得你刚说他 并不 愿意回来.@w4 那他还有什么理由会来这里呢?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 当然是给你们送来这些武器的弹药-

English: [ Shaman Turell ] What is THIS?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Weapons capable of taking down those drones and mechanoids far better than those crossbows you're using right now, Shaman.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] But,@w2 But...@w2 This is a violation of the zirax commandments!@w3 They will kill us all if we use them!@w4 We cannot take them!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] If only the village guards have them nearby and they need to use them to defend the village against an attack,@w2 you can be damned well sure that they're here to kill you all anyway.@w3 At least this way you can give as good as you get if the shit hits the fan.@p9 [ Shaman Turell ] This is Khalad's plan, isn't it? @w8 Alright...@w4 we will take the weapons but ONLY as a precaution and will keep them out of sight unless there's no other alternative.@p8 [ Shaman Turell ] Since we're commited now, you may as well take that second case to Huntmaster, Kureil.@w5 I know you two have had your differences,@w2 But now that the Hunters have been recalled, he is wise enough to recognize that a crossbow won't stop a drone.@w4 May the spirits guide you, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ Turell萨满 ] 这是 什么?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 比弩箭更适合用来攻击无人机和机械人的武器，萨满.@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 但，@w2 但是...@w2 这违背了兹瑞克斯的禁令!@w3 如果我们用了就会被杀光的!@w4 我们 不能 收下这些!@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 但如果只是分发给附近的守卫来抵抗入侵呢，@w2 如果他们真的过来杀你，你也跑不掉.@w3 至少在那群狗东西打过来的时候你还能让他们吃到对等的损失.@p9 [ Turell萨满 ] 这就是Khalad'的计划，对吧?@w8 行吧...@w4 我会收下这些武器，但是只会作为预防措施，不到万不得以是不会用的.@p8 [ Turell萨满 ] 既然我们要动手，你也要来 把这第二箱武器交给狩猎大师Kureil.@w5 我知道你们两个有分歧，@w2 但是现在猎人们都已经被召来了，他脑子应该足够清楚他手里的弩箭是打不下来无人机的.@w4 愿神灵指引你，旅行者.
愿神灵指导我们 所有人，萨满.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't have the weapon crate for the hunters with me!@w3\nI'd better go back and get it now or else i'll look like an idiot later.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我手上没有给猎人们的 武器箱!@w3 \n最好现在就去拿来，免得过会像个傻子.

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] You again?@w4 What do you want this time?@w2 Can't you see that i'm busy with the mess you caused, Terran?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Nice to see you too, big guy.@w4 I've brought you something you might want.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 又是你?@w4 这次你想要什么?@w2 看不出来我正在收拾你留下的烂摊子吗，地球人?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 也很高兴见到你，大个子.@w4 我这给你带来了点东西，你也许会喜欢.

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] What is this?@w7 I see...@w5 And Turell has given this his permission for these?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] He has.@w4 They should be distributed to the defenders but kept out of sight unless you know the zirax are committing their forces to an attack.@w4 @p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Don't tell me how to organize my hunters, Terran.@w4 I know what i'm doing.@w6 If the zirax become aware of these weapons beforehand, it will cause them to commit their full forces, regardless of their earlier intentions.@w3 These weapons are forbidden.@p9 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] At least...@w3 this gives us a chance.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 这是什么?@w7 我懂了...@w5 然后Turell已经允许这些了?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 是的.@w4 这些武器最好赶快分发给守卫们，不过除非确定了兹瑞克斯要进攻，否则不要亮出它们.@w4 @p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 不需要你教我怎么指挥，地球人.@w4 我自有分寸.@w6 如果兹瑞克斯提前注意到了这些武器，他们肯定会使出全力，不管之前究竟如何.@w3 这些武器毕竟是被禁止的.@p9 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 至少...@w3 这些会给我们一个机会.

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] It is not looking good.@w3 The last group of hunters returned a hour ago, bringing with them refugees from the granary and quarry.@w3 Both buildings were destroyed by Xenu Firesquads.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] We can rule out retribution for a few soldiers.@w3 This is an extermination.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] And the chief?@p6 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] He stands idly by,@w2 trying to assure the villagers that the worst has passed.@w6 He will plead with the zirax outside these very gates before he orders us to attack.@w6 The best we can do now is pray that he is right...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 状况不容乐观.@w3 最后一组猎人一小时之前从粮仓和采石场带着难民们回来了@w3 那两座建筑都被泽纽火力小队烧掉了.@p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 我们基本上排除了为几个士兵而报复的可能性.@w3 这将是一场种族灭绝.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 那酋长怎么说?@p6 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 他什么都不管，@w2 想着怎么保证村民渡过最艰难的时光.@w6 他会在下令攻击之前在村子外乞求兹瑞克斯人放过我们.@w6 我们也只能希望他是对的了...

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] There is not much I can do.@w4 I must stand and watch as my people cower behind these walls as the zirax move ever closer.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Until the chief orders us to attack,@w2 we will stand here with our bows at the ready and your weapons hidden at our feet.@w5 I fear that we will never be given the order to attack and we will stand here uselessly until the very end...@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] It brings me much sadness that my chieftain would cling to peace in so desperate a situation...
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 我 能 做的不多.@w4 我必须在人们都躲在墙后的这段时间里站出来观望战局.@p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 直到酋长下令我们攻击，@w2 我们都会拿着弓坚守在这里，暗地里准备用你带来的武器.@w5 但我最怕的就是直到最后一刻也没有攻击命令，我们只能在这里无意义地等死...@p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 在这种情况酋长依然如此贪恋和平实在是令我伤心透顶...

English: <color=#2eafff>If he's not, you'll at least be able to defend yourselves from the drones.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>如果他不下令，你至少可以从无人机的手中自保.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>The weapons may still prove useless without ammunition.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>这些武器没有弹药就没有任何意义.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Indeed.@w3 Ammunition may be a problem.@w6 We hunters have a stockpile of ammunition and a few weapons retrieved from enemies of the past.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Do not look so shocked.@w3 Did you think we have not had conflicts with our keepers in the two and a half centuries they have had us penned up in this prison world?@w5 Many of the older articles have deteriorated, but the ammunition appears undamaged.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I wouldn't trust it anyway.@w5 Someone will be by soon to deliver a case of newer ammunition,@w2 so you won't need to rely on antiques.@p8 [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ] Sometimes old things are the best.@w3 But in the case of these weapons, I will trust your experience and leave the older ammunition for last.@w8 What will you do now, Terran?
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 没错.@w3 弹药确实可能是个问题.@w6 我们猎人有一堆以前从敌人身上搜刮来的武器弹药.@p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 别那么震惊.@w3 你难道觉得这些人把我们囚禁在这种监狱一样的星球上两个半世纪，我们之间一点冲突都没有过吗?@w5 很多以前的武器都坏掉了，不过弹药看上去还是完好的.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我也没想着靠那些就是了.@w5 有人会给你们带新的弹药来，@w2 你就不用想着用古董了.@p8 [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ] 有的时候经典的才是好的.@w3 不过说到这些武器，我会相信你的判断，那些老货我会留到万不得已的时候再用.@w8 那你现在要做什么，地球人?

English: <color=#2eafff>I need to deliver this lase case of weapons to the Ziggurat.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我得把最后一箱武器带到金字塔去.</color>

English: [ Huntmaster Ku'reil ]\nThen I wish you good luck, Terran.@w4\nMay the spirits guide you to Empyrion.
Chinese (simplified): [ 狩猎大师 Ku'reil ]\n祝你好运，地球人.@w4 \n愿神灵指引你前往Empyrion.

English: [ Temple Guardian ] You're back!@w3 We thought the troopers would have gotten you.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] No, not me.@w3 Is the High Shaman still in the Sun Room?@p8 [ Temple Guardian ] He's currently overwhelmed trying to calm all the civilians we've pulled within our walls.@w4 He doesn't have time to deal with alien travellers.
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守护者 ] 你回来了!@w3 我还以为那些部队抓到你了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 不，它们完全没伤到我.@w3 至高萨满还在日之间吗?@p8 [ 神庙守护者 ] 他现在非常繁忙，一直在安抚那些我们带来避难的平民.@w4 他并没有时间接待旅行者了.

English: <color=#2eafff>Even if i've brought something that will help you defend the Temple?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>哪怕我带来了一些可以帮你们防御神庙的东西也不行吗?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Even if i've brought something that will help you defend the Temple?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>哪怕我带来了一些可以帮你们防御神庙的东西也不行吗?</color>

English: [ Temple Guardian ] If you've got weapons in that case, the Shamans will not be happy with you bringing forbidden weapons onto the Temple grounds.@p8 [ Temple Guardian ] They'll probably be less happy when we have to fight armored drones with our crossbows.@w5 So while they probably won't thank you,@w2 On behalf of the Temple Guard, I will.@p8 [ Temple Guardian ] You can find one of the other Shaman in the Room of the Moon, straight ahead. Speak to whichever one is in charge down there and give him the case.@w6 Good Luck, friend.
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守护者 ] 如果你那个箱子里装的是武器，萨满肯定会因为你把紧急的武器带进神庙而发怒的.@p8 [ 神庙守护者 ] 当然拿弩箭打无人机他们肯定也不乐意.@w5 所以也许他们不会感谢你，@w2 作为守卫来说，我会.@p8 [ 神庙守护者 ] 你可以在月之间找到另一个萨满，就在正前方. 和那里看起来像管事的人谈谈然后把武器箱交给他就行.@w6 祝你好运，朋友.

English: [ Temple Guardian ] What have you brought?@w3 You have nothing with you.@w6 Go back to your camp, your ship or your hover vessel and bring it to the Shaman-in-charge in the Room of the Moon.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah yes, you're right.@w3 I forgot to bring the Weapons Case with me.@w4 Thank you for the guidance, I will bring the case to the shaman in the Lower Temple.
Chinese (simplified): [ 神庙守护者 ] 你带来了什么?@w3 你什么都没带.@w6 回到你的基地，飞船或是悬浮飞船把箱子拿来给执掌月之间的萨满 .@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊对，你说的没错.@w3 我忘了把 武器箱 带在身上了.@w4 感谢你的指引我会把箱子带给楼下的萨满.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Excuse me, revered Shaman.@w4 May I take a moment of your time?@p8 [ Moon Shaman ] You dare speak to me, Trespasser?!@w5 Who let one of YOUR kind into this sacred place?@p8
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 抱歉，尊贵的萨满.@w4 我能占用你一点时间吗?@p8 [ 月之萨满 ] 你竟然敢和 我说话，闯入者?!@w5 是谁允许 你 这种人进入这神圣的地方?@p8

English: <color=#2eafff>I was sent here by Shaman Turell to deliver a 'vital piece of equipment' for the defenders of the Ziggurat.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我是受萨满Turell之托来给你们送一些用来保卫金字塔的 '关键装备'的.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>I was sent here by Shaman Turell to deliver...</color> <color=#ff0000>Oh crap, I forgot to bring it. I'll be right back.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我是受萨满Turell来给你们送...</color> <color=#ff0000>噢狗屎，我没带在身上，马上就拿过来.</color>

English: [ Moon Shaman ] I do not care what you have brought, Terran!@w3 The great Ziggurat has no need for your help.@w4 Everything has already been taken care of.@w3 We will all be protected here.@w2 Leave!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] But Revered Shaman!@p4 [ Moon Shaman ] GUARDS!!@p7 [ Temple Guardian ] What is it that you need Shaman Dolmac?@p7 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Ah, Captain Ty'nan!@w5 Take this infidel from our holy place and cast them from the steps of the Ziggurat!@w5 Your 'help' is not wanted or needed here, Terran!
Chinese (simplified): [ 月之萨满 ] 我不在乎你带来了什么，地球人!@w3 伟大的金字塔并不需要你的帮助.@w4 一切都已经处理好了.@w3 我们在这里可以受到保护.@w2 离开!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 但是尊贵的萨满!@p4 [ 月之萨满 ] 守卫!!@p7 [ 神庙守护者 ] 您有什么吩咐，萨满Dolmac?@p7 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 啊，Ty'nan队长!@w5 把这个 异教徒 从这神圣的地方赶出去，不要让他再踏足金字塔!@w5 我们不需要也不想要你的'帮助'，地球人!

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Revered Shaman, Dolmac!@w3 I am trying to save the temple!@w3 The zirax are preparing to attack!@p8 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Lies!!@w4 The Zirax are not our enemies! They will not step foot in this place!@w5 Captain! Remove this heretic from my sight this instant!@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Come with me peacefully, stranger...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I can see why Khalad ruined his sermon now.@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You know Khalad?
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 尊贵的萨满，Dolmac!@w3 我正在想办法拯救神庙!@w3 兹瑞克斯正在准备进攻!@p8 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 你说谎!!@w4 兹瑞克斯不是我们的敌人! 他们不会踏入这里!@w5 队长! 立刻把这个异端从我面前带走!@p8 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 不要说话，跟我走，陌生人...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 我算是看出来为什么Khalad要给他的布道会捣乱了.@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你 认识 Khalad?

English: <color=#2eafff>He's the reason i'm here right now. We're trying to stop the zirax from destroying the temple.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>他就是我出现在这里的原因. 我们想阻止兹瑞克斯毁掉这座神庙.</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Captain!@w3 You are in charge of the defense of the Ziggurat, aren't you?@w6 Then this concerns you most of all.@p6 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Captain!@p3 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I am aware of the situation, stranger.@w3 What business is it of an outsider like you?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Myself and Khalad are working to help you with defenses against the drones and mechanoids the zirax will deploy to take the Ziggurat.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You know Khalad?
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 队长!@w3 你负责神庙的防御没错吧?@w6 那这肯定是你最大的问题了.@p6 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 队长!@p3 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 我确实明白现在的情况，陌生人.@w3 但是这和你一个外人有什么关系?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 我和Khalad为你们抵御无人机和机械人做了些微小的工作.@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你 认识 Khalad?

English: <color=#2eafff>He's the reason i'm here right now, talking to you.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>他就是我出现在这里和你交谈的原因.</color>

English: [ Captain Ty'nan ] You will explain.@p5 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Remove this deceiver immediately, Captain!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Dolmac.@w3 You are aware that I am in charge of the defense of this building are you not?@w4 That in all defensive matters my authority is above even the High Shaman Orizel, yes?@p7 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Well...@w4 yes,@w2 that is true... @w4 But...@p3 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You will be silent,@w2 Dolmac. @w5 And you, Terran@w3 will speak!@w2 Quickly.@p5 < You inform Captain Ty'nan of the plan to provide weapons to the defenders of the Ziggurat >@p9 [ Shaman Dolmac ] You cannot give those weapons to the Guardians!@w5 Even if you had enough,@w2 it is a violation of the Temple Guardian's Oath that they are forbidden from using the weapons of the enemy!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I am not the enemy, Dolmac!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] As much as I am loath to admit it...@w2 He is right, Commander.@w5 You may not be our enemy, but your weapons are no different to those of the zirax;@w3 To the point that your ammunitions are compatible.@w3 It is too close for my liking.@p9 [ Shaman Dolmac ] I guess that's it then.@w4 Thank you for your assistance, Terran.@w3 But it seems you are unable to help the good Captain in his hour of need.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] There may be an alternative...
Chinese (simplified): [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你可以解释一下.@p5 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 立刻把这个 骗子 带走，队长!@p5 [ Ty'nan队长 ] Dolmac.@w3 你应该也知道我负责你所在的建筑的防御吧?@w4 在这一点上我的话语权甚至高于至高萨满Orizel， 忘了吗?@p7 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 唔...@w4 是，@w2 确实不假...@w4 但...@p3 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你可以 闭嘴了，@w2 Dolmac.@w5 置于 你，地球人，@w3 可以继续了!@w2 简短点.@p5 < 你向Ty'nan队长讲述了你要向金字塔的守卫分发武器的事 >@p9 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 你不能把这些武器交给守护者!@w5 就算你的武器够多，@w2 这和守护者们不使用敌人武器的誓言相悖!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我 并不是 你们的敌人，Dolmac!@p5 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 虽然我很不想承认...@w2 但他是对的，指挥官.@w5 你确实 不是 我们的敌人， 但你们的武器与兹瑞克斯相差无几；@w3 特别是弹药也兼容这一点.@w3 这对我们来说太像了.@p9 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 我想到此为止了.@w4 感谢你的 协助， 地球人.@w3 但是看上去你好像 并不能 为这位队长帮上什么忙.@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 不过确实有个备用方案...

English: <color=#2eafff>If there's a chance, i'll take it.</color>

[ Captain Ty'nan ] While it is true that we Temple Guardians are forbidden from using the weapons of our enemy,@w2 there is no rule against using the weapons of our ancestors.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] When our forebears were exiled to this planet,@w2 they sealed away the technologies the Zirax had forbidden and hidden them,@w3 with The Order established to guard over the technology so that it would not be used or discovered.@p8 [ Shaman Dolmac ] What you speak of is blasphemy, Captain!@w3 Those devices were sealed away centuries ago for a reason!@w2 They do not even work!@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Silence, Dolmac!@w3 This oath is as much mine as it is yours.@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] The devices we need are used in the construction of plasma and kinetic weaponry.@w4 You will find them not far from here, sealed deep within the Burial Chamber of those who once sealed them.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Go now, Commander.@w3 Prove yourself an ally of The Order; find the sealed crates and bring them back here.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] I will, Captain.@w4 You can count on me to complete the mission!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Leave that Weapon Case you brought with me, Commander.@w5 My people are forbidden from using them,@w2 but the refugees we have taken in are not bound by the same oath.@w5 Good luck,@w2 and may the spirits guide you.
Chinese (simplified): [ Ty'nan队长 ] 虽说神庙守护者是禁止使用敌人武器的，@w2 但是祖先的武器并不包括在内.@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 当我们的先人被放逐到这颗星球上时，@w2 他们封藏了我们的科技，而兹瑞克斯一直在尝试掩盖这件事，@w3 随着命令的下达，它们对科技严加防守因此没人能找到.@p8 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 你在说什么亵渎神明的话，队长!@w3 那些设备被封存了几个世纪自然有它的道理!@w2 他们早就失效了!@p8 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 住口， Dolmac!@w3 誓言对你我来说都是绝对的.@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 我们需要的设备融合了动能和等离子的技术.@w4 你可以在不远的地方找到，被那些人和自己的一起埋葬在了墓室里.@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 现在就去， 指挥官.@w3 证明你是教团的盟友; 找到那些封存的箱子然后把它们带过来.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 我会的，队长.@w4 保证完成任务!@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 把你的武器箱留下吧没指挥官.@w5 我的人也许不能违背誓言，@w2 但是那些难民并不会被誓言约束.@w5 祝你好运，@w2 愿神灵引导你.

English: <color=#2eafff>Thank you, Captain.</color>\n<color=#2eafff>May the spirits guide you too...</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>谢谢你，队长.</color>\n<color=#2eafff>也愿神灵引导你...</color>

English: [ Shaman Dolmac ] I thought you were on your way to the ancient burial chamber to desecrate the memory of my ancestors, or was I wrong?@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Is there something more you needed to know?
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满Dolmac ] 我以为你已经去 远古墓室 去亵渎我们先祖的记忆了，还是说我想错了?@p8 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你还有什么想知道的?

English: <color=#2eafff>Why can't you use zirax weapons?</color> <color=#bdbdbd>(Repeat last dialogue)</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么你们不能用兹瑞克斯武器?</color> <color=#bdbdbd>(重复之前的对话)</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThe Shaman appears to be deep in prayer.@w4\nI'd better not disturb him.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n萨满看上去正忙于信众.@w4 \n我最好不要再打扰他了.

English: [ Shaman Dolmac ]\nAlready give up, have you?@w4\nLeave this place, Terran.@w3 I will have you thrown from the heights of the temple if you return without good reason!
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满Dolmac ]\n你这就放弃了?@w4 \n离开这里，地球人.@w3 如果你不能给出让我满意的理由我会亲自从神庙顶上把你丢出去!

English: [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Welcome to our holy ziggurat, Commander.@w4 I will be replacing former-shaman Dolmac as the Shaman of the Moon.@w5 I thank you for helping us with the defense of the temple.@w3 May the spirits guide you to Empyrion, Commander.
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 欢迎来到神圣的金字塔，指挥官.@w4 我将代替之前的-萨满Dolmac 成为月之萨满.@w5 感谢你帮助我们保卫了金字塔.@w3 M愿神灵指引你前往Empyrion，指挥官.

English: <color=#2eafff>May the spirits guide you too, Shaman.</color>

[ Captain Ty'nan ] Come, quickly, Stranger!@w5 Tell me,@w2 were you successful?@w3 Do you have one of the sealed crates from the Burial Chambers?@p8 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Do not look so happy, Captain.@w3 You are condoning the desecration and robbery of a sacred place by an alien.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I'll be as disconsolate as you Dolmac, when this is all over and we come out the other side alive.@w3 Until then, I will grasp whatever hope is dangled in front of my face.
Chinese (simplified): [ Ty'nan队长 ] 快过来，陌生人!@w5 告诉我，@w2 你成功了吗?@w3 你从墓室里找到那个密封的箱子了吗?@p8 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 别太得意了，队长.@w3 你这是在纵容一个 外星人去亵渎和 洗劫 一个神圣的地方 .@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 我会和你一样惆怅的，Dolmac前提是我们今天还能活着从这里出去.@w3 在那之前，我会抓住我面前的每一根稻草.

English: [ Captain Ty'nan ] Excellent!@w4 According to the manifest in the Temple Archives, this crate contains Plasma Igniters used in the energy weapons of old.@w5 The knowledge of how to use them is the domain of the Order, not of the Temple Guardians however.@p9 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Out of the question, Captain!@w5 I will have no part in your self-destructive delusions!@w3 You will get us all killed!!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Have you lost your mind, Dolmac?!@p6 [ Shaman Dolmac ] No!@w3 I am the only one in this entire place that is sane!@w2 It is YOU that have lost your minds!@w4 The Zirax are not our enemies!@w2 We must allow them into the temple and throw ourselves on their mercy!
Chinese (simplified): [ Ty'nan队长 ] 太棒了!@w4 根据神庙记载的清单，这个箱子里装的是古人使用的等离子引燃装置.@w5 但是如何使用这些的知识是教团的领域，而非守卫.@p9 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 没什么好说的，队长!@w5 我不会参与你的自杀妄想一分一毫!@w3 你会把我们全都害死的!!@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你疯了，Dolmac?!@p6 [ 萨满Dolmac ] No!@w3 我是这里唯一一个有理智的人!@w2 是 你们 这些人疯了!@w4 兹瑞克斯不是我们的敌人!@w2 我们必须 允许 他们进入神庙好让我们拥抱他们的慈悲!
<color=#2eafff>你没救了... 你会把我们全都害死!</color>

English: [ Shaman Dolmac ] Just you, you HERETIC!@w3 You're here just trying to deceive the my people, my precious followers!@w3 But I will not let you!!@p8 < Dolmac lunges for the case! >@w4 - You raise the case away from his grasp and bring it down on his head -@p9 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Nicely done.@w4 I was about to do that myself.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Guardian Ulath!@w2 Shaman Dolmac is not well.@w4 Take him to his quarters and lock him inside until he has regained himself.@w5 And send Shaman Ur'cera over on your way out.@p8 [ Guardian Ulath ] Right away, Captain!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You must've hit him pretty hard, since you've managed to break the locks on the case, Commander.@w4 Here come's Shaman Ur'cera.@w3 He is more...@w3 worldly,@w2 than Dolmac.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Can I help you, Captain?@w3 I'm rather busy organizing the barricading of the gates right now.@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Forgive me for interrupting your preparations, Shaman Ur'cera but we have a case of vital equipment that is needed for the defense of the Ziggurat.@w3 It is a field outside my limited expertise and one you are uniquely qualified to handle,@w2 if you would.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] A pretty speech, Captain.@w3 But i'm not Orizel, so get to the bloody point and tell me what you need me to do?
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满Dolmac ] 就是你， 你这 异端!@w3 就是你想在这里欺骗我的人，我珍贵的追随者!@w3 但我不会让你得逞!!@p8 < Dolmac一个箭步冲向了箱子! >@w4 - 你举起了箱子给他的头上来了一下 -@p9 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 做的好.@w4 你要是不动手我就自己来了.@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 守护者Ulath!@w2 萨满Dolmac身体不太好.@w4 把他带到自己的房间里，直到他找回自己的神智都不要放出来.@w5 回来之前把萨满Ur'cera叫上.@p8 [ 守护者Ulath ] 这就来，队长!@p5 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你小子下手够狠啊，既然你都把上面的锁弄开了，指挥官.@w4 这位就是萨满Ur'cera.@w3 他比较...@w3 好说话，@w2 相对于Dolmac来说.@p9 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 我能帮上什么忙吗，队长?@w3 我忙着布置门口的障碍呢.@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 请原谅我打扰了您的准备工作，萨满Ur'cera 但我们这里有一箱用来保护金字塔的重要装备.@w3 但是这超出了我的专业范畴，而你这方面肯定是专业的，@w2 如果可以的话.@p9 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 说的比唱的还好听，队长.@w3 但是我不是Orizel，所以赶快说明白你到底想干什么?

English: [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Why the bloody hell do you have that thing?!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Like the captain said,@w2 it's needed for the defense of the Ziggurat.@w5 You shaman pass down the knowledge of this technology and how it's used, don't you?@w3 That means that using it is up to you.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] But...@w2 I never expected to actually see one of these crates in person!@w4 There's not even enough parts here to make full weapons.@w3 The best we could manage is to modify the Guardian's Crossbows into some form of plasma launcher.@w4 @p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] That would probably be preferrable for most of us, Shaman.@w6 We have trained all our lives to use a crossbow;@w2 But none of us would know how to handle a rifle effectively.@p8 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Alright...@w3 I'll get some of the other Shaman together to put them to work.@w5 YOU, Captain...@w2 Get the men you can spare and bring us the weapons you need modified first.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] What should I do?@p5 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Get up top and help hold off the attack until we're done here.@w6 Now go!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Thank you for everything you've done, Commander.@w5 May the Spirits guide you to Empyrion...
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 你怎么搞到 那 玩意的?!@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 就像队长说的，@w2 我们防卫金字塔是一定要用到的.@w5 你们萨满代代相传的知识里就有教怎么用这些的没错吧?@w3 这意味着用不用它都取决于你.@p9 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 但...@w2 我从没想到真的能亲自 见到 这样的造物!@w4 这甚至都不够制造 完整的 武器.@w3 我们能做到最好的也就是把 守护者的弩 改装成类似于等粒子发射器的武器.@w4 @p8 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 这也许对我们来说都是个不错的选择，萨满.@w6 我们毕生所学就是用弩箭;@w2 但是我们没人能用明白枪械.@p8 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 行啊...@w3 我这就召集其他萨满来开始改装.@w5 YOU， 队长...@w2 把你空出来的人手叫来给我们送现在要改装的武器.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 那我现在应该做什么?@p5 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 在我们做完之前，到围墙上去帮我们顶住.@w6 快去!@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 感谢你所做的一切，指挥官.@w5 愿神灵引导你前往Empyrion...

English: [ Shaman Dolmac ] No!@w2 No!@w2 I am loyal to this temple!@w4 And it is FOR this temple, FOR my people that we will be spared the genocide that YOU have wrought!!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] You sold out your own people to the Zirax!@w4 Why?!@w2 So you can take the place of High Shaman after they've killed everyone else?!@p7 [ Shaman Dolmac ] YES!@w4 That position is meant to be mine!@w3 Orizel is a fool and a fraud!@w4 None have been so attentive to the words of the spirits than me! ME!!@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You disgust me, Dolmac...@w5 I should kill you where you stand!@p6 [ Shaman Dolmac ] Then you would be violating your oath, GUARDIAN!@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] It would be worth it...@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Ulath!@w4 Arrest former Shaman Dolmac and place him in one of the Penitants Cells.@w4 Deny all claims of innocence or mercy and lock him in there.@w4 Send Shaman Ur'cena in here on your way out with the prisoner.@p7 [ Guardian Ulath ] Right away, Captain!@p5 [ Deranged Lunatic ] YOU'RE A TRAITOR TY'NAN!!@w4 YOU WILL ALL DIE!! ONLY THROUGH ME WILL YOU ALL BE SAVED!!!@p7 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] What in the bloody hell was that!?@w3 I want an explanation, Ty'nan!@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] My apologies, Shaman Ur'cera.@w3 It has come to light that Dolmac has been working with the Zirax to assume ascendancy to Orizel's position.@w8 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Impossible!@w3 There are a half-dozen of us that are better qualified for the role of High Shaman than him!@w3 He'd never be accepted!@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I don't think he had that in mind, Shaman Ur'cera...@p5 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] That snivelling bastard!@w4 How'd you manage to catch him out?@p6 [ Captain Ty'nan ] The Commander here went to retrieve a case of equipment needed for the defense of the Ziggurat,@w2 which Dolmac was heavily opposed to.@w4 After being presented with the case,@w2 Dolmac refused to cooperate.@w3 When pressed, be confessed and...@w3 well,@w2 you saw the rest.@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] What's in that case anyway?
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满Dolmac ] 不!@w2 不!@w2 我终于这座神庙!@w4 这都是为了神庙，为了我们的人民免遭你招致的种族灭绝!!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你把自己的人民出卖给了兹瑞克斯!@w4 为什么要这么做?!@w2 等他们杀完了所有人你就能成为至高萨满了是吗?!@p7 [ 萨满Dolmac ] YES!@w4 那位置本就该是我的!@w3 Orizel是个愚蠢的骗子!@w4 这世上没有人比我对神明更虔诚! 只有我!!@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你令我作呕，Dolmac...@w5 我现在就该干掉你!@p6 [ 萨满Dolmac ] 这违背了你的誓言 守卫者!@p5 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 这不值得...@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] Ulath!@w4 逮捕 前任 萨满Dolmac然后把他关进忏悔间.@w4 不要有任何无辜或者仁慈的想法，把他锁在里面.@w4 回来的时候顺便把把萨满 Ur'cena带上.@p7 [ 守护者Ulath ] 这就办，队长!@p5 [ 狂躁的吼声 ] 你就是个叛徒TY'NAN!!@w4 你们全都得死!! 只有 我 才能拯救你们!!!@p7 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 那 他妈 是什么声音!?@w3 你给我解释一下，Ty'nan!@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] M非常抱歉，萨满 Ur'cera.@w3 只是Dolmac想要通过和兹瑞克斯串通来篡夺Orizel之位的阴谋被发现了.@w8 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 他想的美!@w3 我们之中有好几个都比他更有资格成为至高萨满!@w3 他永远不可能被接纳的!@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 我并不认为他有自知之明，萨满 Ur'cera...@p5 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 这个卑鄙的 混蛋!@w4 你是怎么发现的?@p6 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 这里的这位指挥官取来了一些用来防守金字塔的 装备 ，@w2 Dolmac对此极其反对.@w4 当箱子被呈现在他面前时，@w2 Dolmac拒绝与我们合作.@w3 被控制住以后，他说出了自己真正的想法...@w3 然后，@w2 剩下的你也看到了.@p9 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 那箱子里究竟是什么?

English: - You draw your weapon and shoot Dolmac in the head -@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Objections noted.@p5 [ Captain Ty'nan ] What the hell are you doing?!@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] He was working for the Zirax.@w2 You heard him!@w4 He wanted us to open the temple to them and surrender.@w3 Every time we came up with a way to hold off the zirax, he would forbid or complain or cite ancient mumbo-jumbo in order to stop us.@p9 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Careful, Commander.@w3 You are close to blasphemy...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] But am I wrong, Captain?@w4 Are not his speeches about submitting to the zirax?@w4 Has he not tried everything in his power to get everyone in this temple killed?@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] You may be right...@w3 But it's up to a formal enquiry to find the truth!@w3 Not@w2 summary execution!@w7 It will be hard to get everyone to believe that Dolmac was working for the enemy now...@p7 [ Captain Ty'nan ] Here comes Shaman Ur'cera.@w3 He is more...@w2 worldly than most and will likely believe the situation...@w4 I will speak and you will stay quiet!@w5 Do NOT shoot him.@p7 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] What the bloody hell happened here, Captain?!@w5 A dozen acolytes screamed out of this place saying this terran shot Dolmac.@w3 Why haven't you restrained him?!@p8 [ Captain Ty'nan ] I'm afraid Shaman Dolmac was an enemy spy.@w3 He was actively attempting to stop our defense of the Ziggurat and made an attack against our guest, Commander {PlayerName} of the UCH.@w4 He was forced to defend himself, Shaman Ur'cera...@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] You might want to work on your story a bit, Captain.@w2 It has a few holes.@w5 And you, Terran,@w2 make it very difficult to cover up your 'diplomatic measures' to the others.@w4 Why on Akua would he even attack you?
Chinese (simplified): - 你拿出武器将Dolmac一枪爆头 -@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 反对意见已收到.@p5 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你他妈在干什么?!@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 他在给兹瑞克斯卖命.@w2 你听到了!@w4 他想让我们敞开大门然后投降.@w3 每次我们想到对付兹瑞克斯的办法，他就想办法禁止或者抱怨又或者是引用古老的屁话来阻止我们.@p9 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 注意点，指挥官.@w3 你这已经接近于亵渎了...@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 但是我做错了吗，队长?@w4 他的话不就是说明在为兹瑞克斯效忠?@w4 他难道不是在尽自己所有权能想让害死神庙里的每个人?@p8 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 你也许是对的...@w3 但是我们应该通过正式的对质得到真相!@w3 而不是@w2 先斩后奏!@w7 现在恐怕就很难让大家相信Dolmac是在为兹瑞克斯卖命了...@p7 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 这位就是萨满 Ur'cera.@w3 他相对大部分其他人来说...@w2 更好说话 而且也比较可能相信现在的状况...@w4 我来和他说而 你 应该闭嘴!@w5 试着 不要 对他开枪.@p7 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 这里他妈发生了什么，队长?!@w5 一群使徒疯了一样冲出去说这个地球人开枪打死了Dolmac.@w3 你怎么还没有抓住他?!@p8 [ Ty'nan队长 ] 我想萨满Dolmac恐怕是一名敌军间谍.@w3 他非常积极地反对我们的防御计划并且试图袭击我们的客人，也就是UCH的指挥官 {PlayerName} .@w4 他被迫自卫才这么做的，萨满 Ur'cera...@p9 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 你最好再编的像一点，队长.@w2 漏洞百出了属于是.@w5 至于 你， 地球人，@w2 你对其他人进行的 '外交手段' 实在是很难以掩盖.@w4 他 究竟是 怎么样 才会 攻击你?

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Shaman Ur'cera!@w4 I see you finished putting together those plasma crossbows!@p7 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Yeah,@w2 but my hands are killing me and half the acolytes who were helping are out cold in their beds.@w3 But since you're in here and not out there or dead,@w2 i'm guessing we won.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] That's right, Shaman.@w3 The zirax have been beaten back and Captain Ty'nan is leading an advanced force to make sure they stay gone.@w6 I've gotta admit...@w3 Those plasma crossbows are very nice.@w3 I don't suppose you could make another one?@p9 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] We're all outta parts, young man.@w3 If you want to go swimming around in some sunken crypts for more cases,@w2 go right ahead but you'll need to find someone else to make one for you.@w3 I'm done.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Ah,@w3 That's too bad...@w5 So what will you do now, Shaman?@p6 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Help Orizel re-establish order and then seek my bed.@w4 It's been a long day,@w2 and far too exciting.@w6 But it's not yet over for you, traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 萨满 Ur'cera!@w4 你已经组装好那些等离子弩了!@p7 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 是啊，@w2 但是我的手已经不行了，一大半来帮忙的使徒也倒下了.@w3 不过既然你还能活着出现在这里，@w2 我猜我们是赶上了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 没错，萨满.@w3 兹瑞克斯已经被击退了，Ty'nan队长 正带着一支先锋队伍确保他们不会再来.@w6 我不得不承认...@w3 那些等离子弩 太 强了.@w3 不过你这个状态也没法再造一把了吧?@p9 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 我们的部件已经用完了，年轻人.@w3 如果你还想去附近的地穴里找几个箱子，@w2 请随意，但是你需要找 其他人 来帮你造了.@w3 我指定是不行了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊，@w3 真是抱歉...@w5 所以说现在你有什么计划， 萨满?@p6 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 帮助Orizel恢复秩序然后上床睡觉.@w4 这一天太漫长了，@w2 也太刺激了.@w6 But 但是对 你来说这还没完，旅行者.

English: [ Shaman Ur'cera ] What you're doing with Khalad,@w3 Yes, I know about that,@w2 is very important.@w4 What we've achieved here is only a temporary victory and more soldiers will be sent and even more drones will be dispatched.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] The source of both of those problems is the Drone Base.@w3 I have a feeling that is what Khalad's final goal will be...@w3 to disable the drone base and buy your people enough time to build up a defense.@p8 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Well then...@w4 Your position is slightly more important in all this than mine.@w4 So I won't keep you any longer, Traveller.@p7 [ Shaman Ur'cera ] Before you go,@w3 It may not be a Plasma Crossbow, but it is still my honor to present you with one of our very own Tal'on Crossbows.@w4 It is strong and silent,@w2 and may it help you on your way.@w6 May the spirits guide you, Traveller.
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 你和Khalad做的那些事，@w3 没错，我是知道的，@w2 确实非常重要.@w4 我们在这里取得的不过是暂时的胜利，很快更多的士兵 就会 蜂拥而至，他们甚至会带上更多的无人机.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 这一切问题的源头都是无人机基地.@w3 我也感觉到了，Khalad最终目标就是...@w3 彻底瘫痪无人机基地来给你们足够的时间建立防线.@p8 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 既然你都知道了...@w4 你现在的重要比我还高上一些.@w4 我不会耽误你太久，旅行者.@p7 [ 萨满 Ur'cera ] 在你离开之前，@w3 虽然这不是等离子弩，但是我也将充满荣幸地为您呈上这把我珍藏的 泰隆十字弓.@w4 它致命且无声，@w2 也许在你的旅途中能帮上你.@w6 愿神明指引你，旅行者.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] The Ziggurat is safe...@w4 What happened!?@w2 You're injured!@p7 [ Khalad ] I ran into...@w2 a random patrol on the way back here...@w3 I was careless...@w3 I thought they'd have pulled back the patrols for the attacks.@w6 You don't need to worry,@w2 i've already used a Trauma Kit...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 金字塔安全了...@w4 发生了什么!?@w2 你受伤了!@p7 [ Khalad ] 我回来的时候...@w2 不小心撞上了一队巡逻队...@w3 我大意了...@w3 还以为他们进攻的时候会把巡逻队撤回.@w6 不过你不必担心，@w2 我已经用过医疗包了...

English: <color=#2eafff>You should be resting while the medkit does it's job.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>在等待医疗包起效这段时间你就歇着吧.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] I know.@w3 But we don't have time to waste.@w4 There's another transport in-bound from Rendor-7 with Assault Mechanoids and more troops.@w3 If they get those on the ground here, it'll be over.@p8 [ Khalad ] We have to stop them before they get here!@w4 I'd planned to systematically take down each of the fortifications but we're out of time here, {PlayerName}.@w4 We aren't prepared for a frontal assault,@w2 so we'll have to go with stealth this time.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 我明白.@w3 但是没时间了.@w4 另一批来自 Rendor-7 的运输队装满了 突击机甲 和士兵.@w3 如果他们被成功地派到这里，一切都完了.@p8 [ Khalad ] 我们必须在到达前阻止他们!@w4 之前我有计划一个一个的拿下那些工事但是现在已经不是慢慢来的时候了， {PlayerName}.@w4 我们不会正面突袭了t，@w2 s这次我们玩点阴的.

English: [ Khalad ] I'll be fine.@w4 Like I said, nothing to worry about.@w4 There's another transport in-bound from Rendor-7 with Assault Mechanoids and more troops.@w3 If they get those on the ground here, it'll be over.@p8 [ Khalad ] We have to stop them before they get here!@w4 I'd planned to systematically take down each of the fortifications but we're out of time here, {PlayerName}.@w4 We aren't prepared for a frontal assault,@w2 so we'll have to go with stealth for this.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 我没事的.@w4 就像我之前说的，没什么大不了.@w4 另一批来自 Rendor-7 的运输队装满了 突击机甲 和士兵.@w3 如果他们被成功地派到这里，一切都完了.@p8 [ Khalad ] W我们必须在到达前阻止他们!@w4 之前我有计划一个一个的拿下那些工事但是现在已经不是慢慢来的时候了， {PlayerName}.@w4 我们不会正面突袭了，@w2 这次我们玩点阴的.

English: [ Khalad ] Thanks...@w3 I'll try to remember that next time someone shoots me in the back.@w4 But why stop at ducking?@w3 I personally prefer to do a double-somersault,@w2 finish with a headstand with my weapon drawn like a true Tal'on warrior.@w6 I suppose ducking is a good first step too...@w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] Jokes aside, time is not on our side this time, friend.@w7 There's another transport in-bound from Rendor-7 with Assault Mechanoids and more troops.@w3 If they get those on the ground here, it'll be over.@p8 [ Khalad ] We have to stop them before they get here!@w4 I'd planned to systematically take down each of the fortifications but we're out of time here, {PlayerName}.@w4 We aren't prepared for a frontal assault,@w2 so we'll have to go with stealth for this.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 谢谢关心...@w3 下次有人朝我背后开枪我会记得躲着的.@w4 但是为什么只是躲着?@w3 我个人更喜欢来个双后空翻，@w2 然后像一个震症的泰隆勇士那样单手撑地抽出武器.@w6 虽然我觉得一开始躲起来也不错...@w5 @p8 [ Khalad ] 不开玩笑了， 这次时间并不站在我们这边， 朋友.@w7 T另一批来自 Rendor-7 的运输队装满了 突击机甲 和士兵.@w3 如果他们被成功地派到这里，一切都完了.@p8 [ Khalad ] 我们必须在到达前阻止他们!@w4 之前我有计划一个一个的拿下那些工事但是现在已经不是慢慢来的时候了， {PlayerName}.@w4 我们不会正面突袭了，@w2 这次我们玩点阴的.

English: [ Khalad ] The Drone Base...@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Are you insane?@w3 That base is the most heavily-fortified structure on the planet!@w3 It has an entire army stationed inside it!@p7 [ Khalad ] No it doesn't.@w3 Not anymore.@w4 A cycle ago when your vessels appeared in orbit, one of the Zirax's Corvettes was shot down over the previous Drone Base.@w4 It's nothing more than a crater right now.@p7 [ Khalad ] The new one they put up in it's place is made from the wreckage of the old one.@w4 It looks impressive, but has serious deficiencies caused by using parts from the corvette to fill in the gaps.@p8 [ Khalad ] Ow...@w4 I got a bit too excited there... @w6 Anyway,@w2 I watched them build the thing and i've scouted the place out a few dozen times.@w3 It's not impossible.@w3 But must be done on foot.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 无人机基地...@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 你 疯了吗?@w3 那座基地是星球上最为坚固的堡垒!@w3 里面足足有 一个师 的人在等着!@p7 [ Khalad ] 并不是.@w3 或者说不再是了.@w4 一年以前你们的飞船出现在轨道上的时候，有一艘兹瑞克斯护卫舰被打了下来，正巧就撞在了之前的无人机基地上.@w4 那里现在只剩下一个坑了.@p7 [ Khalad ] 现在那里的无人机基地是用原来的残骸拼凑而成的.@w4 它 看起来 依然很唬人， 但是由于有一部分用了护卫舰的材质，它实际上是有缺陷的.@p8 [ Khalad ] 哦...@w4 我可能有点太兴奋了...@w6 不管这些，@w2 我是看着他们建成的，而且之后我也去侦察过很多次.@w3 这并非不可能.@w3 但是必须步行.

English: <color=#2eafff>Why on foot? A hover vessel or small spacecraft could get there quicker.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>为什么要步行? 悬浮飞船或者小飞船不是快得多.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] We're going for stealth.@w4 If you want to get shot out of the sky,@w2 there are worse ways.@w4 If we're detected too early, they'll call for reinforcements from the other bases and we'll never get in.@p8 [ Khalad ] The reason we'll need to go in on foot is because the turrets used on the Drone Base were taken from the Corvette.@w3 They were never designed to fire at a downward angle.@w4 That makes them virtually blind when covering anything shorter than the exterior walls of the Base.@p9 [ Khalad ] The real problem will be getting inside those walls without climbing over them, while the shield is still active.@w6 That's where that cargo shipment that I sabotaged comes into it.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 我们需要潜入.@w4 如果你想在天上吃枪子，@w2 方法可多了去了.@w4 如果我们过早被发现，他们就会从别的基地呼叫增援，那我们就别想进去了.@p8 [ Khalad ] T我们 需要 步行的原因是因为基地的炮塔是从护卫舰上拆下来的.@w3 他们的设计就不是用来朝下面打的.@w4 这使得他们对于比外墙矮的目标来说都是瞎子.@p9 [ Khalad ] 但 真正的 问题在于不用翻越直接进去，特别是在护盾还开着的情况下.@w6 这就要说到我要劫的那个车队了.

English: [ Khalad ] The plan is broken up into two parts:@w4 The first is to move on-foot to the Cargo Transport that I spent hours sabotaging;@w2 Kill the guards,@w2 SILENTLY!@w4 Then offload their cargo of Demolition Charges.@p8 [ Khalad ] The second part is to sneak up to the Drone Base, also on-foot, place the Demolition Charges against the rear wall and blow our way in.@w6 We won't need to take down the shields or scale the wall, so we should be safe the whole way.@p8 [ Khalad ] Once inside, i'll make my way around the outside, while you disable the shields.@w4 From there,@w2 we make our way inside and take over the base.@w6 Simple!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I don't think you've thought this plan through very well, Khalad...@w5 There are a LOT of things that could go wrong.@p7 [ Khalad ] Yes,@w2 there are...@w5 I've scouted the place a dozen times and even watched them build the place.@w3 If you do exactly as I say, we'll be in without them even noticing.@p8 [ Khalad ] But first things first...@w4 We need to get those charges.@w6 You have my radio frequency, right?@w4 Good.@p7 [ Khalad ] I've sent the location where the Convoy's stopped to your AI.@w4 You'll approach to 500 meters,@w3 i'm sure either by ship@w2 or that wheeled contraption you ride around on.@w5 Then proceed on foot.@p7 [ Khalad ] The Convoy has the same kind of turret the Drone Base has, so as long as you're on the ground,@w2 you won't be shot.@w4 You need to be on foot to avoid being spotted by ground troops or you'll end up being attacked from both sides.@w5 You have a silenced weapon?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Shaman Ur'cera gave me this Crossbow.@w3 It should be quiet enough.@w3 Plus i've always wanted to use one of these things since I saw Ki'eve with one.@p8 [ Khalad ] Okay, good.@w5 Contact me by radio when you're 500 meters out from the Convoy.@w3 I'll start in from the opposite side.@w3 I may be a little late since i'm still recovering.@w4 May the spirits guide us, {PlayerName}.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 计划分为两部分:@w4 第一步是 步行 接近我花了 好几个小时 破坏的 运输车队 ;@w2 干掉守卫，@w2 一定要安静!@w4 然后把他们货箱里的 爆破炸药卸下来.@p8 [ Khalad ] 第二部分则是悄悄接近 无人机基地， 同样也是 步行， 把爆破炸药.@w6 这样我们就可以不关掉护盾的同时也不用翻墙了，一路上都应该是安全的.@p8 [ Khalad ] 一旦进去了，我会在外围绕上一圈确保安全，而 你 则去关掉护盾.@w4 那之后，@w2 我们就可以进去拿下基地.@w6 超简单!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我不觉得你的计划做的足够周密，Khalad...@w5 这里面有太多变数了.@p7 [ Khalad ] 没错，@w2 确实有...@w5 但是鉴于我侦察了十几次外加亲眼看着他们捡起来那个地方.@w3 你只要完全按照我说的做，我们就可以在他们发现之前潜入进去.@p8 [ Khalad ] 但是首先...@w4 我们需要这些炸药.@w6 你知道我的无线电频道对吧?@w4 很好.@p7 [ Khalad ] 我把车队被截停的位置发给你的AI了.@w4 你需要到达500m以内，@w3 在那之前无论是飞船@w2 或者是你骑着的那种带轮子的东西都是可以的.@w5 之后就步行靠近.@p7 [ Khalad ] 车队上也有个和基地一样的炮塔，所以只要你贴着地走，@w2 就不会挨打.@w4 步行可以让你不被发现，这样就可以避免被两面夹击.@w5 你手上有无声武器吗?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 萨满 Ur'cera 给了我这把 弩.@w3 应该足够安静了.@w3 而且自从我看到 Ki'eve 拿着一把之后就一直想试试.@p8 [ Khalad ] ，不错，那就够了.@w5 你到达车队500m开外的时候用无线电联系我.@w3 我会从另一边接近.@w3 不过我身上有伤所以可能会晚一点.@w4 愿神明指引我们，{PlayerName}.

English: [ Khalad ]\nYou're still here?@w3\nDid I screw up the mission briefing or is there something else?
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ]\n你还在这?@w3 \n是我的任务简报有问题还是有其他什么事?

English: [ Tal'on Warrior ]\nI'm scouting out enemy positions.@w3\nYou didn't see me,@w2 You will speak of this to no one.
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆 Warrior ]\n我会侦察一下敌方的位置.@w3 \n你如果没见到我，@w2 也就没得说了.

English: [ Khalad ]\nI'm sticking around here for a bit.@w3\nThey may have patrols come sniffing around and i'm going to discourage them finding anything we don't want them to find.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ]\n我会在这里多逗留一会.@w3 \n他们可能会有探子在附近搜集情报，我会确保他们空手而归.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Where the hell have you been!?@w3 I took out most of the transport guards on my own.@p6 [ Khalad ] I got delayed by a drone flying over.@w2 I wasn't prepared for a drone to pass by and it was a big one too.@w3 They must've pulled the parts out of storage since they don't normally use those kinds of drone on this planet.@p7 [ Khalad ] Let's get this over with before they decide come back.@p5 [ Khalad ] See that black box on the back of the lead vehicle?@w4 There should be Demolition Charges in it.@w3 We'll need at least six charges to be successful in taking down the drone base.@w4 I will check the the containers on the other vehicles.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 你他妈去哪了!?@w3 我几乎是一个人杀光了所有的车队守卫.@p6 [ Khalad ] 我被飞过的无人机耽搁了.@w2 我没料到路上会有无人机飞过，还是大的那种.@w3 他们肯定是从材料仓库里特意找的部件组装的，这种无人机一般不会在这种星球上用.@p7 [ Khalad ] 我们赶紧在那些东西回来之前搞完吧.@p5 [ Khalad ] 看到头车后面那个 黑箱子了吗?@w4 里面应该就是爆破炸药了.@w3 我们需要 至少6个 炸药来拿下无人机基地.@w4 我会看看其他车上的容器.

English: [ Khalad ] Go check that dark box on the back of the lead vehicle.@w4 It should have the Demolition Charges we're looking for. Bring me back at least 6 of them.@w2 You can keep whatever else is in it.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 去看看头车后面的那个黑箱子.@w4 里面应该会有我们要找的 爆破炸药 . 至少 给我带回来6个.@w2 其他找到的东西你可以自己留着.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I've got the demo charges.@w4 I also found this sweet-looking rocket launcher in the box.@w3 Do you want it?@p7 [ Khalad ] I found one in another box, so you keep it.@w4 I found a few charges myself,@w3 Not enough for the mission.@w3 I have another use in mind for them.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我拿到爆破炸药了.@w4 我还找到了这个看起来相当带劲的兹瑞克斯火箭筒.@w3 你想要吗?@p7 [ Khalad ] 我也找到了一个，你留着吧.@w4 我自己也找到了点炸药，@w3 不过还是不够的.@w3 这东西还有别的用.

English: [ Khalad ] Wait...@w4 Do you hear that?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] I don't hear anything@p5 [ Khalad ] That drone is coming back.@w3 I hope you've got that Rocket Launcher you found handy.@w2 It's the only thing we've got that'll take it down!@p7 [ Khalad ] Stay in cover behind the trucks!@w3 Don't let it get a clear shot at you.@w3 This is a whole different beast than the ones we've dealt with so far!
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 等下...@w4 你听见了吗?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 我什么都没听见@p5 [ Khalad ] 那个无人机回来了.@w3 但愿你找到的 筒子 好用.@w2 这是我们手上唯一能把它打下来的东西!@p7 [ Khalad ] 把车队当作掩体!@w3 不要给他射击窗口.@w3 这和我们以前解决过的完全不是一个档次!

English: [ Khalad ] Quit standing around!@w3 Start setting the demo charges on the vehicles.@p7 [ Khalad ] If we're lucky; they'll think that the bombs were accidentally set off and killed everyone and destroyed their Drone Gunship.@w4 If not...@w3 Well then we'll be far from this place.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 不要傻站着了!@w3 开始往车上装炸药吧.@p7 [ Khalad ] 如果我们足够走运；他们会以为只是炸弹意外殉爆了，把这里所有人和无人机都带走了.@w4 就算不是那样...@w3 我们至少也跑远了.

English: [ Tal'on Warrior ]\nYou may be wondering why i'm up here...@w4\nI'm wondering the same thing myself.@w2 It's funny how things turn out in life@w2, but here we are!
Chinese (simplified): [ 泰隆 Warrior ]\n你也许会在想为什么我在这里...@w4 \n我自己也在考虑这个问题.@w2 生活就是这样充满了惊喜@w2 ， 但是我就是在这了!

English: [ Technician ]\nKhalad asked me to see what I could pull from the Drone Base's systems.@w4\nYou don't need to worry about me,@w2 i'll finish up here soon.
Chinese (simplified): [ 技师 ]\nKhalad 问我能不能从无人机基地的系统里弄出点什么来.@w4 \n不用担心我，@w2 马上就弄完了.

English: <color=#2eafff>Good work. I look forward to seeing the results.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>做的好. 希望能看到你的成果.</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] What are you doing?@w2 Checking your email?@p6 [ Khalad ] I do not know what that is, {PlayerName}.@w4 No, I am checking the base records for the location of Commander Dreadarm.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Wasn't he the guy I shot when I came up here?@p6 [ Khalad ] No,@w2 that was a troop commander sent to hold the Control Room. @w6 Damn!@w4 The Base Commander left the planet as soon as the attack on the temple failed.@w3 The coward!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 你在做什么?@w2 看你的收件箱?@p6 [ Khalad ] 我不知道那是什么， {PlayerName}.@w4 不，我在基地的记录里找恐惧武器指挥官的去向.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 不是我刚才上来毙掉那个吗?@p6 [ Khalad ] 并不是，@w2 那只是个临时派来的指挥官.@w6 见鬼!@w4 基地的指挥官在攻击金字塔失败之后就立刻离开了星球.@w3 这个 懦夫!

English: <color=#2eafff>Is there anything else important on there?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>这里还有其他比较重要的事吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] The usual troop deployments and drone controls.@w4 They've been locked down by the system core though.@w3 This is nothing more than an information terminal now.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] I was hoping to find out what happened to those traitors that sided with Ki'eve.@w3 They must be somewhere on this planet...@p7 [ Khalad ] I'm afraid not, my friend.@w4 The Commander left with three of them in tow. They left on a Destroyer headed to an ocean world several lightyears from this planet.@w6 I know this world.@w4 It is one of the Tal'on exile worlds.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] You said three of them.@w4 There was four of them.@w3 What happened to the last one?@p6 [ Khalad ] There is no mention of them it seems.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Hopefully we'll have better luck with the system core.@w4 Are you coming?@p5 [ Khalad ] Let me finish up copying the files here and i'll meet you on the lower level.@w4 I've called someone else to take over.@w2 I want to make sure he has access when he gets here.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 就是一般的部队部署和无人机操作.@w4 不过都被系统核心锁定了.@w3 现在这就是个信息终端.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我还想着能不能找到点关于Ki'eve那几个叛徒的消息.@w3 他们肯定就在这颗星球上的 某个地方 ...@p7 [ Khalad ] 我想并非如此，我的朋友.@w4 指挥官带着他们三个一起跑了. 他们乘坐一艘驱逐舰去了几光年之外的一个海洋星球.@w6 我 知道 那个星球.@w4 那里是泰隆的一个流放地.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 你说三个人.@w4 但是实际上一共有四个.@w3 剩下那个呢?@p6 [ Khalad ] 这里面没有提到.@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 但愿我们找系统核心能顺利点.@w4 你要来吗?@p5 [ Khalad ] 等我把文件都复制完，到时楼下见.@w4 我已经叫人来打扫战场了.@w2 我得在这里给他接风.

English: [ Khalad ]\nI'll be a few minutes longer.@w3 Is there something specific you wanted?
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ]\n我还要花几分钟.@w3 你还有什么想要的吗?

English: <color=#2eafff>Did you find anything else useful in the files?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你在文件里还找到什么有用的信息了吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Hello Geam.@w4 It's been a long time...@p6 [ Prisoner ] Yes,@w3 yes it has...@w5 How is your uncle?@w3 I always liked his sermons.@w3 So full of hope.@p7 [ Khalad ] He's alive and well.@w4 How's Torma?@w3 Either of you could've been chief in another cycle or two...@w4 If you hadn't screwed up so badly.@p7 [ Prisoner Geam ] Don't you dare stand there and lie to me, Khalad!@w4 If you hadn't left YOU would be the next one to be chief!@w3 You should have been our chief instead of letting that old fool clinging to his path of submission to the zirax!@p8 [ Khalad ] Him?!@w2 What about YOU?!@w6 Hundreds are dead,@w2 the Ziggurat was attacked and the Village is in ruins because you allied with these bastards!@w4 You started an all out war between the Tal'on and the Zirax and we are just not ready for it.@p9 [ Prisoner Geam ] And yet@w2 here you are...@w4 Not a prisoner like me.@w2 You're standing here inside the enemy's stronghold,@w2 a weapon in your hand and fire in your soul.@w4 You will be our chief.@w3 Our people will rise up,@w2 united in anger,@w2 finally with the will to fight.@p9 [ Khalad ] Is that why you did it, Geam?@w4 To get the people to fight?@w3 So you could stand there proudly as they're killed by weapons fired from orbit?!@w4 Is THAT how your 'master plan' is supposed to end?@w3 Because that's what will happen!@p9 [ Prisoner Geam ] No,@w2 it won't.@w5 The Zirax are weakened,@w3 their fleet is over-extended.@w4 The Legacy are reawakening and those stupid Zirax scum are busy with their own civil war.@w5 Now is the time for us to rise up,@w3 while we still can.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你好啊Geam.@w4 好久不见了...@p6 [ 犯人 ] Yes，@w3 是啊已经...@w5 你叔叔怎么样?@w3 我一直很喜欢他的布道会.@w3 充满了希望.@p7 [ Khalad ] 他活得好好的.@w4 那 Torma呢?@w3 你们其中一个应该可以在两年之内当上酋长吧...@w4 如果你没有搞砸的话.@p7 [ 犯人Geam ] 你怎么敢在这里对我撒谎，Khalad!@w4 如果不是你离开了， 你 才会是下一任酋长!@w3 你 应该已经 成为了我们的酋长而不是让那个愚蠢的老东西在那搞他的投降主义!@p8 [ Khalad ] 你有脸说他?!@w2 不如说说 你自己?!@w6 几百个人都 死了，@w2 金字塔受到了攻击，村子也变成了废墟，这都是因为 你们 勾结这些混蛋!@w4 你们在我们完全没有准备的情况下挑起了泰隆和兹瑞克斯之间的战争.@p9 [ 犯人Geam ] 然而你现在还是来了@w2 这里 ...@w4 不像我一样是个囚犯.@w2 你现在就在这敌军据点 里面 ，@w2 手握武器斗志昂扬.@w4 你 一定会 成为我们的酋长.@w3 我们的人民会崛起，@w2 因为愤怒而团结，@w2 因此 充满了斗争的意志.@p9 [ Khalad ] 这就是你这么做的原因，Geam?@w4 强迫人们去战斗?@w3 然后你就可以在这里看他们被轨道上的武器灭杀?!@w4 这就是你的'宏伟计划' 收尾的方式吗?@w3 因为这就是现实!@p9 [ 犯人Geam ] 不，@w2 不会的.@w5 兹瑞克斯被削弱了，@w3 他们的舰队分散的太严重.@w4 遗留者已经觉醒，而兹瑞克斯还在忙着他们那愚蠢的内战.@w5 现在正是起身反抗之时，@w3 如果我们还能做到的话.

English: If this has all been about getting the Tal'on to rise up and fight the Zirax, why did you come after me?
Chinese (simplified): 如果这就是你挑起泰隆起义的原因，那为什么还会来追杀我?

English: [ Prisoner Geam ] I am truly sorry about that, Terran.@w6 I wasn't interested in justice or revenge against your people like the others.@w4 I merely saw a way in with the zirax,@w2 a way to spark the conflict@w4 and in you,@w2 I found an ally for my people.@w3 An ally with no agenda,@w3 one that could help them rise and make no demands of them.@p9 [ Prisoner Geam ] For what it's worth,@w3 I hope you can forgive me.@w5 But know this:@w3 If I were given the option I would make the same choice all over again.@w3 For the sake of my people...@p9 [ Khalad ] What about the rest of them, Geam?@w6 Why are you here while they're on their way with the Commander to one of the other Tal'on worlds?@w4 What's so special about Ampathos?@p8 [ Prisoner Geam ] I do not know.@w5 I know that is it one of the worlds that the Zirax exiled the survivors of The Purge to,@w2 an Ocean world.@w3 But they separated me from the others and confined me here before they told me any more... @p9 Hey!@w3 Over here!@w2 I know! I know!
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人Geam ] 我很抱歉，地球人.@w6 我无意对你们的人践行正义或者复仇什么的.@w4 我只对兹瑞克斯有这种想法，@w2 激起争端的方法之一，@w4 就在你身上，@w2 我看到了成为我们人民盟友的前置.@w3 一个无私的，@w3 可以帮助我们反抗而不索取的盟友.@p9 [ 犯人Geam ] 希望你看在这点上，@w3 可以宽恕我.@w5 但是要明白：@w3 以后如果还有这样的事，我还是会做出同样的选择.@w3 这都是为了我的人民...@p9 [ Khalad ] 其他人呢，Geam?@w6 为什么只有 你 而其他人都跟着指挥官跑去另一个泰隆流放星球了?@w4 这个叫 Ampathos的到底有什么特殊之处?@p8 [ 犯人Geam ] 我不清楚.@w5 我只知道那里是兹瑞克斯在大清洗后流放幸存者的地方，@w2 一个海洋星球.@w3 他们在说出原因之前就把我和其他人分开然后关在了这里...@p9 嘿!@w3 那边的!@w2 我知道! 我知道怎么会事!

English: <color=#2eafff>And uhh... who the hell are you?</color>

[ Prisoner Torv ] Hi there!@w2 My name's Torv.@w2 How's it goin'?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] You said you know something about this Ampathos planet?@w4 Care to tell us how you ended up in here?@p7 [ Prisoner Torv ] Oh, yeah, sure!@w5 I always fall asleep while on coms duty up in the control room.@w3 The Commander's a major hard-ass who's always beating on me because of it. @w6 Anyway...@w2 As payback I took a massive dump on the Commander's chair one night and...@w3 well, he walked in while I was mid-squat.@w3 It wasn't pretty.@p9 [ Prisoner Torv ] So yeah,@w3 He shot me in the head.@w2 And then@w2, then waited outside my clone chamber and shot me again!@w5 I can understand the first time,@w2 but a second time is a little extreme, don't you think?@w6 Well,@w2 now i'm in here with this guy, and he won't talk to me at ALL.@p9 [ Prisoner Torv ] So can you let me out now?@w3 This place looks like it's going to shit and you know,@w2 i'd really rather not be here right now.
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人Torv ] 你好!@w2 我叫Torv.@w2 近来如何?@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 你说你知道有关Ampathos 的事?@w4 能说说你为什么被关在这吗?@p7 [ 犯人Torv ] 哦，对，那是当然!@w5 我 老是 在控制室里通讯器旁值班的时候睡着.@w3 指挥官是个暴脾气，经常因此揍我.@w6 不管这些...@w2 为了报复，有天晚上我在他的椅子上拉了泡大的...@w3 当然，我在拉到一半的时候他进来了.@w3 当时的情况简直不忍直视.@p9 [ 犯人Torv ] 然后就和你想的一样@w3 他给我头上来了一枪.@w2 紧接着 之后@w2 ， 他们蹲在我的克隆舱边给我 又来了一枪!@w5 我可以理解第一枪，@w2 但是 再来 一次就有点狠毒了，不这么觉得吗?@w6 当然，@w2 现在我就和这个家伙被关在这里了，他也不肯和我说话， 一句都没有.@p9 [ 犯人Torv ] 你现在能放我出来了吗?@w3 你也能看出来这地方真的很糟糕，@w2 我一点都不想在这里呆了.

English: You tell us what we want to know, then i'll let you out.
Chinese (simplified): 你先告诉我们想知道的事， 然后 我们就让你出来.

English: [ Prisoner Torv ] Deal!@w4 Okay, so it goes like this...@w5 About 17 months ago, one of Serdus big research labs on Ampathos went dark.@w2 Just 'poof!' gone.@p7 [ Prisoner Torv ] That's not a huge deal. Serdu labs have a habit of going kaput with all the dangerous stuff they poke.@w3 But this time, the two ships they sent to investigate never reported back either and no one knows why.@p8 [ Prisoner Torv ] The planet hasn't got anyone else living there,@w2 not even Polaris.@w4 Just this one lab, a few automated processing sites and a few floating Tal'on villages.@w4 The problem is that these Tal'on are now armed and not happy to see any more ships come dropping down on them.@w6 @p8 [ Prisoner Torv ] Those Tal'on friends volunteered to go down there and find out what happened down there and bring it all under control.@w2 Who does that?@w4 They're not like my fellow jailmate over there who's in it for the greater good.@p8 [ Prisoner Torv ] Okay.@w3 I spilled the beans, so let me out!
Chinese (simplified): [ 犯人Torv ] 成交!@w4 好，事情是这样的...@w5 大概就在17个月之前，塞尔杜家族在Ampathos上的一个实验室突然失联了.@w2 就 '啪!' 地一声就没了.@p7 [ 犯人Torv ] 不过这不是什么 大 问题. 塞尔杜实验室在搞些危险的东西得时候经常就会出问题.@w3 但是 这 次，他们派去调查的两艘飞船也没有任何回应，没人知道为什么.@p8 [ 犯人Torv ] 那颗星球上面没有其他人住了，@w2 连极星都没.@w4 只有这一个实验室，一些自动处理设施和零散地几个泰隆村庄.@w4 问题就是 那些 泰隆现在拿到了武器而且对任何降落的飞船都非常有敌意.@w6 @p8 [ 犯人Torv ] 那些朋友们自愿下去搞清楚发生了什么然后摆平了这一切.@w2 谁 会去 那种事?@w4 他们显然和这位长远想法的朋友不一样.@p8 [ 犯人Torv ] 好了.@w3 我都告诉你了，快放我出去!

English: <color=#2eafff>Just a minute, I want to talk with Geam. Then we'll decide.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>等一下，我再和Geam说几句. 然后我们再做决定.</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] There you have it, Geam.@w5 Your friends are going off to betray even more of your people to the Zirax.@w3 The problem we have now is what are we going to do with you?@p8 [ Prisoner Geam ] Just kill me.@w5 It's what Khalad wants and if the clan gets their hands on me,@w2 they'll do the same.@w3 It doesn't matter that my reasons were for them, i'm doomed either way.@p8 [ Khalad ] Don't speak for me, Geam.@w2 I can make my own decisions.@w6 He did not wrong me personally, {PlayerName}.@w3 This is your decision, and I leave it to you to choose what to do with the prisoners.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 这下你听到了，Geam.@w5 你的朋友们想要更进一步和兹瑞克斯合作.@w3 但是现在的问题是我们该怎么处理你?@p8 [ 犯人Geam ] 杀了我吧.@w5 这就是Khalad希望在氏族抓到我之后发生的事，@w2 他们也确实会这么做.@w3 这和我为了他们的初衷无关，我怎么着都是个死.@p8 [ Khalad ] 不要扯上我，Geam.@w2 我自有判断.@w6 他和我之间没有什么恩怨， {PlayerName}.@w3 这应该交给 你 来决定，这些囚犯的命运就由你来决定.

English: <color=#2eafff>I guess it's up to me, then.</color>

[ Torv ] Oh, thank you, thank you,@w2 soo much!@w5 I've been in there for two weeks while the Commander wanted me to starve to death.@w3 That bastard!@w2 I hope you catch up to him.@p8 [ Torv ] Oh, by the way.@w2 If you need help with an Imperial checkpoint or something, look me up and i'll see what I can do to help.@w4 Stay safe out there, Commander!
Chinese (simplified): [ Torv ] 哦，谢谢，太感谢你了，@w2 真的!@w5 我已经被关在这里两周了，指挥官想把我活活饿死在这.@w3 那个混蛋!@w2 但愿你能抓住他.@p8 [ Torv ] 哦，对了.@w2 如果你要过个什么帝国安检站之类的，提一下我，我会看看能不能帮上忙.@w4 保重，指挥官!

English: <color=#2eafff>He's an unusually happy Zirax. It seems kinda weird.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>可真是个罕见的快乐兹瑞克斯.实在是有点怪.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Goodbye, Geam.@w4 You were once my friend.@w3 I will miss the person you used to be...@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] He was doomed either way.@w3 At least this way it was quick.@p7 [ Khalad ] I will bring his body back to the people when we are finished here.@w5 The rest do not deserve such an honor.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 再见了，Geam.@w4 你曾经是我的朋友.@w3 我会怀念过去的你的...@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 反正他怎么都是死.@w3 至少这样少点痛苦.@p7 [ Khalad ] 我们结束之后我会把他的尸体带回我的人民那边.@w5 剩下的人他们不配.
<color=#2eafff>我们一定会抓到他们的，我发誓.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] You will have to get them alone, my friend.@w4 They have left this planet and my people will need me too much for me to go with you.@p7 [ Khalad ] Shoot them an extra time or two,@w3 for me.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 你得自己去了，我的朋友.@w4 他们离开了星球，而我的人民实在是太需要我留在这里了.@p7 [ Khalad ] 多给他们身上开几个洞@w3 就当是帮我泄愤了.

English: [ Torv ]\nHey, don't worry about me.@w3\nI'll be sticking around here for a while before I make my escape.
Chinese (simplified): [ Torv ]\n嘿，不用管我.@w3 \n我逃跑之前可能还需要在这里准备一下.

English: <color=#2eafff>See you later, Torv. Don't get yourself killed.</color>
[ {PlayerName} ]\nThe console appears to be in Lockdown mode.@w3 I cannot access the systems.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n控制台看上去正处于封锁模式.@w3 我无法访问系统.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nThe Console is dead.@w3 Without the core, the console has nothing to connect to.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n控制台完全没反应.@w3 没有核心，控制台也没得连接.

English: < Xenu: Drone Platform SystemCoreOS v23.7-av1 >@w3 < Reading External Language Package: > TerranStandard.lex@w3 < System Mode: > AUTISTIC (No External Input - Output Only)@w3 < Disable Lockdown Protocol? >
Chinese (simplified): < 泽纽：无人机平台系统核心OS v23.7-av1 >@w3 < 读取外部语言包： > 地球标准语.lex@w3 < 系统模式： > 自闭 (无外部输入 - 仅限输出 )@w3 < 解除封锁协议? >
