English: [ {PlayerName} ] I have returned!@w3 Did you finish what you wanted to do after the Drone Base, Khalad?@p7 [ Khalad ] Yes, I returned to my village and spoke with my uncle to inform him of the news.@w3 Reactions were...@w2 mixed.@w4 Now that the Drone Base is gone,@w2 none of my people know what to do.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我回来了!@w3 无人机基地之后你想干的事都干完了吗， Khalad?@p7 [ Khalad ] 没错，我回到村子里告诉了我叔叔这条新闻.@w3 他的反应很...@w2 复杂.@w4 现在无人机基地是没了，@w2 但是没人知道下面该怎么做.

English: <color=#2eafff>What will happen with Geam now? Even if he did it for the right reasons, he still betrayed your people.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>那Geam现在会怎么样? 就算他初衷是好的，他依然背叛了你们所有人.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Did you bring Geam's body back to the village? To his family?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你把Geam的遗体带回村子了吗? 给他的家人了?</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Should we have left Geam locked up in that prison cell? He could still get out.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我们应该就这样把Geam留在监狱里吗? 他可能会跑出来.</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Geam knows what he did was wrong and accepts the consequences of his actions.@w5 He would normally be either exiled from Tal'on Lands, forbidden all communication with the people...@w3 or he would be executed if he possessed valuable knowledge of our people that would fall into the hands of an enemy.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Well, he's already fallen into the enemy's hands...@w2 willingly.@w3 And he would probably survive for a long time on his own in the wilds right now.@w3 So he will be...@w2 executed?@p8 [ Khalad ] That would be the foregone conclusion normally...@w5 I think I will speak in his defense.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] Geam清楚自己的错误，也接受了后果.@w5 他要么被放逐出泰隆领地，永远不得与其他人往来...@w3 要么他会因为向敌人透露我们宝贵的知识而被处决.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 还能怎么说呢，他已经落入了敌人手中...@w2 而且是自愿的.@w3 而且他可能可以在野外孤身一人活很久.@w3 所以说他可能会...@w2 被处决?@p8 [ Khalad ] 过去一般都是这样的...@w5 到时候我应该会为他辩护.

English: <color=#2eafff>What?! After he started a war between the Tal'on and the Zirax on this planet?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>什么?! 就算他挑起了泰隆和兹瑞克斯的战争吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] His body was returned to the Village.@w3 He will be buried as one of the people,@w2 one of the village.@w3 He would not normally be given that honor for what he has done...@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Then why is be being allowed a Tal'on funeral?@p6 [ Khalad ] Because I spoke on his behalf.@w3 What he did was horrible,@w2 but he did it for his people...@w2 to give us a future where we could be free.@w4 In time, he may be remembered as a hero.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 他的遗体被送回村里了.@w3 会和我们其他人一样@w2 作为村子的一员下葬.@w3 一般来说他是不应该享有这份荣耀的...@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 那为什么他还能接受这样的泰隆葬礼?@p6 [ Khalad ] 因为我讲述了他的所作所为.@w3 他做的事令人发指，@w2 但他确实是为人民做的...@w2 为了我们能拥有自由的未来.@w4 那时，他会作为英雄被铭记.

English: <color=#2eafff>After he started a war between the Tal'on and Zirax?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>就算他挑起了泰隆和兹瑞克斯的战争吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] If he escapes,@w2 only death is likely to await him.@w3 He betrayed the people,@w2 so now he must live the rest of his life apart from them.@p7 [ Khalad ] I think i'll let him live like that for a while if he escapes his confinement.@w3 He may have done the wrong thing for the right reasons,@w2 but because of his actions we, the Tal'on will have a brighter future.@w3 He is too valuable a resource to be left to wallow in self-pity in some field somewhere.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 如果他想逃，@w2 等待他的只有死亡.@w3 他背叛了人民，@w2 所以他的余生都将与他们分开.@p7 [ Khalad ] 如果他真的逃了，我可能会让他这样t.@w3 他也许是为了正确的目的做了错事，@w2 但是也是因为他的行为，泰隆有了更光明的未来.@w3 让他在野外的某个泥坑里自怨自艾属实是浪费了他的一片心意.

English: <color=#2eafff>You'll forgive him? After he started a war between the Tal'on and the Zirax on this planet?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>你会宽恕他? 就算他挑起了泰隆和兹瑞克斯的战争吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Yes, even after he started a war.@w4 He was the catalyst for the events that culminated in our freedom from Zirax rule on this planet.@w3 The few zirax installations that remain are locked down and will remain so for the forseeable future.@p8 [ Khalad ] It is unfortunate that we could only open the door for my people, on this planet.@w3 There are many planets in this galaxy where my people were exiled to live as slaves or savages.@w2 Many who were even less fortunate than us to be dumped in some hellhole and left to rot.@p9 [ Khalad ] I cannot do anything to help those people,@w3 I am here with my people.@w2 They will need me...
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 没错，哪怕是他挑起了战争.@w4 他是导致我们摆脱兹瑞克斯统治这一最终结果的催化剂.@w3 剩下的兹瑞克斯设施会在可预知的未来保持封锁.@p8 [ Khalad ] 可惜的是我只能为这颗星球上的人民打开这扇门.@w3 我还有许多同胞在星系内的各个星球上被放逐，被迫像野蛮人一样生活.@w2 他们中的许多人比我们更不幸，被丢到了地狱般的敌方等死.@p9 [ Khalad ] 我没办法为他们做些什么，@w3 只能与我的人民同在.@w2 他们需要我...

English: <color=#2eafff>So you've decided to become chief after all?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>S所以最后你还是打算成为酋长吗?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] It certainly looks that way, doesn't it?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Congratulations!@w3 I'm sure your uncle will be proud.@w2 If he can convince Na'tuk to step down for you.@w3 I know you did something to upset him enough for you to be sent to the Ziggurat.@p8 [ Khalad ] You have not heard, have you?@w5 Chief Na'tuk was the first to be killed when the village was attacked.@w4 He walked out of the gates to plead with the approaching soldiers.@w3 He did not even get close enough for them to hear him before he was gunned down.@p8 [ Khalad ] He clung to the idea of peace up until he died.@w4 The Huntmaster is currently serving as interim Chief until someone...@w2 more suitable appears.@w3 He's doing a better job than anyone thought he would.@w2 I might not get the position after all!
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 看上去这是唯一的办法，不是吗?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 那么恭喜你了!@w3 我想你的叔叔肯定会感到骄傲的.@w2 前提是如果 他能说服Na'tuk让位给你.@w3 我知道你以前做的 默写是 伤透了他的心，他才会把你送去金字塔.@p8 [ Khalad ] 你没听说吗?@w5 Na'tuk是村子被袭击的第一个牺牲者.@w4 他走出了大门向兹瑞克斯求饶.@w3 他被打死的时候甚至都没走出几步.@p8 [ Khalad ] 他到死都还幻想着和平.@w4 狩猎大师现在担任着酋长的职位，直到...@w2 有更合适的人选出现.@w3 他出乎所有人意料得做的 相当好 .@w2 我也许根本不需要上位!

English: <color=#2eafff>So you've finally spoken with your uncle?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>所以说你终于和叔叔说上话了?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Yes,@w3 he was more accepting of my choices than I thought he would be.@w4 Things haven't been easy between the two of us,@w2 but he will be a good spiritual adviser if I am made Chief. @w5 @p9 [ Khalad ] Speaking of Spiritual Advisers...@w2 Shaman Ur'cera saw how much you liked our new Plasma Crossbows that he asked me to give you this, as a token of our friendship.@w4 He hopes you will enjoy it. @w4 @p9 [ Khalad ] Well, my friend...@w3 If you still wish to offer your services,@w2 there is still the matter of the remaining three Renegades that have fled with Commander Dreadarm. @w4 @p9 [ Khalad ] They have gone to an ocean world known as Ampathos.@w3 From the data extracted from the Drone Base, it is far from here.@w3 I cannot help or guide you there, since I know nothing of it except that my Tal'on brothers were once exiled there as they were here. @w7 @p9 [ {PlayerName} ] You can leave that to me.@w3 If I find the planet,@w2 I'll see what I can turn up.@w6 I've also noticed that you're starting to sound more like a chief, too.@p8 [ Khalad ] Just practising for my role.@w4 A role i'm going to have to very quickly assume if I want to keep things from going to crap once the peace sets in.@p7 [ Khalad ] I'm no good at farewells,@w2 so let me just say 'Good Luck' and 'May the spirits guide you to Empyrion' my friend.@w5 Come back and visit sometime, and spare me from the boredom of village life.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 没错，@w3 没想到他对我的选择意外得接受度很高.@w4 我们之间相处从来不容易，@w2 但是如果我成了酋长，他依然会是个很好的灵魂导师.@w5 @p9 [ Khalad ] 说到灵魂导师...@w2 萨满 Ur'cera 看到你那么喜欢 等离子弩 就让我给你带了一把 this，作为我们友谊的象征.@w4 他希望你喜欢.@w4 @p9 [ Khalad ] 行了，我的朋友...@w3 如果你还愿意帮忙，@w2 恐惧武器指挥官的残部依然还是个待解决问题.@w4 @p9 [ Khalad ] 他们去了那个叫Ampathos的海洋星球.@w3 从无人机基地里的数据来看，我们离那里还很远.@w3 这个我就帮不上忙了，除了我的泰隆同胞们曾经被放逐到哪里以外，其他我一无所知.@w7 @p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Y这个就交给我吧.@w3 如果我找到了那颗星球，@w2 我会试着做些什么.@w6 我也可以看出来你已经有点酋长样子了.@p8 [ Khalad ] 还在练习着呢.@w4 我得尽快适应这个身份，避免和平到来时再次搞得一团糟.@p7 [ Khalad ] 我不太擅长告别，@w2 现在我只能说祝你好运，以及愿神明指引你前往Empyrion.@w5 多回来看看，别让我在这太无聊了.

English: <color=#2eafff>I will, Khalad. I'm sure you'll do fine in your new role, and thank Ur'cera for me.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>一定，Khalad. 我相信你一定能做好的，别忘了帮我谢谢Ur'cera.</color>

English: [ Garrison ] Hey there, newbie!@w3 I'd shake your hand but i've got to concentrate.@w2 Yes, you guessed it.@w2 I am THE Garrison.@w3 That's right,@w2 I'm an entire garrison.@w2 Troops galore!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I see you're a 'funny-man'.@w3 I didn't expect to see a comedian on board.@p6 [ Garrison ] I know, right?@w3 I should be doing stand-up in a club somewhere.@w3But no,@w2 the guys here need a laugh too sometimes.@w4 Besides,@w2 I have warrants on most of the planets where they do comedy,@w2 so I can't go back there anyway.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I guess you just weren't that good then. @w4 So,@w2 what am I doing here, Garrison?@p7 [ Garrison ] What are any of us doing here, really?@w3 It's one of life's greatest mysteries... @w6 Okay,@w1 being serious now.@p6 [ Garrison ] We've got a big job lined up where we'll be taking down one of Polaris' Duvall-class Freighter in a few days.@w3 They're big blocky things without a hint of style. @w4 Anyway,@w2 they changed the schedule a week ago and now we're trying to find out when and where they're coming through.@p9 [ Garrison ] The info we're after is inside Kenex Station,@w3 I'm hoping you've still got your employee card, newbie@w2 since this mission will require access to the upper levels.@w3 We need to you splice a Decryption Device into the Station's main Transceiver WITHOUT being seen.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 嘿，新人!@w3 虽然我很想和你握个手但是我必须得集中精力开船.@w2 没错，正如你的猜测.@w2 我就是 大名鼎鼎的 Garrison.@w3 你没看错@w2 一个 完整的 garrison.@w2 骑兵galore!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 看得出来你确实是个'乐子人'.@w3 我没想到在这艘船上还能看到个喜剧演员.@p6 [ Garrison ] 是啊，很难想到吧?@w3 我也觉得我应该在那个俱乐部表演才对.@w3 但是并不，@w2 这里的人偶尔也需要笑一笑.@w4 除此之外，@w2 我在很多个被我整过点乐子的星球上都写了保证书，@w2 因此我也回不去了.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我估计你也没那么优秀就是了.@w4 所以@w2 我来这是干什么的， Garrison?@p7 [ Garrison ] 我们其中 任何 到底在这干什么，确切的说?@w3 这是生活中最大的谜题...@w6 好了，@w1 我严肃一点.@p6 [ Garrison ] 我们马上有个重要的工作要做，几天之后我们会拿下一艘 极星的 Duvall级护卫舰 .@w3 就是些没有美感的大方块.@w4 不管怎样，@w2 他们一周前改变了行程，我们现在就要直到他何时何地会通过.@p9 [ Garrison ] 我们需要的信息就在 Kenex Station，@w3 希望你还带着你的员工卡，新人@w2 这个任务需要你进入上层建筑.@w3 我们需要你往空间站的收发器上装个 解密设备 ，但要保证 不被 看到.

English: <color=#2eafff>Seems simple enough. Where's the Decryption device and the Transceiver?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>听起来蛮简单的. 那解密设备和收发器在什么地方?</color>

English: [ Garrison ] Ah, see.@w2 This is the problem, right here.@w4 The Decryptor couldn't be brought onto the station without being detected as an E-Warfare Device by the scanners on the doors.@w4 It had to be brought in a piece at a time and assembled ON the station.@p9 [ Garrison ] We have a guy on the station we use to fence stolen goods and he knows a guy... @w5 Anyway,@w2 the device was assembled on the station and left in a safe place for you to pick it up and stick it onto the Transceiver.@w2 Simple!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I don't like where this is going.@w3 What aren't you telling me?@p6 [ Garrison ] Ah, you got me!@w4 The Transceiver's actually on the outside of the Station!@w3 That's not a problem though,@w2 the sensors only detect illegal items being brought into the station,@w2 not out.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] You're still evading the question.@p5 [ Garrison ] Yeah...@w4 I don't know how to tell you this but...@w5 The Transceiver's right in front of the Operation Room's main window,@w2 in full view of a dozen PolSec Communication Specialists.@w4 So you gotta be REAL sneaky here.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 啊，说到这个.@w2 问题就出在这，正正好好.@w4 解码器属于是电子战设备，这玩意没办法通过安检.@w4 只能是一个一个零件带到空间站 里面 进行组装.@p9 [ Garrison ] 我们在站里面有个销赃的人，他碰巧知道个人...@w5 不管怎样，@w2 设备已经在站里组装好了，就等着你去拿了安上.@w2 简单!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我不太喜欢这种发展.@w3 你是不是有什么 没 告诉我的?@p6 [ Garrison ] 啊， 被你发现了!@w4 收发器的位置实际上是在空间站的 外侧 !@w3 不过这都不是问题，@w2 安检只会检测 进去 的东西，@w2 而不是 出来的.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 你还是在回避问题.@p5 [ Garrison ] 是啊...@w4 我不知道怎么和你说...@w5 收发器的 右边 正好对着 控制室的窗户，@w2 一堆极星安保通讯专家就会把你一览无余.@w4 所以一定得特别小心.

English: <color=#2eafff>Okay, so where do I pick up the device from?</color>

[ Garrison ] I've been informed that the Fence hid it in the men's toilets behind one of the Toilets.@w4 Talk about a shitty job, eh?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah...@w5 So I get the decryptor, go outside and stick it into the Transceiver... where?@p7 [ Garrison ] Oh yeah,@w2 there's a Data Relay on the bottom of the Transceiver.@w4 You stick that bad boy in there and we'll be able to siphon off incoming and outgoing transmissions,@w1 delay calls for reinforcements,@w2 the works!@w3 And don't be seen doing it!
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 我听说销赃的人把他藏在了 男厕所 的某个隔间里.@w4 说到狗屎工作，你也懂?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 是啊...@w5 所以我就 解码器，出去然后贴在收发器的... 什么地方?@p7 [ Garrison ] 哦对，@w2 收发器的下面 有个数据中继器 .@w4 你只要把那个小东西贴上去就可以把进出的消息全都吸进来了，@w1 延迟呼叫增援@w2 之类的!@w3 不过可别被看见了!

English: <color=#2eafff>Okay, i'll get onto that. Catch you later, Garrison.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>好，我现在就着手去办. 到时候见，Garrison.</color>

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Garrison, pick up you lazy ass!@p5 [ Garrison ] Red Rogue Delivery Service.@w3 How may I direct your call?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] We have a huge problem here.@w3 The package isn't in any of the stalls!@p6 [ Garrison ] Oh.@w3 That's not good.@w5 But hey,@w2 maybe the guy hasn't dropped it off yet?@w3 You could check with the Fence and see if he's still got it.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] Garrison，快醒醒!@p5 [ Garrison ] 红色恶徒 快递服务.@w3 需要我转接给谁?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 我们这有大麻烦了.@w3 隔间里没有包裹!@p6 [ Garrison ] 噢.@w3 这可不妙.@w5 但是往好里想，@w2 也许是那人还没放进去呢?@w3 你可以去问问销赃者看看他是不是还拿着.

English: [ Garrison ]\nOh, he's a member of the station crew.@w4\nHis permanent residence is on the other side of the main hangar bay in the crew quarters.@w4 He's a great guy and can get his hands on some really niche stuff.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ]\n哦，他是空间站工作人员之一.@w4 \n他的住所就在机库另一侧的员工宿舍里.@w4 这人可厉害了，你能从他那搞到些非常带劲的东西.
<color=#2eafff>我会去见他的. {PlayerName} 通话完毕.</color>

English: I take it you've invaded my room for some reason?
Chinese (simplified): 我想你应该可以解释为什么闯进我的房间吧?

English: <color=#2eafff>I heard you're the zirax to talk to if i'm looking for less than legal equipment.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我听说如果我需要一些不那么合法的装备，你就是我要找的那个兹瑞克斯人.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm here to talk about a certain package.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我是来问问某个东西的去向的.</color>

English: [ Fence ]\nThat could be anything!@w3 I send out packages all the time.@w4 You'll need to be more specific.@w4\nWhat is it and who is it for?
Chinese (simplified): [ 销赃者 ]\n你说的是哪个!@w3 我天天要往外送各种包裹.@w4 你得说明白点.@w4 \n是送给谁的什么东西?

English: <color=#2eafff>A Decryption Device, hidden behind a toilet. Ring any bells?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>一个解密设备，藏在厕所里. 想起来了?</color>

English: [ Fence ] Yes, yes.@w2 I put it right where you could find it; last stall in the Men's Toilet,@w2 taped to the underside of the cistern.@w4 Didn't your employer tell you anything about the job?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Oh, they did.@w3 But when I went to pick it up,@w2 it was already gone.@w5 If you haven't failed to deliver it,@w2 then that means someone else has it.@p8 [ Fence ] If it gets handed in to security they'll know that I made it!@w6 You have to find it!@w3 If they get their hands on that, PolSec will come for me!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I guess that would be too bad for you, huh?@p6 [ Fence ] I am sure I could offer them something more valuable than myself in exchange for my freedom...@w5 Are you understanding my meaning, Human?
Chinese (simplified): [ 销赃者 ] 啊，想起来了.@w2 我就把它放在那了，厕所里的最后一个隔间，@w2 就粘在坐便器的下面.@w4 雇你来的人什么都没和你说吗?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 不，他们当然说了.@w3 但是我去的时候，@w2 它 已经 不在了.@w5 如果 你 确实放在那了，@w2 那肯定是别的什么人拿走了.@p8 [ 销赃者 ] 如果这玩意落到安保手里他们肯定会知道是我做的!@w6 你必须找到它!@w3 如果他们拿到了，极星安保马上就会到我家门口!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我猜那对来说挺糟糕的是吧?@p6 [ 销赃者 ] 我想我肯定可以给他们 某些 更有价值的东西来换取我的自由...@w5 你懂我的意思吧，人类?

English: That doesn't seem like something an honorable zirax would do.
Chinese (simplified): 这可不是什么 有荣誉感的 兹瑞克斯会做的事.

English: [ Fence ] You can clearly see the line of work i'm in.@w3 What makes you think that i'm honorable?@p7 [ Fence ] I will assist you in finding the device since it's my ass on the line as well.@w4 That is the limit I am willing to extend myself.@w4 If you are caught, I will be long gone before you have the chance to talk.@w2 Understood?
Chinese (simplified): [ 销赃者 ] 你又不是看不出来我是哪条道上的.@w3 你怎么会觉得我会有荣誉感?@p7 [ 销赃者 ] 我 会 帮你找到那个包裹，毕竟我们都是一根绳上的蚂蚱.@w4 这是我唯一能做出的让步了.@w4 如果你被抓住了，在你说出任何情报之前我都会逃之夭夭.@w2 明白?

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Yes? How can I help you? @w6 Oh,@w2 it's you again.@w3 Did you ever manage to find your friends?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] Afraid not.@w3 But i'm still on the lookout for them.@w4 I'm here to ask you something else today.@p7 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Ahh...@w2 At least it's not a complaint.@w3 I've had four...@w2 'robust' women come in here looking to see the manager.@w4 I'm at my wit's end with these people!@w3 I need a vacation.
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 您好? 有什么我能帮上忙的?@w6 哦，@w2 又是你啊.@w3 最后你找到你的朋友们了吗?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 很可惜没有.@w3 现在依然在找.@w4 不过今天来是想问点别的.@p7 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] Ahh...@w2 至少不是投诉了.@w3 我这有四位...@w2 '强大的' 女士想要见经理.@w4 真拿这些人没办法!@w3 我需要休假.

English: <color=#2eafff>I dropped a very valuable package in the toilet and someone seems to have picked it up.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我在厕所里丢了个非常重要的包裹，似乎有人把它捡走了.</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Have you considered just not giving a crap?</color>
<color=#2eafff>There's a guy called Paravel who would love this job.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>有个叫Paravel的人应该很喜欢这份工作.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Excuse me?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah,@w2 the next time one of those rude, entitled women come in here, just tell them to leave.@w3 If they make a fuss or get angry you'll have grounds to call Station Security on them.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] The alternative is to keep a gun in visible sight so they'll reconsider bugging you with problems.@w3 It's worked for me at least.@p8 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Lets uhh... leave the business of managing the trading floor of a space station to me and how about you go back to telling me what your problem is?
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 你在开玩笑吧?@p5 [ {PlayerName} ] 你没听错，@w2 下次再碰到这种粗鲁而又仗势欺人的女人，让她们爬就完了.@w3 如果她们大呼小叫或者跟你发癫你可以叫安保人员来处理.@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] 或者说你带把枪放在显眼的位置，这样想找你麻烦的人就会三思而后行了.@w3 至少对我来说是管用.@p8 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 这种... 还是把管理楼层的破事留给我自己处理吧，我们还是回到刚才你的问题上?

English: <color=#2eafff>I dropped a very valuable package in the toilet and someone seems to have picked it up.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我在厕所里丢了个非常重要的包裹，似乎有人把它捡走了.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Paravel?@w3 If I recall correctly, he runs the ground station on the planet below.@w3 What does he have to do with me?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] He's an officious ass,@w2 but he likes being in charge and is hoping for a promotion.@w3 I think the Floor Manager position would be right up his alley.@w6 The Trade Station on the ground however, is much lower stress and less demanding and could be a good fit for you.@p9 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Do...@w2 you think he'd want my position?@w3 I can't see how anyone would want this role.@w2 It's horrible!@w2 The people I deal with are the worst in the galaxy!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] If you file a transfer request,@w2 i'm sure they'll take it under advisement.@w4 If you need a reference, I can always put a word in.@p7 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Oh, thank you!@w2 Thank you so much!@w4 What can I do to repay you?
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] Paravel?@w3 如果我没记错的话，他就在下面管那个地面站.@w3 他 又能在我这做什么?@p7 [ {PlayerName} ] H他这人特爱管闲事，@w2 什么事都想管而且渴望晋升.@w3 我觉得楼层经理这个位置尤其适合他.@w6 相对来说下面的那个交易站，压力更小也不会有什么人提需求，挺适合你的.@p9 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 你...@w2 真觉得他会 想 坐上我这个位置?@w3 我想不出 任何人 愿意干这活的理由.@w2 简直就是 噩梦!@w2 我在这里打交道的人都是银河系里 最糟糕的 那种!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 如果你提交一份申请，@w2 我相信他们会接受你的建议的.@w4 如果你需要推荐，我肯定能帮上忙.@p7 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 噢，谢谢你!@w2 太感谢了!@w4 我不知道该怎么报答你?

English: <color=#2eafff>I dropped a very valuable package in the toilet and someone seems to have picked it up.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我在厕所里丢了个非常重要的包裹，似乎有人把它捡走了.</color>

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Ah,@w2 another case of stolen luggage is it?@w4 Let me check the security footage. This won't take longer than a couple of seconds...@p9 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Hmmm...@w6 Only one person came out carrying something they didn't go in with.@w6 It doesn't look like a case of stolen luggage though.@w3 I know this fellow.@p8 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Yep...@w4 There he goes back to his apartment on the upper level.@w3 That's Yeven.@w4 He's one of the admin staff on the Coms Deck.
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 啊@w2 又是行李失窃是吧?@w4 我来看看安保录像. 应该用不了多久...@p9 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 嗯...@w6 只有一个人进去的时候空手但是带着东西出来的.@w6 不过不像是在偷行李.@w3 我认得他.@p8 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 没错...@w4 然后他就回到了楼上的公寓.@w3 That's Yeven.@w4 他是通信加班的工作人员之一.

English: [ Kenex Floor Manager ] Yeven?@w3 He handles hardware analysis for PolSec.@w3 He doesn't do much except investigate ships that come into the station with failing systems to determine if it's a hardware problem that may need addressing.@w6 He bowls on the weekends with the Hangar crew.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] And uh.. where is he right now?@w3 I'd like to see if he still has my package.@p8 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] He should be at his station on the com deck right now.@w4 He'll be heading to lunch any minute now, so you should be able to catch him.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I'll see if I can run into him.@w3 Thank you for your help, Manager.@p7 [ Kenex Floor Manager ] If only all my visitors here were as happy with my assistance as you are...@w5 Good day.
Chinese (simplified): [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] Yeven?@w3 他是个管硬件分析的极星安保.@w3 一般来说除非是空间站里的飞船出了系统故障，他要来确认是不是需要自己处理，否则一般都不怎么出门的.@w6 他周末会和机库成员一起打保龄球.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 然后额.. 他 现在 在哪?@w3 我得看看他是不是拿着我的包裹.@p8 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 他现在应该就在通讯甲板自己的位置上.@w4 不过他马上就要去吃午饭了，你应该可以碰上他.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我来看看是不是可以找到.@w3 感谢你的帮助，经理.@p7 [ Kenex 楼层经理 ] 如果每个来我这的人都和你一样好脾气就好了...@w5 祝你生活愉快.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] IDA, the package isn't here either.@w3 He must've taken it somewhere.@w5 I've found his computer and it's still logged in.@w2 It might tell us where he put it.@p8 < KNX-OS - Personal Terminal 33A - USER: YevenJ > Welcome Back YEVENJ@w3 Loading user settings...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] IDA，包裹也不在这.@w3 他肯定是带到什么地方去了.@w5 我看他的计算机还没有登出.@w2 也许能找到包裹的去向.@p8 < KNX-OS - 个人终端 33A - USER: YevenJ > 欢迎回来来 YEVENJ@w3 加载用户设置...

English: < KNX-OS - Personal Terminal 33A - USER: YevenJ >\nMenu/History/@w3\nDisplaying last 4 Results...
Chinese (simplified): KNX-OS - 个人终端33A - 用户：YevenJ\n菜单/历史/@w3 \n显示最后4条结果...
<color=#00ffee>工作报告：POL-077W 杜瓦尔级货船 B05</color>
<color=#00ffee>工作报告：POL-659 图尔萨斯级战列舰</color>

English: < KNX-OS - Personal Terminal 33A - USER: YevenJ > Opening Report for Duvall-Class Freighter: Unit B05@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] Looks like a schematic for the Duvall-Class Freighter.@w4 Long, blocky and contains four massive containers used for transporting large cargo, industrial equipment and small vessels.@p9 < Work Report: Personal Notes > - There are three exposed electrical conduits between containers 3 and 4 that need sealing.@w3 - The airlock door on the Port Side personnel entrance is still operating with the default locking code. Anyone with access to the production manual can open this door. (URGENT)@w3 - Weapons Locker on the forward bulkhead has a broken keypad. Only the code 2222 will work until the unit is replaced.
Chinese (simplified): < KNX-OS - 个人终端 33A - USER: YevenJ > 打开Duvall级护卫舰: Unit B05@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 看上去像是Duvall级护卫舰的图纸.@w4 又长又方，有四个用于装载巨型货物，工业设备乃至小飞船的货箱 .@p9 < 工作报告：个人笔记 > - 3与4号容器之间有三处暴露的能量通路需要封闭.@w3 - 左舷的人员用气闸依然在用默认密码. 任何看过生产手册的人都能进去. (紧急)@w3 - 前舱的一个武器柜的输入板坏了. 在更换之前只能使用密码 2222 才能开启.
<color=#00ffee>工作汇报：POL-659 图拉斯级战列舰</color>

English: < KNX-OS - Personal Terminal 33A - USER: YevenJ > Opening Report for Tursas-Class Battleship@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] This...@w2 is an overview of a new line of Battleship made from an Ilmarinen-Class Superfreighter's Hull.@w3 Isn't this like... majorly illegal, IDA?@p8 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w4 It violates The Legacy Accords which was signed by the Polaris CEO and Board of Directors, along with recognized representatives of every major faction under the Zirax Empire's protection;@w2 That even includes the Tal'on.@p9 [ IDA ] The accords state that the Zirax are the protectors of the empire and all within it's borders.@w3 That in exchange for safety and security, the inner factions would be granted full protection from any hostile incursions into the galaxy but are forbidden from constructing any warships that are not for personal defense.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Don't those Destroyers the Polaris have count as a warship?@p5 [ IDA ] No, Commander.@w4 Those are the maximum limit that any faction may deploy to action.@w4 This new battleship that Polaris are constructing is several times larger than a Destroyer and to reveal it publicly would be tantamount to a declaration of war against the Empire.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] If we were to reveal it to the Empire, it would probably make things rather messy around here, wouldn't it?@w3 It would certainly make it harder to move around freely,@w2 I think it's best to keep this info to ourselves...
Chinese (simplified): < KNX-OS - 个人终端 33A - USER: YevenJ > 打开Tursas级战列舰的报告@p6 [ {PlayerName} ] 这是...@w2 一份关于由Ilmarinen级超级护卫舰船体改装来的战列舰的总览.@w3 这是不是... 完全不合法啊， IDA?@p8 [ IDA ] 没错，指挥官.@w4 这违反了极星CEO和董事会共同签署的协定，该协定同时也受到兹瑞克斯治下大部分主要势力的认可;@w2 甚至泰隆也包括在内.@p9 [ IDA ] 这份协定声明兹瑞克斯是帝国内所有人的保护者.@w3 作为保证各位的安全，兹瑞克斯会从任何入侵势力手中为势力内的成员提供保护，但是不能建造任何非个人自卫用的战舰.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] D极星的这些驱逐舰难道不算吗?@p5 [ IDA ] 并不算，指挥官.@w4 那个正好是各个派系能部署的最大型号.@w4 但是这艘在建的战舰比驱逐舰大了许多倍，宣布它的存在无异于直接与兹瑞克斯帝国宣战.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 如果我们把这件事捅给兹瑞克斯，只会让这里的一切变得更混乱，不是吗?@w3 到时候往来肯定会更麻烦@w2 我觉得还是让这件事烂在心里比较好...
<color=#00ffee>工作报告：POL-077W 杜瓦尔级货船 B05</color>

English: < KNX-OS - Personal Terminal 33A - USER: YevenJ > Opening Message: Announcement: Stolen Goods@p6 It appears that a few days ago, someone stole a container of goods retrieved from a smuggler fleeing from a regular patrol.@w3 This container was located in the middle of the cargo terminal and yet they got away without proper identification and without anyone noticing.@p9 If you notice ANYONE in the cargo terminal, report them to security immediately. So we don't get a repeat performance of what happened.@w3 - Station Administration
Chinese (simplified): < KNX-OS - 个人终端 33A - USER: YevenJ > 打开消息：通知：被盗的货物@p6 很明显就在几天前，有人偷了一箱巡逻队从走私者那里收回的货物.@w3 尽管这个货柜就放在货物终端的正中，但是他们依然设法偷走了货物，无法识别身份，也没人发现.@p9 如果你们发现任何人在用货物终端，请立即向安保部门报告. 至少不要再让这种事情发生了.@w3 - 空间站管理处

English: < KNX-OS - Personal Terminal 33A - USER: YevenJ > Opening Message: RE: Strange Device@p6 I have no idea what it is, Xayn.@w2 It's not of Polaris design and I found it hidden in the toilet, so the only thing I can guess it's for is taking dirty photos.@w3 It wouldn't be the first time...@w5 I haven't cracked it open to see what's inside since it might have anti-tampering systems in it.@p9 I tried connecting it to my terminal to run diagnostics but all I got back was a system self-diagnostic, like i'd plugged my terminal into itself.@w3 It must have some seriously powerful system defenses if it can stop MY terminal.@p9 I'll try hooking it up to the station's main computer and try and brute-forcing it with the full power of this entire station and see if I can find out what it's for.@w4 I've left it inside the Server Room and we can take a crack at it tonight, after my shift.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Oh shit.@p5 [ IDA ] I believe that is the correct term, Commander.@w4 The situation has become considerably worse.@w3 Not only has it been put in the most secure room on the station,@w2 the guards in there will shoot on sight.
Chinese (simplified): < KNX-OS - 个人终端 33A - USER: YevenJ > 打开消息：RE: 奇怪的设备@p6 我不确定这是什么东西， Xayn.@w2 我是在厕所里找到的，这很明显不是出自极星的手笔，所以我唯一的想法就是这玩意是用来偷拍的.@w3 这肯定不是第一次了...@w5 我还没把它拆开看看，如果里面有防篡改设备就不好了.@p9 我也试着把这东西接到我的终端上进行诊断，但是结果出来的就是系统自检，就好像我把的终端本身接到自己上了一样.@w3 既然能挡住我的终端，多半是某种不好对付的设备.@p9 我会把它挂到空间站的主机上试试看整个空间站的算力能不能把它强制破解开，好让我知道里面到底是个什么东西.@w4 我把它留在服务器机房里了，这样我轮班结束之后可以试着去破解一下.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 哦该死.@p5 [ IDA ] 我想你说的是对的，指挥官.@w4 情况已经可以预见的变糟了.@w3 那里不仅是全空间站最安全的房间，@w2 里面的守卫更是见到不认识的人就杀.
<color=#00ffee>工作报告：POL-077W 杜瓦尔级货船 B05</color>
<color=#00ffee>工作报告：POL-659 图尔萨斯级战列舰</color>

English: <color=#2eafff>Is there any way to get it?</color>

[ IDA ] Any attempts to breach the Control Room from the Trading Floor with the use of a jetpack will be immediately regarded as an enemy as soon as they touch the rail.@w5 If you wish to sever ties with Polaris, it's as good a way as any, Commander.@p9 [ IDA ] There is another entrance to the Control Room from the Station Personnel Quarters on the far side.@w3 But then you will need to make your way across the control room without being seen by the guards.@p9 [ IDA ] If you are commited to this mission, Commander.@w3 I recommend stealth, rather than jumping the barrier and making for the Server Room on the upper level.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Okay,@w3 so I need to find a way into the Control Room,@w3 take the elevator to upper level,@w3 Enter the server room and retrieve the device before Yeven gets off work.@w3 All without being seen by the guards who are ordered to shoot on sight.@w5 Should be a piece of cake.
Chinese (simplified): [ IDA ] 任何从交易大厅尝试用喷气背包直接进入的行为都会在碰到栏杆的那一刻被当作是敌方入侵.@w5 如果你想和极星就此断绝关系，这也未尝不是个好办法 指挥官.@p9 [ IDA ] 另一侧的居住舱也有条路可以进入控制室.@w3 但是你就得保证自己不被守卫发现.@p9 [ IDA ] 如果你坚持要进行这个任务，指挥官.@w3 我的建议是偷偷进去，而不是众目睽睽之下翻过栏杆.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 明白了，@w3 所以我只要找条路进控制室就行了对吧@w3 坐电梯上楼，@w3 在Yeven下班之前从服务器机房里把东西拿出来.@w3 别被那些见人就射的保安看到.@w5 应该很简单.

English: <color=#2eafff>Do you know the code to the Control Room?</color>

[ Fence ] What do you need to know the Control Room codes for?@w4 You shouldn't have any business going in there.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah, well...@w2 That's where the Decryption Device was taken.@w3 An administrator found it and put it in there and he's going to try and use the main computer to crack open the device's protections.@p9 [ Fence ] How could you let this happen?!@w3 If they manage to breach the protections on the Decryptor it will probably shut down all systems on the station, inluding Life Support!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] How could I let this happen?@w5 You're the idiot who thought that a good drop-off point was in the stations main PUBLIC TOILET!@w4 You could've put it in a trash can,@w2 in a potplant,@w2 Hell!@w1 You could've just held onto it and given it to me when I came here.@w4 So NOW you're going to give me the code for the Control Room so I can fix your screw-up.@p9 [ Fence ] You want the code? Fine!@w2 The code to the door is 0997@w2 Now get out of my apartment!
Chinese (simplified): [ 销赃者 ] 你要那的密码干什么?@w4 你的事应该和那里没关系吧.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 啊，这个嘛...@w2 T解密设备被带到里面去了.@w3 有个管理员找到它然后把它放在那里，准备用服务器主机进行破解.@p9 [ 销赃者 ] 你怎么能闹出这种事?!@w3 如果他们真的用空间站的主机破解那个解码器，整个空间站都会被关掉，甚至包括维生系统!@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我怎么能闹出这种事?@w5 有没有可能你才是那个觉得公厕是个绝佳交接地点的傻子!@w4 别把屎盆子往我头上扣@w2 ，@w2 见鬼!@w1 你完全可以等我过来直接在这交给我的.@w4 现在你能把密码交给我好让我替 你 擦屁股了吗.@p9 [ 销赃者 ] 你想要密码? 行啊!@w2 那扇门的密码是 0997@w2 现在快从我的房间里出去!

English: [ Garrison ]\nBetty's BDSM Boutique.@w2 All our operators are tied up right now.@w2 \nPlease leave a message you bad, bad boy.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ]\n贝蒂家BDSM精品店.@w2 我们所有接线员都正忙着呢.@w2 \n请给你的坏 坏 男孩留下消息.

English: <color=#2eafff>Can't you answer a call like a normal person?</color>

[ Garrison ] I could,@w2 but that would take all the fun out of it then.@w3 I like to come up with funny lines for when someone calls.@w4 So what's your jam this time, Newbie?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I've retrieved the package from the station's server room, of all places.@w4 Do you know if that's likely to have damaged the Decryption Device?@p8 [ Garrison ] Nah, should be fine.@w3 Won't know until you plug the sucker in anyway.@w2 Wait, did you say the SERVER ROOM?!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah,@w2 it was picked up by one of the admin staff who couldn't figure out what it was so he hooked it up to the Station's Main Computer. @w3 Why?@p9 [ Garrison ] Do you think you could get another package like that into the Server Room?@w4 We've been trying to get in there for about two years!@w3 And you just strolled on in there and pulled out a piece of the server and walked on out!
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 当然可以，@w2 但是那样就不好玩了.@w3 只要别人打进来我总是会给他们一些有趣的回复.@w4 所以说你 这次 又遇到什么问题了，新人?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我找遍了每个角落，终于从空间站的服务器机房拿回了包裹.@w4 你觉得这会不会对解码设备有什么损害?@p8 [ Garrison ] 不会，应该没啥.@w3 反正你再把那个小吸血鬼插进去之前也不会知道的.@w2 等下，你刚才是不是说的服务器机房?!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 是啊，@w2 有个管理员把它拿走了，但是自己搞不清楚是什么东西，就打算接到服务器机房里来破解.@w3 怎么了?@p9 [ Garrison ] 你能不能把别的包裹再放进去?@w4 我们花了 两年的时间就是想进到那里面去!@w3 然后你就这么直接大摇大摆地走进去，从机房里扯了一块下来拿出来了!

English: [ Garrison ] I'm glad you liked it.@w3 I like to come up with funny lines for when someone calls.@w4 So what's your jam this time, Newbie?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] I've retrieved the package from the station's server room, of all places.@w4 Do you know if that's likely to have damaged the Decryption Device?@p8 [ Garrison ] Nah, should be fine.@w3 Won't know until you plug the sucker in anyway.@w2 Wait, did you say the SERVER ROOM?!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Yeah,@w2 it was picked up by one of the admin staff who couldn't figure out what it was so he hooked it up to the Station's Main Computer. @w3 Why?@p9 [ Garrison ] Do you think you could get another package like that into the Server Room?@w4 We've been trying to get in there for about two years!@w3 And you just strolled on in there and pulled out a piece of the server and walked on out.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 很高兴你喜欢.@w3 只要别人打进来我总是会给他们一些有趣的回复.@w4 So what's 所以说你这次又遇到什么问题了，新人?@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 我找遍了每个角落，终于从空间站的服务器机房拿回了包裹.@w4 你觉得这会不会对解码设备有什么损害?@p8 [ Garrison ] 不会，应该没啥.@w3 反正你再把那个小吸血鬼插进去之前也不会知道的.@w2 等下，你刚才是不是说的服务器机房?!@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 是啊，@w2 有个管理员把它拿走了，但是自己搞不清楚是什么东西，就打算接到服务器机房里来破解.@w3 怎么了?@p9 [ Garrison ] D你能不能把别的包裹再放进去?@w4 我们花了 两年的时间就是想进到那里面去!@w3 然后你就这么直接大摇大摆地走进去，从机房里扯了一块下来拿出来了.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] So continue the mission as normal?@p6 [ Garrison ] Yeah.@w3 If you've got it, just go to the Airlock on the civilian spaceport and climb out there and attach it to the relay underneath the Communications Transceiver.@p8 [ Garrison ] And whatever you do,@w2 STAY LOW!@w4 You won't be very stealthy if they look out the window of the Operations Room and see you climbing all over their dish.@w2 So stay out of sight.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 所以说继续任务?@p6 [ Garrison ] 嗯.@w3 既然你拿到了，就从气闸出去然后飞到上面去把它装到通讯收发器下面的中继器上.@p8 [ Garrison ] 而且不论你怎么做，@w2 注意高度!@w4 如果他们从窗户往外看到你在天线上爬就不叫潜入了.@w2 所以注意避开视野.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt appears to be some kind of communications terminal hooked into the the station's dish.@w3\nI probably shouldn't mess with it.@w2 Polaris probably wouldn't thank me if I did.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n看上去有个通讯终端连在了空间站的天线上.@w3 \n我也许不该碰它.@w2 极星多半不会喜欢我的所作所为.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nI don't have the decryption device.@w3 I can't do anything with this data relay!
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n我手上没有解密设备.@w3 我没法对数据中继器做些什么!

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nOkay, i've found the relay.@w3\nDoesn't appear to be any safety system so I should be able to just put into this slot.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n好了，我找到中继器了.@w3 \n看上去并没有什么安全措施，我就直接把它插到槽位里了.

English: [ {PlayerName} ] I guess that's all I needed to do.@w4 IDA, did you detect any changes in the station's transmissions?@p7 [ IDA ] Nothing noticeable, Commander.@w3 There is a minor delay of 2 nanoseconds between internal and external transmissions leaving the dish, but that is not unusual for the station during high solar activity.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I guess that's good enough for me.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 我猜该做的都做完了.@w4 IDA，空间站的通讯有什么变化吗?@p7 [ IDA ] 没什么值得注意的，指挥官.@w3 只是天线内外的传输有2纳秒的延迟，但是太阳活动强烈的时候这也算不上反常.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我猜这就够了.

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nLooks like the Decryption Device is operating.@w3 I probably shouldn't hang around here in case I get spotted by security.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\nLooks like the Decryption Device is operating.@w3 I probably shouldn't hang around here in case I get spotted by security.

English: [ Garrison ]\nOh, you're back, Newbie.@w5\nYou didn't give me much time.@w3 Let me come up with a good joke...
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ]\n哦，你回来了，新人.@w5 \n我还没准备好呢.@w3 让我想个好玩的...
<color=#2eafff>行吧，我等你一会. 给我来点惊喜.</color>

English: [ Garrison ] Aww...@w4 Don't be such a hardass, Newbie.@w4 Gods know we have enough of them 'round here.@w2 I was hoping for a break from all the grumpy goons we have here.@w4 Even D.Z over there doesn't like my jokes!@w4 @p8 [ Female Crewmember (D.Z) ] That's because you're not funny, @w2 Garrison.@w5 I get funnier jokes off the sides of milk cartons than I get from you,@w3 and at least they're not sexist jokes.@p8 [ Garrison ] Oh please!@w3 You know you love me!@w5 She does, you know?@w2 She bursts into tears whenever I leave the ship.@p7 [ D.Z ] You never leave the ship, Garrison.@w3 Your ass is permanently glued to that chair.@w4 If ever you did leave,@w2 they would be tears of joy at finally being alone on the bridge.@p8 [ Garrison ] Wow, that's cold D.Z.@w5 I thought you had feelings for me.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 啊...@w4 别这么说嘛，新人.@w4 天知道还有多少破事.@w2 我只是想摆脱这些暴脾气的傻子们消遣一下.@w4 就连那边的D.Z也不喜欢我开玩笑!@w4 @p8 [ 女性船员 (D.Z) ] 因为你并不好笑，@w2 Garrison.@w5 我从牛奶盒上看到的笑话都比你的好，@w3 至少 那些 不是黄色笑话.@p8 [ Garrison ] Oh 又这么说!@w3 你 明明知道 自己那么爱我!@w5 她真的，你知道吗?@w2 我一离开船她就嚎啕大哭.@p7 [ D.Z ] 你 从没有 离开过飞船，Garrison.@w3 你的屁股根本就是粘在椅子上的.@w4 而且就算你 真的 离开，@w2 我流下的也只会是终于只剩下一个人在这的幸福泪水.@p8 [ Garrison ] 哇哦，真冷淡呢 D.Z.@w5 我还以为你对我有感觉.

English: <color=#2eafff>If you two are done with your flirting?</color>

[ Garrison ] Aww...@w4 Now you've put me on the spot I can't come up with anything.@w3 At least you're willing to listen to my jokes.@w4 Even D.Z over there won't listen to my jokes!@w4 @p8 [ Female Crewmember (D.Z) ] That's because you're not funny, @w2 Garrison.@w5 I get funnier jokes off the sides of milk cartons than I get from you,@w3 and at least they're not sexist jokes.@p8 [ Garrison ] Oh please!@w3 You know you love me!@w5 She does, you know?@w2 She bursts into tears whenever I leave the ship.@p7 [ D.Z ] You never leave the ship, Garrison.@w3 Your ass is permanently glued to that chair.@w4 If ever you did leave,@w2 they would be tears of joy at finally being alone on the bridge.@p8 [ Garrison ] Wow, that's cold D.Z.@w5 I thought you had feelings for me.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 啊...@w4 你把我给打断了.@w3 至少你愿意听我的笑话.@w4 就算是那个 D.Z 都不愿意!@w4 @p8 [ 女性船员 (D.Z) ] 因为你并不好笑，@w2 Garrison.@w5 我从牛奶盒上看到的笑话都比你的好，@w3 至少 they're 不是黄色笑话.@p8 [ Garrison ] 又这么说!@w3 你 明明知道 自己那么爱我!@w5 她真的，你知道吗?@w2 我一离开船她就嚎啕大哭.@p7 [ D.Z ] 你 从没有 离开过飞船，Garrison.@w3 你的屁股根本就是粘在椅子上的.@w4 而且就算你 真的 离开，@w2 我流下的也只会是终于只剩下一个人在这的幸福泪水.@p8 [ Garrison ] 哇哦，真冷淡呢 D.Z.@w5 我还以为你对我有感觉.

English: <color=#2eafff>If you two are done with your flirting?</color>

[ D.Z ] I am NOT flirting with that cockroach!@w4 I'd rather kiss Vespian and he's ugly as hell!@p7 [ Back of the Bridge ] Hey!@w2 I heard that!@w4 I'm not that ugly.@p7 [ Garrison ] Psh.@w2 Then why wear a helmet all the time except to hide your ugly-ass face?@p5 [ Back of the Bridge ] What was that?@p5 [ Garrison ] Nothing, Vespian!@w3 Just saying how I got your back, bro!@p6 [ Garrison ] Gods know I certainly don't want your front!@p7 [ Garrison ] Anyway, what's the business, Newbie?
Chinese (simplified): [ D.Z ] 我没有和那只蟑螂调情!@w4 我宁可亲Vespian一口，哪怕他丑上了天!@p7 [ 舰桥后方 ] 嘿!@w2 我听见了!@w4 我没有 那么 丑.@p7 [ Garrison ] 噗呲.@w2 那为什么一直要拿头盔遮着你那副丑脸?@p5 [ 舰桥后方 ] 你说什么?@p5 [ Garrison ] 没什么，Vespian!@w3 只是说我支持你，老哥!@p6 [ Garrison ] 上天都知道我不想正面看到你!@p7 [ Garrison ] 废话不多说，有什么事，新人?

English: [ Garrison ] Oh, hey!@w2 Good job with getting that thing installed!@w5 You've gotta tell me how you got into the Kenex Server Room!@w3 They got sensors and security all over that place.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] Just use the door at the back of the control room and walk straight for the elevator.@w4 No one even looks at someone that seems like they know what they're doing. @w6 Anyway,@w2 How's the signal looking?@p9 [ Garrison ] The whole thing looks fine to me.@w3 We're receiving transmissions from Kenex and also filtering out any reference to our little ship that might pop up in any transmissions.@w3 It should make it much easier to pull the small jobs in-system now that we can delay distress signals.@w4 You come to me if you're interested in those.@p9 [ Garrison ] Since you seem to have checked out, Newbie.@w3 You'll probably get in on the job.@w3 That means you need a code-name like us.@w3 Vespian's Red,@w2 D.Z is Pink and you...@w4 You can be Blue.@w4 I'm Yellow, by the way!
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 哦，嘿!@w2 你安装的好啊!@w5 你 一定得 告诉我你是怎么进到 Kenex服务器机房里的!@w3 那地方全是感应器和保安.@p8 [ {PlayerName} ] 就是从控制后后面的门进去然后直接走进电梯.@w4 没有一个人在看其他人就好像他们知道其他人在干什么一样.@w6 不说这些，@w2 信号怎么样?@p9 [ Garrison ] 我看起来挺不错的.@w3 我们正在接收Kenex的通讯并且筛选出任何有关目标飞船的消息.@w3 这样我们就可以延迟求救信号，星系内的一些小工作也变得方便了许多.@w4 如果你想做的话可以来找我.@p9 [ Garrison ] 既然你都来了，新人.@w3 你可以现在就着手做.@w3 这也意味着你需要像我们一样有个代号.@w3 Vespian是 红色，@w2 D.Z 是 粉色 而你 ...@w4 你就是 蓝色.@w4 顺便说一句我是 黄色!

English: [ Garrison ] Because going around calling each other by our real names is a really bad idea.@w3 Especially if some asshole is listening in on a job.@w3 They'll either sell that info back to Polaris, The Zirax or a rival Group who'll try and hit US.@p8 [ Garrison ] Okay, Blue.@w3 You can get out of here now.@w2 The next job won't be for a while, so there's no use sticking around.@w3 I'll forward your info to Markos to sign off on.
Chinese (simplified): [ Garrison ] 因为到处用真名绝对不是什么好点子.@w3 特别是如果有狗东西在监听.@w3 他们会把消息透露给极星，兹瑞克斯，或是其他的一些会对 我们下手的组织.@p8 [ Garrison ] 好了， 蓝色.@w3 你可以出去了.@w2 下次的货还有一段时间，在这里傻等也没用.@w3 我会把你的信息推给Markos.

English: [ Commander {PlayerName} ]\nI've uncovered the diagnostics port on the antenna.@w4\nI should be able to connect my SmartSuit up to the antenna to boost the signal.
Chinese (simplified): [ 指挥官 {PlayerName} ]\n我已揭开了天线上的诊断端口。@w4 \n我应该能够将我的智能服连接到天线上以增强信号。

English: [ {PlayerName} ]\nIt's the antenna of a UCH Frigate.@w4\nI've already done all that I can with it. I'll leave it alone in case there are other survivors who need it.
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ]\n这是一艘UCH护卫舰的天线。@w4 \n我已经尽我所能地处理了它。我会让它保持现状，以防有其他幸存者需要使用它。

English: <color=#0088ff>I look forward to working with you, Ida. </color><color=#ffffff>(Skip)</color>

<color=#ffee00>Acting captain's log 22-17-5301</color>@w8
Something in the cargo we were carrying has breached containment and has been affecting both the ship and the crew. @w5
It started as nothing more than a few headaches but before long it had spread to the entire crew. @w6
Slowly they became delusional and had to be locked in their quarters before they became violent. @p9
Whatever it was in that cargo we were carrying, @w3 it's been hard at work while we've been trying to contain the crew. @w6
Slowly but surely it consumed and disabled the cargo sensors and began corrupting the hull of the ship unnoticed... @w8 at least until I looked out the window @w4 and saw growths on the exterior of unit 5. @p9
I had to...@w5 order cargo purges on the remaining units that I could still access. @w8
I'm about to initiate a complete lockdown of all systems and shut all emergency bulkheads and blast doors before I... @p9
I...@w4 i've slaved the controls away from the ship's AI...@w4 to a lever here on the bridge...
@w7 I've put some of the security turrets in here to keep those things...@w4 those things...@w4 away from the controls. @w4
The code is <color=#ffee00>1523</color>...@p9
I... think@w3 I think... I'll take a little walk...@w4 outside.@w7
It looks like it'll be a lovely day@w3 outside...
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffee00>激活队长日志 22-17-5301</color>@w8 
我们携带的货物里有什么东西突破了收容，现在正在感染我们的飞船和船员.@w5 
一开始还只是有点头痛的症状，很快就散播到了所有船员身上.@w6 
慢慢的他们开始产生了幻觉，所以在出现暴力倾向之前之前他们都被关进了自己的房间.@p9 
不管货箱里是什么，@w3 在我们尝试收容船员的这段时间它都干了很多事.@w6 
慢慢地它同化并关闭了货物传感器，并且开始腐化船体...@w8 至少我在通过窗户望去的时候@w4 看到了5单元上的生长物.@p9 
我不得不...@w5 命令弹出了我们还可以访问区域的其他货物.@w8 
我必须马上启动全面系统封锁并且关闭所有舱门和防爆门，在我...@p9 
我...@w4 被奴役之前断开飞船的AI...@w4 就用舰桥上的这个拉杆...
@w7 我在这放了几个炮塔来防止那些东西...@w4 那些东西...@w4 靠近控制台.@w4 
密码是 <color=#ffee00>1523</color>...@p9 
我... 感觉@w3 我感觉... 我得走几步...@w4 出去.@w7 
看起来外面天气@w3 不错...

English: Computer System in safe mode\nPress any key to review automatically generated logs...
Chinese (simplified): 计算机系统处于安全模式\n按下任意键以查看自动生成的日志...

English: [Log 001] Hazardous substance warning issued in Container Unit 03.@w3 [Log 002] Radiation levels in Container Unit 03 are elevated.@w3 [Log 003] Foreign biological material detected in cargo conduits.@w3 [Log 004] Foreign biological material detected in Container Units 01 and 05.@w3 [Log 005] Foreign biological material detected in Container Units 07, 06 and cargo corridor.@w3 [Log 006] Foreign biological material detected in the ventilation system. @p9 [Log 007] Biological contaminants have breached containment.@w3 [Log 008] Crew ordered to quarters. Quarantine now in effect.@w3 [Log 009] Unknown lifeforms detected aboard.@w3 [Log 010] Ship entered full lockdown under executive order 124 - Condition Red.@w3 [Log 011] Crewmembers aboard: 0@w3 [Log 012] Low power detected. Entering silent mode. @p9 [Log 217] Emergency Console Reactivated - Unregistered Personel@w3
Chinese (simplified): [日志 001] 容器单元03出现有害物质预警.@w3 [日志 002] 容器单元03辐射等级上涨中.@w3 [日志 003] 货物通路中检测到外来生物材料.@w3 [日志 004] Foreign bio日志ical material detected in Container Units 01 and 05.@w3 [日志 005] Foreign bio日志ical material detected in Container Units 07， 06 and cargo corridor.@w3 [日志 006] 容器单元01，05中 检测到外来生物材料.@p9 [日志 007] 生物污染物突破收容.@w3 [日志 008] 船员被命令回到居住舱. 隔离已生效.@w3 [日志 009] 船体上检测到未知生命形态.@w3 [日志 010] 根据命令124 - 全船进入封锁状态红色状态.@w3 [日志 011] 船员数: 0@w3 [日志 012] 检测到动力不足，进入静默模式.@p9 [日志 217] 紧急控制台重新启动 - 未注册人员@w3

English: [ WARNING !! ] Hostile lifeforms detected in rear hangar bay@w6 [ WARNING !! ] Heavy Assault Mechanoid not responsive@w3 [ WARNING !! ] Ship-Defense-AI has failed authentication handshake@w3 [ WARNING !! ] Security system compromised@w3 [ WARNING !! ] IFF has been disabled@p9 Recommended actions: @w4 Divert Mechanoid security protocols to this console and initiate a hard reboot using the switch on the container. @w8 To initiate a hard reboot and divert security protocols,@w4 enter the code 6662 into the CPU's breaker switch and pull the switch down to lock the Ship-Defense-AI out of the mechanoid control system. @w7 To complete the reboot sequence you must pull the manual override lever on the mechanoid container itself. @p9 [ WARNING !! ] This system will be locked in the event that Assault Mechanoid has already been activated with IFF disabled.@w6 End of message
Chinese (simplified): [ 警告 !! ] 后机库检测到敌对生命形态@w6 [ 警告 !! ] 重型突击机甲无响应@w3 [ 警告 !! ] 飞船防御AI认证握手失效@w3 [ 警告 !! ] 安保系统已受损@w3 [ 警告 !! ] 敌我识别已失效@p9 建议行动：@w4 将机械人的安全协议转移到此控制台并使用容器上的开关启动强制重启.@w8 如需要启动强制重启并转移安全协议，@w4 请将密码 6662 输入至CPU的断路开关并拉下开关从而将飞船防御AI隔绝于机械人控制室以外.@w7 你必须拉下容器上的手动覆盖拉杆来完成重启程序.@p9 [ 警告 !! ] 突击机甲在敌我识别失效时启动的期间系统将会锁定.@w6 消息结束
被同化的 A.I 核心

English: [ {PlayerName} ] Okay, what the hell is this?@w4 IDA, got any clues?@p7 [ IDA ] It appears to be the command console for the ship's Artificial Intelligence, Commander.@w5 It seems to have been absorbed and...@w3 modified by the surrounding Legacy growth.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] I can't seem to do anything with it.@w3 It's non-responsive.@w7 Could it have something to do with the fact that the Ilmarinen mission isn't complete because everything is handled by one guy?@p9 [ IDA ] Yes, Commander.@w4 That's probably it.@w3 This console will probably start to work around Empyrion 1.6, when Vermillion writes the full mission to investigate the Ilmarinen, but it's a LOT of work.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] Should I try hitting the console?@w4 I'm sure that will activate the final stage of the mission.@p8 [ IDA ] It's worth a try, Commander.@w4 Though I recommend that you prepare to run...
Chinese (simplified): [ {PlayerName} ] 好了，这又是什么鬼?@w4 IDA，你有头绪吗?@p7 [ IDA ] 这应该是飞船的人工智能指挥控制台，指挥官.@w5 看上去已经被吸收...@w3 并且被附近的遗留者生长物篡改了.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我对此毫无办法.@w3 它没有反应.@w7 这会不会和Ilmarinen任务因为一个人处理所有事情而导致没有完成有关?@p9 [ IDA ] 是的，指挥官.@w4 这可能就是原因所在.@w3 这个端子可能会在 Empyrion 1.6之后开始运作， Vermillion 写好了整个调查Ilmarinen的剧本， 但是有很多工作要做.@p9 [ {PlayerName} ] 我是不是应该试着敲打两下控制台?@w4 我相信这样会启动任务的最后阶段.@p8 [ IDA ] 值得一试，指挥官.@w4 但是我推荐你准备好润了...

English: [ Shaman Dolmac ]\nDisgraceful!@w5\nSee that you bring your offering next time!
Chinese (simplified): [ 萨满Dolmac ]\n真是可耻!@w5 \n下次带上你的供奉，明白吗!

English: [ Mechanic ]\nThis is a room of machinery and cargo,@w3 with unstable gravity and unusual olfactory responses.@w4\nWhat is an organic like you doing down here?@w3 You are not on the cargo manifest.
Chinese (simplified): [ 技师 ]\n这里是机器和货物仓，@w3 充满了不稳定的重力和不正常的嗅觉反应.@w4 \n你这有机体下来干什么?@w3 你不在货物清单里.

English: <color=#2eafff>I figured you'd be interested in some technical data.</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#2eafff>我觉得你会对这些技术数据感兴趣.</color>

English: Attention all polaris personnel!@w4\nAn unidentified person has breached station protections. @p3
Chinese (simplified): 所有极星人员请注意!@w4 \n一名身份不明的人员突破了系统防护.@p3

English: SYSTEM INTRUSION DETECTED!\nThis terminal has been locked to prevent unauthorized access\n-ACCESS DENIED-
Chinese (simplified): 检测到系统入侵!\n此终端已被锁定以防止未经授权的访问\n-访问被拒绝-

English: @d0This is a standard communications system employed by many factions across the galaxy, Commander. If you have a valid keycard, you can extract the information stored in the satellite's memory. Lacking a keycard, the only other way to retrieve the data is to hack the system's security and forcibly retrieve the data.@p9 @d0 If you attempt to hack the satellite, you will need to bypass the security system that will attempt to block your intrusion by shutting down data nodes one-by-one until it can cut off your connection to the system. At which point you will be booted from the system.@p9 @d0 In order to take control of the system, you must reach 100% capture before the Security System reaches 100% capture and locks you out of the system. To do this, you must hack adjacent data nodes and directories, but the security system will attempt to lock surrounding nodes.@p9 @d0 When you have entered a section of code, available adjacent nodes will be displayed as a list. Accompanying each Node is a measurement of Speed [S-?], Encryption [E-?] and Filesize [F-?] of the node. Ideally you would want to pick a node with High Speed, Low Encryption and Large Filesize.@p9 Speed: Determines the minimum amount of capture gained by the Hacker from hacking the node. Encryption: Determines the minimum amount of capture gained by the Security System from hacking the node. Filesize: Determines the maximum amount of capture gained by both the Hacker and the security system from capturing that node.@p9 Hacking software can be used to accelerate your own hacking or stall the security system, but is consumed in the process. Hacking Software - Spam: Overloads the system with junk data, revealing better nodes that were previously inaccessible. Hacking Software - Overclock: Hacks all surrounding Directories for +8% capture. Hacking Software - Fortify: Encrypts captured nodes reducing the Security System's Capture rate by 8%.@p9 You may also encounter Datavaults inside the computer system. These may give Software, Unlock Points or Credits. It is also important to note that some satellites have advanced processing systems and may be faster than others. Their processing speed is displayed on the main menu. If you fail to hack any satellite, the system will be permanently locked.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 这是许多银河系派系采用的标准通信系统，指挥官。 如果你有一个有效的钥匙卡，你可以提取卫星内存中存储的信息。 如果没有钥匙卡，获取数据的唯一其他方法是黑客攻击系统安全并强行检索数据。@p9 @d0 如果你试图黑客攻击卫星，你需要绕过安全系统，它会试图通过逐个关闭数据节点来阻止你的入侵，直到它可以切断你与系统的连接。到那时，你将被系统踢出。@p9 @d0 为了控制这个系统，你必须在安全系统达到100%捕获并将你锁定在系统之外之前，达到100%捕获。 为此，你必须黑客攻击相邻的数据节点和目录，但安全系统会试图锁定周围的节点。@p9 @d0 当你输入了一段代码后，可用的相邻节点将显示为列表。 每个节点旁边都有一个速度 [S-?]，加密 [E-?]和文件大小 [F-?]的测量。理想情况下，你会选择一个高速度，低加密和大文件大小的节点。@p9 速度：决定黑客从黑客攻击该节点获得的最小捕获量。 加密：决定安全系统从黑客攻击该节点获得的最小捕获量。 文件大小：决定黑客和安全系统从捕获该节点获得的最大捕获量。@p9 黑客软件可以用来加速你自己的黑客攻击或延迟安全系统，但在过程中会被消耗。 黑客软件 - 垃圾邮件： 用垃圾数据淹没系统，揭示以前无法访问的更好节点。 黑客软件 - 超频： 为周围所有目录黑客攻击，捕获量+8%。 黑客软件 - 强化： 加密捕获的节点，减少安全系统的捕获率8%。@p9 你还可能在计算机系统中遇到数据保管库。这些可能会给出软件，解锁点或信用点。 同样重要的是要注意，一些卫星拥有先进的处理系统，可能比其他卫星更快。它们的处理速度显示在主菜单上。 如果你未能黑客攻击任何卫星，系统将被永久锁定。

English: SYSTEM INTRUSION DETECTED!\nThis terminal has been locked to prevent unauthorized access\n-ACCESS DENIED-
Chinese (simplified): 检测到系统入侵!\n此终端已被锁定以防止未经授权的访问\n-访问被拒绝-

English: I've found a package meant for a Frontier Colony somewhere.
Chinese (simplified): 我找到了一份应该送去 边境殖民地 某处的包裹.

English: Thank you for finding and retrieving one of our lost packages!\nThis contains vital supplies for one of the Colonist Frontiers out in the unclaimed regions.\nYou have been awarded: 25 Skill Points, {CargoReward} Galactic Credits and 100 Reputation Points with our Colonist friends!
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您找回我们丢失的包裹!\n该包裹包含为无人地区的边境殖民地之一所提供的重要物资.\n你已获得奖励： 25 解锁点数，{CargoReward} 信用点 以及 100 点自由殖民者声望!

English: Welcome to the Class System, Commander.@w2 I will instruct you on each of the different Classes and what they specialize in and how to improve your own class level. First, you may choose only ONE Main character class.@w2 Only upon mastering that class, can you choose a second sub-class.@p9 You may only possess one main class and one sub class, Commander. However, there are special rank classes that can be obtained by completing any number of special tasks, events or achievements.@p9 Each character class has a unique set of missions used to increase the Class level up to a maximum of 5.@w2 With each increase in Class Level you will gain additional damage, reload speed, accuracy and reduced recoil for that class' chosen weapon types.@w2 The missions can be found in your PDA (F1) after you have chosen your preferred class.@p9 The available classes are: Soldier: Specializes in Automatic Rifles, Grenade and Rocket Launchers.@w2 Marksman: Specializes in Sniper Rifles, Laser Rifles and Crossbows.@w2 Agent: Specializes in Pistols, Submachine Guns and Laser Pistols.@w2 Vanguard: Specializes in Shotguns and Miniguns.@w2 Specialist: Specializes in Flamethrowers, Plasma Cannons and Alien Weaponry.@w2 Engineer: Non-combat class that specializes in Multitools, Drills and Chainsaws; with a bonus to Warp Drive range.@p9 These are your primary class choices, Commander.@w2 If you pick a class you are not comfortable with, you cannot change to another one. So ensure that you are picking the class with skills best suited to your combat style.@w2 Do you understand?
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎光临 职业系统， 指挥官.@w2 我会指导你每一个不同的职业，他们擅长什么，以及如何提高你自己的职业级别. 首先你只能选择 一个 主要职业.@w2 只有完全掌握了这个职业，你才能选择 第二次要职业.@p9 你只能拥有一个主要职业和一个次要职业， 指挥官. 但是有 特殊职业等级 可以通过完成任意数量的特殊任务， 事件或成就获得@p9 每个角色职业都有一组独特的任务用于将职业等级提高到最高5级.@w2 随着职业等级的每一次提高你将获得额外的伤害， 装填速度， 精度和减少该职业所选择的武器类型的后坐力等.@w2 任务可以在你的 PDA (F1) 在你选择了你喜欢的职业之后.@p9 可供选择的类别有: 士兵:专长于自动步枪、手榴弹和火箭发射器.@w2 射手: 擅长狙击步枪、激光步枪和弩.@w2 特工: 专长于手枪、冲锋枪和激光手枪.@w2 先锋: 擅长猎枪和机枪.@w2 战斗专家: 擅长火焰喷射器，等离子大炮和外星武器.@w2 工程师: 非战斗类，专长于多功能工具，钻头和链锯;并增加曲速引擎的射程.@p9 这些是您的主要类选择，指挥官.@w2 如果你选择了一个你不舒服的职业， 你不能改变到另一个. 所以确保你选择的职业的技能最适合你的战斗风格.@w2 你明白么?
我明白了. (进入职业选择界面)

English: @d0<color=#ffffff>Here is the list of Main Character Classes that you can choose from, Commander.\nYou can examine the abilities of each class by selecting one from the menu. You can then confirm your choice on that class' page or return back to this menu.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffffff>以下是主要职业的列表，您可以从中选择， 指挥官.\n您可以通过从菜单中选择一个来检查每个职业的能力. 然后，您可以在职业页面上确认您的选择，或者返回到该菜单.</color>

English: You can access the Class Selection and Statistics Screen via the PDA (F1) at any time by activating the mission 'Character Class System'
Chinese (simplified): 您可以通过PDA (F1)激活任务 '职业选择系统'来随时访问职业选择和统计界面

English: @d0Soldier Soldiers are frontline combatants trained in mid-range combat specializing in the use of Assault Rifles, Pulse Rifles, Grenade Launchers and Rocket Launchers. This also applies to enemy weapons of the same type. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Assault Rifle, Advanced Assault Rifle, Elite Assault Rifle, Heavy Assault Rifle Pulse Rifle, Advanced Pulse Rifle, Tactical Stealth Rifle, Energy Pulse Rifle Grenade Launcher, Rocket Launcher, Guided Rocket Launcher, Advanced Guided Rocket Launcher Zirax Combat Rifle, Zirax Rocket Launcher.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 士兵 士兵是前线战斗人员，特意训练来进行中程战斗，专门使用突击步枪， 脉冲步枪， 榴弹发射器和火箭发射器.这也适用于敌人的同类型武器. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 突击步枪， 先进突击步枪， 精英突击步枪， 重型突击步枪 脉冲步枪， 先进脉冲步枪， 战术隐形步枪， 能量脉冲步枪 榴弹发射器， 火箭发射器， 制导火箭发射器， 先进制导火箭发射器 兹瑞克斯战斗步枪， 兹瑞克斯 火箭发射器.

English: @d0Marksman Marksmen are expert shots with scoped weapons trained in long-ranged combat specializing in the use of Sniper Rifles, Laser Rifles and Crossbows. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons@p9 Applicable Weapons: Sniper Rifle, Heavy Sniper Rifle, M77 Anti-Tank Rifle, Zirax Marksman Rifle Laser Rifle, Advanced Laser Rifle, Plasma Rifle Repeating Crossbow, Plasma Crossbow
Chinese (simplified): @d0 射手 射手是在远程战斗中使用瞄准武器训练的射击专家专门使用狙击步枪， 激光步枪和十字弩. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器@p9 适用武器: 狙击步枪， 重型狙击步枪， M77 反坦克步枪， 兹瑞克斯 射手 Rifle 激光步枪， 先进激光步枪， 等离子步枪 连弩， 等离子十字弩

English: @d0Agent Agents are elite security personnel excelling in close-quarters combat specializing in the use of small arms including Pistols, Heavy Pistols, Laser Pistols and Submachine Guns. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons@p9 Applicable Weapons: M-5 Pistol, M-6 Holosight Pistol, Elite Combat Pistol, Starhawk Heavy Pistol LS-22 Laser Pistol, LS-38 Advanced Laser Pistol, DC-17 Heavy Laser Pistol Submachine Gun, Advanced Submachine Gun, Elite Submachine Gun
Chinese (simplified): @d0 特工 特工是精锐的保安人员，擅长近距离作战专门使用小型武器包括手枪， 重型手枪， 激光手枪和冲锋枪. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器@p9 适用武器: M-5 手枪， M-6 Holosight 手枪， 精英战斗手枪， 沙漠之鹰重型手枪 LS-22 激光手枪， LS-38 先进激光手枪， DC-17 重型激光手枪 冲锋枪， 先进冲锋枪， 精英冲锋枪

English: @d0Vanguard Vanguards are the frontrunners in open combat, able to lead the charge, breach doors and take a position and hold it. Specialized for close and mid-ranged combat they employ the use of Shotguns and Miniguns. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Shotgun, Combat Shotgun, Assault Shotgun, Zirax Heavy Shotgun Minigun, Advanced Minigun, Laser Minigun
Chinese (simplified): @d0 先锋 先锋是开放战斗的领跑者，能够带头冲锋，破门而入，占据阵地并守住它，适合近距离和中距离战斗。他们使用散弹枪和迷你火神炮. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 散弹枪， 战斗散弹枪， 突击散弹枪， 兹瑞克斯 重型散弹枪 迷你火神炮， 先进迷你火神炮， 激光迷你火神炮

English: @d0Specialist Specialist are a support class trained in the use of energy and incendiary weapons such as Plasma Cannons and Flamethrowers. They are also capable of modifying the Plasma Rifle to destabilize the projectiles, causing them to explode on contact damaging the surrounding area. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Plasma Cannon, High-Output Plasma Cannon, Plasma Rifle Flamethrower, Advanced Flamethrower, Plasma Blaster
Chinese (simplified): @d0 战斗专家 战斗专家是一个支援职业，他们被训练使用能源和燃烧武器，比如等离子加农炮和火焰喷射器.它们还有能力改造等离子步枪让其发射体不稳定，使它们一接触就爆炸破坏周围区域. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 等离子加农炮， 高输出等离子加农炮， 等离子步枪 火焰喷射器， 先进火焰喷射器， 等离子爆破枪

English: @d0Engineer Engineers are a non-combatant class specializing in maintenance, harvest and salvage. Experts in the use of Multitools, Chainsaws and Drills, both handheld and ship-mounted. They are also skilled Warp Technicians, able to boost the range of a typical Warp Drive by a few lightyears above the norm. Each Class Level increases Tool Damage, Reload Speed and increases the maximum warp distance of any Warp Drive.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Survival Multitool, Multitool, Advanced Multitool Chainsaw, Mechanical Drill, Laser Drill, Enhanced Laser Drill HV, SV and CV Drills, Drill Turrets, Multiturrets and Harvest Modules Gains +2 Lightyear warp range per class level
Chinese (simplified): @d0 工程师 工程师是一个非战斗人员职业，专门从事维护、收获和打捞。擅长使用生存工具， 链锯 and 钻头，同时包括手持和舰载型号.他们也是熟练的翘曲技师，能够典型地提高范围 翘曲引擎比正常值高出几光年. 每个职业级别增加工具伤害，重新装填速度，并增加任何翘曲引擎的最大跃迁距离.@p9 适用武器: 生存多功能工具， 多功能工具， 先进多功能工具 电锯，机械钻， 激光钻头， 增强型 HV， SV和CV 钻头， 钻头炮塔， 多功能炮塔和收割模块 每个职业级别增加2光年的曲速范围

English: Congratulations, Commander. You have now confirmed {MainClass} as your Main Character Class.@w2 You will not be able to change your class again; But when you have successfully leveled your current class to level 5, you may choose a Sub-Class, that will allow you to obtain new skills.@p9 You can check your current Class Statistics at any time by activating the Class System mission in your PDA (F1). Good luck Commander.
Chinese (simplified): 恭喜， 指挥官. 你已经确定{MainClass}作为你的主要个性职业.@w2 你将无法再次更改职业; 不过当你成功的将你的职业等级提升到level 5，你可以选择一个附属职业， 这会让你获得新的技能.@p9 您可以在任何时候通过激活职业系统任务来检查您当前的职业统计数据，只要你打开PDA (F1). 祝你好运指挥官.
主职业: {MainClass} 主职业级别: {MainLevel} 附属职业: {SubClass} Sub-职业级别: {SubLevel}

English: Damage Bonus with Assault Rifles: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Pulse Rifles: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Rocket Launchers: {SkillDamage2} Blast Damage Bonus with Rockets and Grenades: {SkillDamage3} Damage may vary based on weapon quality. Reload speed and accuracy are also increased.
Chinese (simplified): 伤害加成突击步枪: {SkillDamage1} 伤害加成脉冲步枪: {SkillDamage1} 伤害加成火箭发射器: {SkillDamage2} 爆炸伤害加成火箭弹和榴弹: {SkillDamage3} 伤害可能会根据武器的质量而有所不同. 装填速度和精度也提高了.

English: Damage Bonus with Sniper Rifles: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Laser Rifles: {SkillDamage2} Damage Bonus with Crossbows: {SkillDamage1} Damage may vary based on weapon quality. Reload speed and accuracy are also increased.
Chinese (simplified): 伤害加成狙击步枪: {SkillDamage1} 伤害加成激光步枪s: {SkillDamage2} 伤害加成Crossbows: {SkillDamage1} 伤害可能会根据武器的质量而有所不同. 装填速度和精度也提高了.

English: Damage Bonus with Pistols: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Heavy Pistols: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Laser Pistols: {SkillDamage2} Damage Bonus with Submachine Guns: {SkillDamage3} Damage may vary based on weapon quality. Reload speed and accuracy are also increased.
Chinese (simplified): 伤害加成手枪: {SkillDamage1} 伤害加成重型手枪: {SkillDamage1} 伤害加成激光手枪: {SkillDamage2} 伤害加成冲锋枪: {SkillDamage3} 伤害可能会根据武器的质量而有所不同. 装填速度和精度也提高了.

English: Damage Bonus with Shotguns: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Miniguns: {SkillDamage2} Damage may vary based on weapon quality. Reload speed and accuracy are also increased.
Chinese (simplified): 伤害加成散弹枪: {SkillDamage1} 伤害加成迷你火神炮: {SkillDamage2} 伤害可能会根据武器的质量而有所不同. 装填速度和精度也提高了.

English: Damage Bonus with Plasma Cannons (Beam): {SkillDamage1} Blast Damage Bonus with Plasma Cannons: {SkillDamage2} Damage Bonus with Flamethrowers: {SkillDamage3} Fire Damage Bonus with Flamethrowers: {SkillDamage4} Added Blast Damage using a Plasma Rifle: {SkillDamage2} Damage may vary based on weapon quality. Reload speed and accuracy are also increased.
Chinese (simplified): 伤害加成等离子加农炮 (Beam): {SkillDamage1} 爆炸伤害加成等离子加农炮: {SkillDamage2} 伤害加成火焰喷射器: {SkillDamage3} Fire 伤害加成火焰喷射器: {SkillDamage4} 增加爆炸伤害，当你使用 等离子步枪: {SkillDamage2} 伤害可能会根据武器的质量而有所不同. 装填速度和精度也提高了.

English: Damage Bonus with Multitools: {SkillDamage1} Damage Bonus with Drills: {SkillDamage2} Damage Bonus with Chainsaws: {SkillDamage3} Warp Drive range increase: {SkillDamage4} LY Drill bonus also applies to ship-mounted Drills and Drill Turrets.
Chinese (simplified): 伤害加成生存工具: {SkillDamage1} 钻头伤害增加: {SkillDamage2} 伤害加成链锯: {SkillDamage3} 翘曲引擎 range increase: {SkillDamage4} LY 钻头 bonus also applies to ship-mounted 钻头 and 钻头 Turrets.

English: @d0<color=#ffffff>Congratulations on mastering your Main Character Class, Commander.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>You can now choose a </color><color=#ffff00>sub-class</color><color=#ffffff> from the remaining classes that will provide additional bonuses and skills.</color>\n<color=#dc0000>This does not affect or erase your Main Class skills.</color>
Chinese (simplified): @d0 <color=#ffffff>恭喜您完全驾驭了自己的主要职业， 指挥官.</color>\n<color=#ffffff>你现在可以从剩下的职业中选择一个 </color><color=#ffff00>附属职业</color><color=#ffffff> 以提供额外的加成.</color>\n<color=#dc0000>该选择不会影响你的主要职业技能.</color>

English: @d0Soldier Soldiers are frontline combatants trained in mid-range combat specializing in the use of Assault Rifles, Pulse Rifles, Grenade Launchers and Rocket Launchers. This also applies to enemy weapons of the same type. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Assault Rifle, Advanced Assault Rifle, Elite Assault Rifle, Heavy Assault Rifle Pulse Rifle, Advanced Pulse Rifle, Tactical Stealth Rifle, Energy Pulse Rifle Grenade Launcher, Rocket Launcher, Guided Rocket Launcher, Advanced Guided Rocket Launcher Zirax Combat Rifle, Zirax Rocket Launcher.
Chinese (simplified): @d0 士兵 士兵是前线战斗人员，特意训练来进行中程战斗，专门使用突击步枪， 脉冲步枪， 榴弹发射器和火箭发射器.这也适用于敌人的同类型武器. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 突击步枪， 先进突击步枪， 精英突击步枪， 重型突击步枪 脉冲步枪， 先进脉冲步枪， 战术隐形步枪， 能量脉冲步枪 榴弹发射器， 火箭发射器， 制导火箭发射器， 先进制导火箭发射器 兹瑞克斯战斗步枪， 兹瑞克斯 火箭发射器.

English: @d0Marksman Marksmen are expert shots with scoped weapons trained in long-ranged combat specializing in the use of Sniper Rifles, Laser Rifles and Crossbows. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Sniper Rifle, Heavy Sniper Rifle, M77 Anti-Tank Rifle, Zirax Marksman Rifle Laser Rifle, Advanced Laser Rifle, Plasma Rifle Repeating Crossbow, Plasma Crossbow
Chinese (simplified): @d0 射手 射手是在远程战斗中使用瞄准武器训练的射击专家专门使用狙击步枪， 激光步枪和十字弩. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 狙击步枪， 重型狙击步枪， M77 反坦克步枪， 兹瑞克斯 射手 Rifle 激光步枪， 先进激光步枪， 等离子步枪 连弩， 等离子十字弩

English: @d0Agent Agents are elite security personnel excelling in close-quarters combat specializing in the use of small arms including Pistols, Heavy Pistols, Laser Pistols and Submachine Guns. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: M-5 Pistol, M-6 Holosight Pistol, Elite Combat Pistol, Starhawk Heavy Pistol LS-22 Laser Pistol, LS-38 Advanced Laser Pistol, DC-17 Heavy Laser Pistol Submachine Gun, Advanced Submachine Gun, Elite Submachine Gun
Chinese (simplified): @d0 特工 特工是精锐的保安人员，擅长近距离作战专门使用小型武器包括手枪， 重型手枪， 激光手枪和冲锋枪. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: M-5 手枪， M-6 Holosight 手枪， 精英战斗手枪， 沙漠之鹰重型手枪 LS-22 激光手枪， LS-38 先进激光手枪， DC-17 重型激光手枪 冲锋枪， 先进冲锋枪， 精英冲锋枪

English: @d0Vanguard Vanguards are the frontrunners in open combat, able to lead the charge, breach doors and take a position and hold it. Specialized for close and mid-ranged combat they employ the use of Shotguns and Miniguns. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Shotgun, Combat Shotgun, Assault Shotgun, Zirax Heavy Shotgun Minigun, Advanced Minigun, Laser Minigun
Chinese (simplified): @d0 先锋 先锋是开放战斗的领跑者，能够带头冲锋，破门而入，占据阵地并守住它，适合近距离和中距离战斗。他们使用散弹枪和迷你火神炮. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 散弹枪， 战斗散弹枪， 突击散弹枪， 兹瑞克斯 重型散弹枪 迷你火神炮， 先进迷你火神炮， 激光迷你火神炮

English: @d0Specialist Specialist are a support class trained in the use of energy and incendiary weapons such as Plasma Cannons and Flamethrowers. They are also capable of modifying the Plasma Rifle to destabilize the projectiles, causing them to explode on contact damaging the surrounding area. Each Class Level increases Weapon Damage, Reload Speed, Accuracy and reduces Recoil with their class-specific weapons.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Plasma Cannon, High-Output Plasma Cannon, Plasma Rifle Flamethrower, Advanced Flamethrower, Plasma Blaster
Chinese (simplified): @d0 战斗专家 战斗专家是一个支援职业，他们被训练使用能源和燃烧武器，比如等离子加农炮和火焰喷射器.它们还有能力改造等离子步枪让其发射体不稳定，使它们一接触就爆炸破坏周围区域. 每个职业级别增加武器伤害，装填速度，精度和减少反冲与他们的职业特定武器.@p9 适用武器: 等离子加农炮， 高输出等离子加农炮， 等离子步枪 火焰喷射器， 先进火焰喷射器， 等离子爆破枪

English: @d0Engineer Engineers are a non-combatant class specializing in maintenance, harvest and salvage. Experts in the use of Multitools, Chainsaws and Drills, both handheld and ship-mounted. They are also skilled Warp Technicians, able to boost the range of a typical Warp Drive by a few lightyears above the norm. Each Class Level increases Tool Damage, Reload Speed and increases the maximum warp distance of any Warp Drive.@p9 Applicable Weapons: Survival Multitool, Multitool, Advanced Multitool Chainsaw, Mechanical Drill, Laser Drill, Enhanced Laser Drill HV, SV and CV Drills, Drill Turrets, Multiturrets and Harvest Modules Gains +2 Lightyear warp range per class level
Chinese (simplified): @d0 工程师 工程师是一个非战斗人员职业，专门从事维护、收获和打捞。擅长使用生存工具， 链锯 and 钻头，同时包括手持和舰载型号.他们也是熟练的翘曲技师，能够典型地提高范围 翘曲引擎比正常值高出几光年. 每个职业级别增加工具伤害，重新装填速度，并增加任何翘曲引擎的最大跃迁距离.@p9 适用武器: 生存多功能工具， 多功能工具， 先进多功能工具 电锯，机械钻， 激光钻头， 增强型 HV， SV和CV 钻头， 钻头炮塔， 多功能炮塔和收割模块 每个职业级别增加2光年的曲速范围
职业系统 - 等级提升

English: Something's gone wrong here.\nThis message only appears if something's broken in the class checker.\nReport this to Vermillion and what you did to trigger it.
Chinese (simplified): Something's gone wrong here.\nThis message only appears if something's broken in the职业 checker.\nReport this to Vermillion and what you did to trigger it.

English: Congratulations, Commander. You have now confirmed {SubClass} as your Secondary Character Class.@p9 A new option in your statistics window will now display your Sub-Class level and stats in your PDA (F1). Good luck Commander.
Chinese (simplified): 恭喜， 指挥官. 你已经确定{SubClass}作为你的第二个性职业.@p9 一个新选项现在将显示你的统计窗口中，可以显示你的附属职业级别和属性，打开PDA (F1)查看. 祝你好运指挥官.

English: What if I uhh... already took down the convoy?
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffa000>如果我已经摧毁了运输队呢?</color>

English: [ Khalad ] Then you've have screwed up all my careful planning, that's what!@w4 If you HAVE taken out the convoy alone,@w2 i'll be impressed. But i'm not going to believe you unless you can show me the cargo (6) they were carrying. WARNING: This is a failsafe option in the event that you screwed up the convoy attack. If Khalad has not requested the items in the PDA yet, then you will be forever stuck.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 那么你已经把我所有的精心计划都搞砸了，就是这样!@w4 如果你一个人干掉了车队，我会印象深刻的，@w2 但是我不会相信你的，除非 你能告诉我他们所携带的货物(6). WARNING: 在你搞砸了车队攻击的情况下，这是一个失效保护选项. 如果Khalad还没有请求PDA中的项目，那么你将永远被卡在那里.

English: <color=#2eafff>I'm just talking hypotheticals, Khalad. See you later.</color>

[ Khalad ] What's this?@w4 You took down the convoy alone and without me?!@w4 Well my friend, it seems we won't need to worry about hitting the convoy now...@p9 [ Khalad ] That was a stupid thing to do, you know?@w4 Alright, i'll meet you at the drone base.@w3 Give me a few minutes to pack my things and i'll head out.
Chinese (simplified): [ Khalad ] 这是什么?@w4 你独自拿下了车队 而没有我?!@w4 好吧，我的朋友，现在看来我们不需要担心会撞到车队了...@p9 [ Khalad ] 这是一件愚蠢的事情，你知道吗?@w4 好吧，我们在无人机基地见.@w3 给我几分钟收拾行李，我就走.

English: PACKAGE SHIPPING Welcome to the Galactic Information Network's shipping services, Galactic Freight Services! How can we be of assistance today? Would you like to send a package or get a quote for a large package? We offer same-day delivery and express services too!
Chinese (simplified): 包装费 欢迎来到银河信息网络， 银河航运服务! 今天我们如何能为您效劳? 您是要寄包裹还是要大包裹的报价? 我们提供当日送达和速递服务!

English: PACKAGE SHIPPING Sender: {PlayerName} (Polaris Employee 8376455466) Recipient: Polaris Mining Corporation (Refining and Processing - Gamma Quadrant) Quote: 9,716.25 credits Note: Shipping cost waived. Polaris are an executive member and all business shipments are free of charge (proof required) > Confirm selection?
Chinese (simplified): 包装费 发送方: {PlayerName} (极星员工 8376455466) 收件人: 极星矿业公司 (精炼和加工-伽玛象限) 报价: 9，716.25 信用点 注释: 不需要航运成本。极星对执行成员和所有商业发货是免费的 (证明需要) > 确认选择?

English: <size=150%><color=#ffffff>Thank you for shipping with </color></size><size=150%><color=#0088ff>Galactic Freight Services</color></size><size=150%><color=#ffffff>!</color></size>\n<size=150%><color=#cacaca>We look forward to seeing you again!</color></size>
Chinese (simplified): <size=150%><color=#ffffff>谢谢您使用 </color></size><size=150%><color=#0088ff>银河航运服务</color></size><size=150%><color=#ffffff>!</color></size>\n<size=150%><color=#cacaca>我们期待再次见到您!</color></size>

English: <color=#ffffff>Congratulations on obtaining a </color><color=#0088ff>Naval Commendation</color><color=#ffffff>, Commander.\nBy certifying the award through the UCH Navy's channels, you are allowed to increase your Main or Sub-Class Rank by one level.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>What will you choose to do?</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#ffffff>恭喜你获得了一个</color><color=#0088ff>海军表彰</color><color=#ffffff>， 指挥官.\n通过UCH海军的渠道认证该奖项，您可以将您的主要或次要职业等级提高一个级别.</color>\n<color=#00ffff>你会选择做什么?</color>

English: Welcome to a new galaxy of gaming {PlayerName}! Where would you like to begin this adventure?@p3 WARNING! Due to the use of illegal hacking software, this Gambling terminal has been disabled until further use.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到游戏的新银河系，{PlayerName}！ 你想从哪里开始这次冒险？@p3 警告！ 由于使用了非法黑客软件，这个赌博终端已被禁用，直到进一步使用。

English:
<color=#ffffff>The goal of Blazar is to add random numbers between two possible values to reach the total value of </color><color=#00ff00>20</color><color=#ffffff>.</color>
<color=#ffffff>The closer you come to 20, the higher the return on your bet.</color>
<color=#ffffff>But if you reach </color><color=#ff0000>21 or higher</color><color=#ffffff>, your game ends and you win nothing.@p9</color>
<color=#ffffff>You can cash out at any time, and if you are within a few points of the target 20, you may return more money than you bet.</color>
<color=#ffffff>With the option of high-stakes betting, you can win a significant amount of credits.</color>
Chinese (simplified):
<color=#ffffff>Blazar的目标是在两个可能的数值之间添加随机数以达到总值 </color><color=#00ff00>20</color><color=#ffffff>。</color>
<color=#ffffff>你越接近20，你的投注回报就越高。</color>
<color=#ffffff>但是如果你达到 </color><color=#ff0000>21或更高</color><color=#ffffff>，你的游戏就结束了，你将一无所获。@p9 </color>
<color=#ffffff>你可以随时提现，如果你接近目标20的几分之内，你可能会得到比你投注更多的钱。</color>
<color=#ffffff>有了高风险投注的选项，你可以赢得大量的信用点。</color>

English: How much would you like to bet?
Your starting Blazar Count is: {GameCount}\nReach 20 to win!\nCash-out early to earn back some of your bet the closer you are to Blazar (100%, 125%, 150%, 175% of your original bet!)
Chinese (simplified): 你的起始Blazar数量是： {GameCount}\n达到20就赢了！\n越早兑换，你就越接近Blazar，可以拿回一些你的赌注（100%，125%，150%，175%的原始赌注！）

English: Your Current Blazar Count is: {GameCount}\nReach 20 to win!\nCash-out early to earn back some of your bet the closer you are to Blazar (100%, 125%, 150%, 175% of your original bet!)
Chinese (simplified): 你当前的Blazar数量是： {GameCount}\n达到20就赢了！\n越早兑换，你就越接近Blazar，可以拿回一些你的赌注（100%，125%，150%，175%的原始赌注！）

English: Thank you for playing!\nYour cash-out reward is {BlazarBet} Credits!\nWould you like to play another round?
Chinese (simplified): 感谢您的参与 \n您的套现奖励是{BlazarBet}积分\n你想再打一轮吗

English: You have reached BLAZAR! Congratulations! Your winnings are {BlazarBet} Credits! Do you want to play again?
Chinese (simplified): 你已经达到了BLAZAR! 恭喜！ 你的赢利是 {BlazarBet} 信用点！ 你想再玩一次吗？

English: You have failed to reach BLAZAR!\nYou have exceeded the limit, but there's always next time!\nDo you want to play again?
Chinese (simplified): 你未能到达BLAZAR!\n你超出了限制，但下次还有机会！\n你想再玩一次吗？

English: Woah there!@w2 I know who you are! Your face is all over the GalNet!@w2 If you think i'm going to help a criminal like you, you're dead wrong!@w2 Leave!@w2 Leave and don't come back!
Chinese (simplified): 哇!@w2 我知道你是谁! 你的脸在GalNet上到处都是!@w2 如果你认为我会帮助你这样的罪犯，那你就大错特错了!@w2 离开!@w2 离开，不要回来!

English: Welcome to Chemmix Industrial. Oh, it's you. Thanks to your help, we're up and running again. We're still a little short on supplies so we can't handle third-party industrial supply, only small scale chemical production. That's enough for your own personal needs, but we ain't servicing any corporations today.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Chemmix工业. 哦，是你。感谢你的帮助，我们工业系统再次运行中了. 我们仍然有点短缺，所以我们不能处理第三方工业供应，只有小规模的化工生产. 这足够满足你的个人需求了，但是我们今天不为任何公司服务了.

English: I won't take up any more of your time then
Chinese (simplified): 那我就不再占用你的时间了

English: Welcome to Chemmix Industrial.\nSorry, but we're currently not in any shape to handle any Industrial or Personal orders right now.@w3\nWe've got a burst tank, leaking pipes and the main production line is completely out of order. We're also completely out of the supplies to fix the problems.
Chinese (simplified): 欢迎来到Chemmix工业.\n抱歉，我们现在没有任何状态来处理任何工业或个人订单.@w3 \n我们的燃料箱爆裂，管道泄漏，主要生产线完全瘫痪。我们也完全没有供应来解决问题.

English: <color=#0088ff>I can help with the burst tank</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我可以帮忙处理破裂的燃料箱</color>

English: <color=#0088ff>I can help with the leaking pipes</color>
Chinese (simplified): <color=#0088ff>我可以帮忙处理泄露的管道</color>

English: You're damned right I need help,@w2 and i'll take anything I can get!@w3 I don't need workers for this, I just need the supplies i'm missing. Then I can get this place back up and running and will be able to handle your orders.@p9 What I need is: x40 Plastic Tubes x8 Flux Coils x8 Glass Plates x8 Advanced Capacitors x16 Energy Regulators x48 Titanium Plates@p9 Those parts are needed to repair the containers that hold the Pentaxium Catalysts used for many of the chemical reactions. Think you can handle that? If The Company won't help, I'll pay you out of my own pocket if I have to.
Chinese (simplified): 你说的没错，我确实需要帮助，@w2 我会接受任何我能得到的援助！@w3 我不需要工人来做这个，我只是需要我缺少的物资。这样我就能重新让这个地方运转起来，并且能够处理你的订单。@p9 我需要的是： 40个塑料管 8个通量线圈 8个玻璃板 8个高级电容器 16个能量调节器 48个钛板@p9 这些部件需要用来修理存放翘曲水晶催化剂的容器，这些催化剂用于许多化学反应。你觉得你能处理吗？ 如果 公司 不帮忙，如果有必要，我会自己掏腰包支付。

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got the supplies you needed right here</color>

Thanks for all your help! I'll put this to use immediately and get this operation back up to speed! Won't be long before we can handle industrial orders for someone other than Polaris.@p9 So, i'm authorized to pay for supplies out of the company's budget and Polaris will foot the bill, so here's {MoneyCounter} Credits, which should almost cover the cost of the supplies. You've saved the Company time and effort too, so they've added {RepCounter} to your Company Reputation.@p9 Although not discussed, i'm giving you a bonus out of our current shipment simply because I feel like it. 5 Shipments of XO-23 Chemicals and another 15 Chem-Filters. And thanks again for all your help!
Chinese (simplified): 谢谢你的帮助! 我将立即使用这个，并让这个操作恢复速度!用不了多久，我们就可以为除极星以外的其他的人处理工业订单.@p9 因此，我被授权从公司的预算中支付用品的费用，极星将承担费用，所以这里是 {MoneyCounter} 信用点，这应该几乎涵盖了用品的成本. 你也节省了公司的时间和精力，所以他们添加了 {RepCounter} 到你的公司声誉.@p9 虽然没有讨论，我从这批货里给你发奖金，只是因为我喜欢. 5 船的 XO-23 化学品和另一个15 化学品过滤器. 再次感谢您的帮助!

English: I don't need more unskilled workers, what I need are some new tanks that can hold corrosive and radioactive chemicals. I don't think you'll be able to carry those around in your pocket and we can't unload from connected ships@p8 That means I need to repair the ones i've got and that takes resources. x2000 Carbon Substrate x200 Mechanical Components x50 Motors x25 Electronics x8 Computers@p9 That should be enough to patch the burst tanks and seal them, with new motorized pump valves that'll make sure they don't burst again. Think you can handle that? If The Company won't help, I'll pay you out of my own pocket if I have to.
Chinese (simplified): 我不需要更多的非技术工人 我需要的是一些可以容纳腐蚀性和放射性化学品的新容器. 我不认为你能把它们放在你的口袋里，我们也不能从连接的船上卸货@p8 这意味着我需要修复我现有的那些，这需要资源 x2000 碳复合材料 x200 机械元件 x50 马达 x25 电子元件 x8 计算机@p9 这应该足以修补破裂的燃料箱并密封它们，用新的电动泵阀确保它们不会再次爆裂。你觉得你能行吗? 如果 公司 不帮忙， 我将自掏腰包.

English: <color=#0088ff>I've got the repair materials with me</color>
